VA01X002.Text:
That's right.
You've heard of it before,
haven't you?

VA01X003.Text:
It's a place in Houou City
called Ohtori Academy.

VA01X004.Text:
Ohtori Academy...?
Isn't that a really prestigious
school!?

VA01X005.Text:
You know, a long time ago,
your father used to teach at
Ohtori Academy.

VA01X006.Text:
Thanks to that connection,
the Chairman of the Board asked
if we'd like to send you there.

VA01X007.Text:
So what do you think?
Isn't it a nice offer?

VA01X009.Text:
Ohtori Academy is an excellent
place.

VA01X010.Text:
In fact, it's where your father
and I met.

VA01X012.Text:
That's right... if you go, you
should check out the fencing hall.

VA01X014.Text:
It's the pretty, chalk-white
building behind the library.
You'll recognize it right away.

VA01X015.Text:
Dad, you used to be a really
strong fencer, right?

VA01X017.Text:
So, when I was at Ohtori, I served
as the Fencing Club's advisor.

VA01X018.Text:
Your father was so dreamy back
then!

VA01X019.Text:
You looked pretty cool too,
in your fencing suit.

VA01X020.Text:
[giggle] I may have looked cool,
but I wasn't very good...

VA01X021.Text:
That's fine.
Girls don't need to be strong...

VA02X002.Text:
What a huge difference from my old
public school!

VA02X004.Text:
Even the way it's laid out feels
kind of extravagent. I mean,
there's a forest inside the school
grounds!

VA02X005.Text:
Just like you'd expect from such a
famous school... the campus is so
huge!

VA02X006.Text:
Let's see, where's the middle
school building...?

VA02X007.Text:
Elementary school, high school...
there are so many buildings, it's
going to take a while to get my
bearings.

VA02X008.Text:
What's that traditional-looking
building... a martial arts gym?

VA02X009.Text:
And I guess that thing that looks
like a birdcage is a conservatory?

VA02X010.Text:
What a huge difference from my old
public school!

Even the way it's laid out feels
extravagent. I mean, there's a
forest inside the school grounds!

Just like you'd expect from such a
famous school... the campus is so
huge!
Let's see, where's the middle
school building...?

Elementary school, high school...
there are so many buildings. It'll
take a while to get my bearings.
What's that traditional-looking
building... a martial arts gym?

And I guess that thing that looks
like a birdcage is a conservatory?

Man, the best my old school had
was a rabbit hutch.

VA03X001.Text:
I thought I heard a voice from
somewhere around here, but...

VA03X004.Text:
Are you saying that our love was
a lie?

VA03X005.Text:
On that night, didn't you swear
to devote yourself to me?

VA03X007.Text:
So you're saying you can't accept
my love?

VA03X009.Text:
(Wow, I just transferred here,
and I've already run across
such an amazing scene!)

VA03X010.Text:
(Huh, I wonder if he's from the
high school section? He looks
grown-up, and he's super-hot.
Is he her boyfriend?)

VA03X011.Text:
I am the Rose Bride...
I do as the victor of the duels
wishes.

VA03X015.Text:
(I dunno what's going on, but it
looks like I've stumbled upon a
major incident...)

VA03X016.Text:
(I can't just leave her alone...
What should I do?)

VA03A002.Text:
Hitting a girl like that...
you call yourself a man?

VA03A003.Text: What the... who the hell are you?

VA03A006.Text:
As a fellow girl, this IS
my business!

VA03A007.Text:
Honestly, first Tenjou Utena,
and now this girl.

VA03A008.Text:
Why are all transfer students so
vexing...?

VA03A015.Text:
Hmph. Fine, then.
Soon I'll duel you and take back
the Rose Bride.
Anthy, please endure until then.

VA03A020.Text: I want to thank you too, uh...

VA03A021.Text:
%F %N.
I transferred in as a middle
school second-year today.

VA03A023.Text:
Yeah? I'm Tenjou Utena.
This is Himemiya Anthy.
And that love-struck idiot from
before was...

VA03A024.Text:
Utena-sama, classes are about
to begin.

VA03A025.Text:
Oh, right. I hope we end up in the
same class. See ya!

VA03A026.Text:
Ah, wait a minute!
...they already left.

VA03A028.Text:
(So cool...
And the girl with the glasses was
cute, too.)

VA03A029.Text:
(I've got a feeling something
good's gonna happen!)

VA03B002.Text:
Now, Anthy. Come with me.
And...

VA03B009.Text:
Hmph. Fine, then.
Soon I'll duel you and take back
the Rose Bride.
Anthy, please endure until then.

VA03B014.Text:
(Whew, I'm so glad there was
someone to save her.)

VA03B015.Text:
Utena-sama, classes are about
to begin.

VA03B017.Text:
(That's right,
I need to get going, too.)

VA03B018.Text:
(But anyway, that person was
really cool.)

VA03B019.Text:
(The girl with the glasses was
cute, too. I've got a feeling
something good's gonna happen!)

VA05X001.Text:
Starting today, a new classmate
will be joining your studies here
in 2nd Year, Class C.

VA05X002.Text:
Before you sit down,
please introduce yourself.

VA05X003.Text:
(A self-introduction, huh? First
impressions are really important,
so I've gotta do this right!)

VA05X005.Text:
I went to a public middle school,
so I'm new to dorm life.

VA05X006.Text:
I'm looking forward to finding out
what it's like!

VA05X008.Text:
Actually, your dorm hasn't been
assigned yet.

VA05X009.Text:
Please ask after school, when you
go to the Chairman's Office to
introduce yourself.

VA05X010.Text:
Your bags should have arrived by
then, as well.

VA05X012.Text:
I don't understand the addresses
or campus layout at all yet, so
please help me out, everyone!

VA06A004.Text:
In return, I'll just call you by
your given name too, okay?

VA06A005.Text:
Adding "san" and "kun" and all
those is a pain, don't you think?

VA06A007.Text:
(Getting to make friends with
someone this cool on my first day
is really lucky!)

VA06B001.Text:
Hello. I'm Tenjou Utena.
Just "Utena" is fine, though.

VA06B006.Text:
(Getting to make friends with
someone this cool on my first day
is really lucky!)

VA07X001.Text:
(We're already acquainted,
so I'd like to chat with her more,
but...)

VA07A003.Text:
Utena, do you have a girlfriend
or anything?

VA07A004.Text:
Uh... I guess from my appearance,
that doesn't seem totally out of
the question, but...

VA07A005.Text:
(What does that mean? "From my
appearance"? Smooth long hair,
pretty eyes, glossy lips...)

VA07A007.Text:
(I'd say Utena's a pretty
good-looking boy!)

VA07A008.Text:
(And there's those thin, smooth
legs, and his chest... huh?)

VA07A009.Text:
(And there's those thin, smooth
legs, and his chest... huh?
Ch... ch... chest?)

VA07A011.Text:
(Oh, my god!
I just made a total fool of
myself!)

VA07A012.Text:
(Utena looks at a loss, and all
the girls around me are laughing
like they're going to pass out!)

VA07A013.Text:
(The only one who looks unfazed is
Anthy...
Oh, man...)

VA07B003.Text:
Utena, do you have a boyfriend or
anything?

VA07B004.Text:
N-no, I don't have anything like
that!

VA07B005.Text:
Oh, no?
And what about the prince
you're always talking about?

VA07B006.Text:
Did you have to bring that up,
Wakaba?

VA07B007.Text:
You shouldn't lie to girls who're
nervous over transferring schools.

VA07B009.Text:
A long time ago, when I was really
sad and feeling all alone, there
was a man who saved me.

VA07B010.Text: And he gave me this ring.

VA07B012.Text: I came to this school to meet him.

VA07B014.Text:
(I wouldn't have thought someone
as boyish as Utena would say such
girly things.)

VA08X001.Text:
Hey, what's the "Rose Bride"?
I heard the term this morning.

VA08X006.Text:
Whoever wins the duels becomes
engaged to me,

VA08X007.Text:
and can obtain the Power to
Revolutionize the World.

VA08X008.Text:
H-hang on, Himemiya.
Is it okay for you to just freely
talk about this stuff?

VA08X010.Text:
"Duels"?
You mean, like, where you hack
at each other with swords?

VA08X011.Text:
Yes. Using swords, whoever manages
to knock the rose off the
opponent's chest wins.

VA08X013.Text:
I know! It's unbelievable, right?
Any normal person would think so.

VA08X014.Text:
So, that guy from this morning
also...?

VA08X015.Text:
Saionji-senpai was the victor of
the duels before Utena-sama.

VA08X016.Text: I was previously engaged to him.

VA08X018.Text:
Yes. I do whatever the person
I'm engaged to wishes.

VA08X020.Text:
Himemiya, I keep telling you to
knock it off with the "Utena-
sama" stuff.

VA08X021.Text:
But I'm engaged to you,
Utena-sama...

VA08X023.Text:
(Duels? Rose Bride? The Power to
Revolutionize the World?)

VA08X024.Text:
(I might just have befriended some
super-dangerous people as soon
as I transferred...)

VA09X001.Text:
(Maybe I should back off before I
get in too deep?)

VA09A001.Text: Hey, could I get engaged myself?

VA09A002.Text:
If you do that, you can get the
Power to Revolutionize the World,
right?

VA09A003.Text:
Unfortunately, in order to duel,
you need to possess a Rose Seal.

VA09A006.Text: Oh, so it's no good, huh?

VA09A007.Text:
However, it's possible that you
might be able to acquire a Rose
Seal.

VA09A010.Text:
(Somehow, Anthy has this air of
mystery around her.)

VA09A011.Text:
(Like she's kind of otherwordly,
I guess...)

VA09B001.Text:
B-by the way, Utena...
Why do you wear a different
uniform from everyone else's?

VA09B002.Text:
Oh, this?
It's just easier to move around
in.

VA09B003.Text:
Besides, the boys do gross stuff
like trying to look up skirts.

VA09B004.Text:
Hmm. What about that guy from
this morning? He was also wearing
different clothes.

VA09B005.Text:
Do you mean Saionji-senpai?
That's a special Student Council
uniform.

VA09B006.Text:
Student Council members wear a
different uniform from the other
students.

VA09B007.Text:
Wow...
So he's in the Student Council.

VA09B009.Text:
Woah... so he's an important
person!

VA09B010.Text:
I dunno about that...
I've never seen him do any actual
Student Council work.

VA09B011.Text:
Everyone in the Council is like
that.

VA09B012.Text:
(What the heck is up with the
Student Council here?)

VA09C001.Text:
Well, you know what they say about
duels: just do-el it!
...Uh, was that lame?

VA09C002.Text:
You think we're joking,
don't you?

VA09C004.Text:
Unfortunately, it's the truth.
At least, those Student Council
guys seem really serious about it.

VA09C006.Text:
They say they're going to get the
Power to Revolutionize the World.

VA09C008.Text:
But you probably shouldn't talk
about this to anyone else.

VA09C009.Text:
If a new transfer student started
talking about stuff like that,

VA09C010.Text:
people might misunderstand
and think you're dangerous.

VA10X005.Text:
Hey, Wakaba!
Over here, over here!!

VA10X007.Text:
Man, I finally got here.
The line for the B Lunch was
so long!

VA10X008.Text:
That's why I said you should just
give up!

VA10X009.Text: But they had kombucha for dessert!

VA10X011.Text:
Totally!
That's why the line was so long.

VA10X013.Text:
Oh, nice to meet you!
I'm Shinohara Wakaba.

VA10X014.Text:
I'm in the same class as you,
and I'm Utena's girlfriend.
Nice to meet you.

VA10X015.Text:
(Shinohara Wakaba...
Compared to Utena and Anthy,
she seems really normal.)

VA10A002.Text:
I still don't know much about the
school, so please teach me, okay?

VA10A004.Text:
From the ways of love, to campus
rumors, to the trendy local shops,
just leave it to me,
Shinohara Wakaba-sama!

VA10A006.Text:
Thanks!
If I have any problems,
I'll be sure to consult with you.

VA11X006.Text:
Come to think of it, you still
don't know what dorm you're in,
right?

VA11X007.Text:
Right.
I'm going to go meet with the
Chairman now and find out.

VA11X009.Text:
Yeah?
I guess we can't walk back
together, then.

VA11X011.Text:
Aww... can't I just skip going to
the Chairman's office and go back
with you?

VA11X013.Text:
But then you wouldn't know what
dorm you're in.

VA11X014.Text:
We can start walking home together
starting tomorrow, but today
you're on your own.

VA11X015.Text:
...Yeah, I guess so.
Hey, where do you guys live,
Utena?

VA11X017.Text:
Me and Himemiya are in the East
Dorm. There's only us and one more
person, so come hang out anytime.

VA11X019.Text:
Thanks!
I guess I'm off to the Chairman's
Office, then.

VA12X001.Text:
I'm Ohtori Akio, the Chairman of
the Board... or rather, the
Chairman's proxy.

VA12X003.Text:
(When I heard "Chairman",
I was expecting some preachy old
guy.)

VA12X004.Text:
(It seems like everything about
Ohtori Academy is completely
gorgeous!)

VA12C001.Text:
Your dorm is the East Hall,
second floor, Room 22.

VA12C002.Text:
Your luggage should have already
arrived.

VA12C003.Text:
(East Dorm?
That's the same as Utena!)

VA12C005.Text:
Oh, uh... it's just that that's
where a friend I met today is
living.

VA12C007.Text:
Friends are wonderful. Simply by
chatting with them, they ease the
burden on your heart.

VA12C008.Text:
Here's a map of the academy.
Rather big, isn't it?

VA12C010.Text:
From here, you head this way, and
you'll find the fencing hall here.

VA12C011.Text:
It's a pretty, chalk-white
building. I'm sure you'll
recognize it right away.

VA12C012.Text:
Slip through the side here; it's a
shortcut.

VA12C013.Text:
(The chalk-white fencing hall.
Just like my dad said.)

VA12C014.Text:
And this is the East Dorm.
If you go this way, it should only
take you about five minutes.

VA13X001.Text:
It seems the East Dorm has gained
a new resident.

VA13X004.Text:
Aren't the Rose Bride and the One
Engaged the only ones allowed to
live there?

VA13X005.Text:
However, they wouldn't be able to
live there without the approval of
the Ends of the World.

VA13X007.Text:
In other words, it's the Ends of
the World's will that this new
person lives there as well.

VA13X008.Text:
They say she's a new transfer
student.
Interesting, isn't it?

VA13X009.Text:
It's an irregular event...
Come to think of it, Tenjou-senpai
was a transfer student, too.

VA13X011.Text:
Then, perhaps I should invite her
to this evening's masquerade ball.
Any objections?

VA13X014.Text:
Alright.
Since there are no objections,

VA13X015.Text:
I'll extend her an invitation to
the masquerade ball under the
Student Council's name.

VA14X001.Text:
Here it is... the fencing hall
that dad described.

VA14X002.Text:
It's a really pretty building...
like a Western cathedral.

VA14X003.Text:
The doors are so huge, and
the window frames are so nicely
decorated!

VA14X004.Text: I feel like I'm in another world.

VA14X006.Text:
Still...
I guess I'll poke my head in and
take a look.

VA15X001.Text:
Nobody's here...
I guess there's no practice today?

VA15B001.Text:
Looks like they have 30 members.
That's quite a few!

VA15B002.Text:
There was hardly anybody in the
fencing club at my old school.

VA15B003.Text:
The very first of these name
plates is the captain, right?

VA15B005.Text:
So the president is Sanjouin
Chigusa, huh? What a great name,
it's really unusual.

VA15B006.Text:
Hm? I don't see a name plate for
the club advisor...

VA15B009.Text:
But that's weird.
My dad used to be club advisor.
Has the system changed since then?

VA16X001.Text:
Yeah, looks like nobody is here
after all. They must have today
off from practice.

VA16X002.Text:
(Huh? There's something drawn on
that wall. What is it?)

VA16A001.Text:
What the heck is this?
If it's graffiti, it's pretty
audacious.

VA16A002.Text:
Hey, isn't this that guy from this
morning?
I think his name was Saionji...

VA16A004.Text:
And this figure looks like Utena.
What does it mean?

VA16B002.Text:
There's a red circle around the
25th. I wonder if there's a
tournament going on.

VA16B003.Text:
Wait, this date...? This calendar
is from fifteen years ago! Weird.

VA16C001.Text:
Huh? This locker's the only one
that's open. Whose is it?

VA16C003.Text:
They must have forgotten to lock
it. Let's see...

VA17X002.Text:
(Who's this?
Someone from the Fencing Club?)

VA17X004.Text: (Are they a man? Or a woman?)

VA17X005.Text:
(Somehow they've got this air
that's so magnificent, it makes
them hard to approach...)

VA17X006.Text:
(But it's not a bad feeling. This
must be the sort of person they
mean when they say someone's
"aristocratic.")

VA17X008.Text:
(I guess people like this
also exist in real life,
not just in stories and plays...)

VA17X010.Text:
Oh, my name's %F %N.
I just transferred here today...

VA17X011.Text:
What did you say?
Please, repeat your name.

VA17X012.Text:
(You don't have to make such
a scary face...)

VA17X014.Text:
Is your father's name Masaomi...
and your mother's name Koto?

VA17X017.Text:
(She turned away.
But isn't she still making that
scary face?)

VA17X019.Text:
Only club members are allowed in
here.

VA17X020.Text:
There are personal things kept
here.

VA17X021.Text:
If you get accused of theft, you
won't be able to make any excuses
for yourself.

VA17X023.Text:
(Wow, I was surprised.
I guess I shouldn't have just
freely gone in after all.)

VA17X024.Text:
(Anyway, that person was really
beautiful. It was almost unreal.)

VA17X025.Text:
(So were those three this morning,
and the Chairman... Ohtori Academy
really is different.)

VA18X002.Text:
(I get it; she knew I was moving
into the East Dorm when my bags
arrived.)

VA18X006.Text:
Your room is number 22, on the
second floor.
It's next door to ours.

VA19X002.Text: Did you clean the room for me?

VA19X003.Text:
All I did was bring up your bags.
Himemiya's the one who cleaned it.

VA19X010.Text:
(Nobody else is here...
Is it just my imagination?)

VA19X013.Text:
N-no, I definitely heard it!
U-Utena, something's in this room!

VA19X015.Text:
Oh, right!
Chu-Chu helped, too.
Sorry, sorry!

VA19X016.Text:
I'll introduce you.
This is the East Dorm's third
resident, our friend...

VA19X019.Text: So wait, the third resident is...

VA19X022.Text:
(It's a monkey... I think.
Well, then...)

VA19A002.Text:
We'll be living together from
now on.
It's a pleasure, Chu-Chu.

VA19A004.Text:
Nice, Chu-Chu!
You made a new friend.

VA19A006.Text:
Hey, %N,
do you wanna come to our room and
have some tea?

VA19A008.Text: It will be done soon, Utena-sama.

VA19A009.Text:
Really?
In that case, I guess I'll impose
on you.

VA20X001.Text:
By the way, this arrived from the
Student Council.

VA20X002.Text:
What is it? A message card?
Some kind of invitation?
No way it's a love letter, right?

VA20X004.Text:
And this one is for you,
Utena-sama.

VA20X007.Text:
Let's see, what is this...
A masquerade ball?

VA20X008.Text:
Yes. It says it's starting at 6
o'clock tonight, and is sponsored
by the Student Council.

VA20X009.Text:
It says that transfer students
should definitely also attend.

VA20X011.Text:
(At my old school,
we just had folk dances...)

VA20X012.Text:
(The more I learn, the more it
feels like this is a totally
different world.)

VA20X013.Text:
Well, that's what it says.
What should we do?

VA20X014.Text:
Hmm...
But I don't have any dress to wear
to a ball...

VA20X015.Text:
That's all right.
I can lend you one.

VA20X018.Text:
Alright!
If that's decided, let's get going
right away.

VA21X002.Text:
(So this party is organized by
the Student Council...?)

VA21X003.Text:
(Woah, that chandelier is so high
up!)

VA21X004.Text:
(And the food on the tables is all
stuff I've never seen before...)

VA22X002.Text:
(My heart just thumped...
What a cute boy!)

VA22X003.Text:
(He has such pretty eyes.
They're like round crystals...)

VA22X006.Text:
Wow, Himemiya-san, your dress is
so beautiful!

VA22X007.Text: You look like a blooming rose.

VA22X009.Text:
Even though she's wearing a mask,
you immediately knew it was
Himemiya.

VA22X010.Text: It must be the power of love!

VA22X011.Text:
Please don't tease me.
Ha ha ha...

VA22X012.Text:
Tenjou-senpai, you're about the
only person I know who comes to
balls dressed like that.

VA22X013.Text:
I don't like those fluttery
dresses.

VA22X014.Text:
Hey, never mind that -
why aren't you wearing a mask,
Mickey?

VA22X015.Text:
Because we Student Council members
are the hosts.

VA22X016.Text:
It would be a problem if the
guests couldn't mingle with us.
By the way, who's this...?

VA22X017.Text:
Oh, I'll introduce you.
She just transferred here today.
Her name is...

VA22X019.Text:
Nice to meet you.
I'm Kaoru Miki. I'm a first-year
in the Middle School.

VA22X020.Text:
Mickey here fences and plays the
piano at the national level,

VA22X021.Text:
and he's taking university-level
courses, too.
He's totally brilliant.

VA22X023.Text:
(And he's younger than me.
I wonder what I should talk
about?)

VA22A001.Text:
You have really pretty eyes.
They look almost like crystals.

VA22A003.Text: So you're really good at fencing?

VA22A004.Text:
My parents did a little bit of
fencing, too.

VA22A005.Text:
Now that you mention it, there was
a fencing saber in your luggage.

VA22A006.Text:
Really?
So you fence, as well?

VA22A007.Text:
No, not at all. I'm kind of
interested, but I guess I've just
never gotten around to it.

VA22A009.Text:
In that case, won't you come visit
the Fencing Club?
We have a lot of female members.

VA22A013.Text:
I've got to go see to the
arrangement of the food, and
direct the music...

VA22C001.Text:
(Alright, I'll break the ice with
a little gag.)

VA22C004.Text:
Who's the leader of the club
that's made for you and I?
M I C K E Y, or M I K I!

VA22C005.Text:
Don't worry, I'm not trying to
"take the mickey out of you!"

VA22C007.Text:
I've got to go see to the
arrangement of the food, and
direct the music...

VA23X001.Text: I shouldn't have come after all.

VA23X002.Text:
All in all,
balls just don't suit me.

VA23X004.Text:
Well, I thought it would be kinda
rude to refuse. Besides...

VA23X007.Text:
You thought it would be hard for
someone to come here alone, right?

VA23X008.Text:
Th... then you came to keep me
company?

VA23X009.Text:
H, hey, since we came all the way
out here, let's go grab some food.
C'mon, Himemiya.

VA23X011.Text: Hey. Glad you could make it.

VA23X013.Text:
(He's wearing a uniform like
Miki's... I guess he's in the
Student Council, too?)

VA23X015.Text:
(Why is Ohtori Academy filled
entirely with beautiful people?)

VA23X017.Text:
What kind of a greeting is that?
Your knight has come to ask you
for a dance.

VA23X018.Text: I guess you're free to ask.

VA23X020.Text:
Oh, I'm not going to introduce you
to her.

VA23X021.Text:
If I introduced her to a playboy
like you,

VA23X023.Text:
Hey, now.
I'm the one who sent you an
invitation, you know.

VA23X024.Text:
Doesn't that count for anything?
Or are you jealous?

VA23X026.Text:
I'm Kiryuu Touga.
I'm the president of the Student
Council.

VA23X027.Text:
If you have any problems,
by all means come to me with them.

VA23X028.Text:
Cute girls like yourself are
particularly welcome.

VA23X029.Text:
(He called me cute...!
I guess that stuff about him being
a playboy is true.)

VA23A002.Text:
First of all, thank you for
inviting me to this wonderful
ball.

VA23A005.Text:
You can chat with your friends,
or enjoy the food.

VA23A006.Text:
But, of course, balls are really
about dancing.

VA23A007.Text:
When a man reaches out for
a woman's hand, their sweet night
at the ball truly begins.

VA23A009.Text: Won't you grant me a dance, miss?

VA23A013.Text:
That guy moves fast, so be
careful!

VA23C002.Text:
But I'm cautious of sugar
and sweet words.
They're both the enemies of women.

VA23C004.Text:
Goodness, I've been rejected!
Tenjou-kun, it's because you
introduced me as a playboy.

VA23C006.Text:
What, are you saying it isn't
true?

VA23C007.Text:
In any case, Tenjou-kun.
Won't you dance with me?

VA23C008.Text:
Not as a replacement for her.
I'm asking you because I really
want to.

VA23C010.Text:
The two of us are going to go eat.
I'm really hungry.

VA24X001.Text:
Hey, who's that dancing with
Touga-sama?

VA24X002.Text:
Usually, the honor of having the
first dance with Touga-sama goes
to a girl who's great at sports,
or academics.

VA24X004.Text: I've never seen that girl before.

VA24X005.Text:
(Uh, we seem to be attracting a
lot of attention.)

VA24X006.Text:
(It's like everyone's hostile, or
jealous... those are the kind of
looks we're getting.)

VA24X008.Text:
Or could it be that there's
someone else who's caught your
eye?

VA24X010.Text:
(Doesn't this guy look like
somebody I know?
But who...?)

VA24X011.Text:
You're in the East Dorm with
Tenjou-kun, right? So, how is it?
Do you like it?

VA24X012.Text:
The Chairman just told me where
I would be living after school
today.

VA24X013.Text:
So I haven't even spent thirty
minutes in my room yet.

VA24X017.Text:
By the way, were you in any clubs
at your former school?

VA24X019.Text:
No, I wasn't really in any clubs
at my last school.

VA24X020.Text:
I've never done anything like
fencing or kendo.

VA24X021.Text:
But apparently, my father used to
be the advisor for the Fencing 
Club here, a long time ago.

VA24X022.Text:
(Hey, that's right.
This guy looks kind of like
my dad!)

VA24X023.Text:
So your parents also attended
this school?

VA24X024.Text:
Yeah. They say they met in the
Fencing Club.

VA24X025.Text:
But according to my mom,
she wasn't very good at it.

VA24X026.Text:
...And I think I take after my mom
more.

VA24X027.Text:
Is that so.
They met at Ohtori...

VA24X029.Text:
(Did I accidentally say something
to offend him...?)

VA24X032.Text:
It's rude to have something else
on one's mind while dancing with
a lady.

VA24X034.Text:
Ah... the music is stopping,
it seems.
I guess our time together is over.

VA24X036.Text:
I had lots of fun.
I'd like to talk with you again.

VA24X037.Text:
(He has a wonderful smile... I can
see how girls might fall for him.
Even me...)

VA24X039.Text:
Later, then.
Next time, let's make it just the
two of us.

VA25X001.Text:
(What should I do?
I've been separated from Utena.)

VA25X003.Text:
(I thought they might spot me if
I took off my mask, but...)

VA25X006.Text:
What's wrong, monkey?
Do you want this?

VA25X008.Text:
Come on!
If you want it, reach up higher
and take it!

VA25X009.Text:
(It's that guy from this morning!
He's bullying Chu-Chu...
What should I do?)

VA25A002.Text:
(It's probably best to play fair,
and just confront him head-on.)

VA25A006.Text:
What's so fun about picking on
things that are weaker than you?

VA25A007.Text:
Not you again. You, the monkey...
Why are there always insects
getting in my way...?

VA25A009.Text:
I'm not an insect!
I have a name, you know.
It's %F %N.

VA25A011.Text:
Hmmph. Well, I'm Student Council
Vice President, captain of the
Kendo Club,

VA25A012.Text:
and hero of the campus, Saionji
Kyouichi.
So what's with your rude attitude?

VA25A013.Text:
Really, women should act more
modestly. Like Anthy, for example.

VA25A015.Text:
...But it seemed like Anthy hated
you.

VA25A016.Text:
You laymen are so troublesome.
She was simply being shy,
like a good modest woman.

VA25A051.Text:
(...It... didn't fall?
I thought it fell towards me,
but...)

VA25A052.Text:
(A hand?
Someone caught the candlestick...
That hand... it can't be...?)

VA25A022.Text:
Hey, your left hand.... isn't it
burned!?
You should go cool it quickly!

VA25A024.Text: I said it wasn't a big deal!

VA25A025.Text:
More to the point, that monkey
needs harsher discipline.

VA25A026.Text:
(It's probably best to play fair,
and just confront him head-on.)

VA25A030.Text:
What's so fun about picking on
things that are weaker than you?

VA25A032.Text:
I'm %F %N.
I just transfered here today.

VA25A034.Text:
Hmph.
Then perhaps you're not aware.

VA25A035.Text:
I'm the Student Council Vice
President, captain of the Kendo
Club,

VA25A036.Text:
and hero of the campus, Saionji
Kyouichi.
So what's with your rude attitude?

VA25A037.Text:
Really, women should act more
modestly. Like Anthy, for example.

VA25A039.Text:
...But it seemed like Anthy hated
you.

VA25A041.Text:
Well, allow me to set you
straight. She was simply being
shy, like a good modest woman.

VA25A054.Text:
(...It... didn't fall?
I thought it fell towards me,
but...)

VA25A055.Text:
(A hand?
Someone caught the candlestick...
That hand... it can't be...?)

VA25A046.Text:
Hey, your left hand.... isn't it
burned!?
You should go cool it quickly!

VA25A048.Text: I said it wasn't a big deal!

VA25A049.Text:
More to the point, that monkey
needs harsher discipline.

VA25B001.Text:
(Facing him directly and telling
him to stop would be a little
scary.)

VA25B002.Text:
(So this time... I've got it!
I'll just put on my mask, and...
okay!)

VA25B005.Text:
I think Himemiya-san was calling
for you over there.

VA25B008.Text:
(W... what's with this guy?
He's shaking with emotion.)

VA25B010.Text:
Of course.
Even while she's at Tenjou Utena's
side,

VA25B012.Text:
she was looking forward to our
brief rendevous tonight...

VA25B013.Text: Yes! I'm coming to you, Anthy!

VA25B014.Text:
Let us share a passionate dance
together!

VA25B016.Text:
(Man, that guy's really into
Anthy, isn't he?)

VA25B017.Text:
(I guess that stuff this morning
was also because he still has
feelings for her...)

VA25B018.Text:
(It doesn't seem like he's a
complete jerk.)

VA25B019.Text:
(Not to say that he's not a total
pain, of course...)

VA26X002.Text:
(I thought those two would totally
stand out, but I don't see them
anywhere...!)

VA26X003.Text:
(Oh, there's Anthy!
But where's she going...?)

VA26X004.Text:
(Anyway, now that I've found her,
I should chase after her!)

VA26X005.Text:
Hey, girl.
Wanna chat a bit over there?

VA26X007.Text:
The wind feels really nice up on
the balcony.

VA26X008.Text:
What happened to your mask?
Did you lose it?

VA26X009.Text:
(What's this... is he trying to
pick me up?
I thought balls like this were for
gentlemen and ladies.)

VA26X012.Text: Excuse me, please let me through.

VA26X017.Text:
(Look at those long ringlets!
But they totally suit her...)

VA26X018.Text:
(She has a good figure, and she's
so gallant.)

VA26X019.Text:
(It's like straight out of the
ancient nobility!)

VA26X020.Text:
(She seems kind of intense...
I guess she's another member of
the Student Council?)

VA26X024.Text:
(Ah, free at last!
...But I still lost sight of
Anthy.)

VA26X026.Text:
Um... thank you very much!
My name is %F %N.

VA26X027.Text:
%F?
Then you're the new resident of
the East Dorm.

VA26X028.Text:
That's right.
But how did you...?

VA26X030.Text:
You're quite famous among the
members of the Student Council.

VA26X033.Text:
(What should I do,
I've got to talk about something!
A topic... a topic...)

VA26C001.Text:
Umm, Arisugawa-senpai,
you're really strong and cool,
aren't you?

VA26C002.Text: I wish I could be like you...

VA26C005.Text:
I, too, want to become strong.
But...

VA26C007.Text:
(She's clasping something by her
chest.
A pendant? No, a locket?)

VA26C008.Text:
If you'd like, please come visit
the Fencing Club.

VA26C009.Text:
Becoming physically strong helps
one gain confidence.

VA26C010.Text:
Um, sure!
Thank you very much.

VA26C011.Text:
((Arisugawa Juri-san, huh...?
As a fellow woman, I really adore
her!)

VA26C013.Text:
(But, I'm a little concerned about
that locket by her chest.)

VA26C014.Text:
(Is it the kind that you keep
a lover's picture in...?)

VA27X001.Text:
Young lady...
Would you favor me with a dance?

VA27X002.Text:
(Huh, who's this...?
Is it that person that I met at
the fencing hall?)

VA27X005.Text: Do you know about the Rose Bride?

VA27X007.Text:
To obtain her is to obtain the
Power to Revolutionize the World.

VA27X008.Text: Why are you talking about that...?

VA27X010.Text:
Are you...
a member of the Student Council?

VA27X011.Text:
Not all Duelists are members of
the Student Council.

VA27X012.Text:
The current victor, Tenjou Utena,
isn't one either.

VA27X014.Text:
However... she won't be engaged to
the Rose Bride for much longer.

VA27X015.Text:
What do you mean?
Are you...

VA27X016.Text:
Soon, I will duel Tenjou Utena.
And she'll lose.
And then...

VA27X017.Text:
(This person's eyes...
they're somehow really scary!
Why...?)

VA28X003.Text:
Still, to interfere with one of
the Student Council's balls...
that takes a lot of guts,
don't you think?

VA28X004.Text:
This is no time for admiration,
Juri-san!

VA28X005.Text:
This was a clear act of opposition
to the Student Council.

VA28X006.Text:
Not so fast, Mickey.
We haven't determined that yet.

VA28X007.Text:
Hey, transfer student.
What's that stuck to your back?

VA29X001.Text:
The sounds of breaking glass that
we heard were simply drink
glasses,

VA29X002.Text:
getting knocked off a table by
a confused student.

VA29X003.Text:
I asked the student about it, but
nothing was wrong in particular.

VA29X004.Text:
It seems it was just a simple
accident.

VA29X005.Text:
Also, this circuit breaker was
dropped over by the switchboard.

VA29X006.Text:
But the switch board room should
have been locked...

VA29X007.Text:
I saw no traces of the lock being
broken or tampered with.

VA29X008.Text: They probably used a spare key.

VA29X009.Text:
Never mind that.
The problem is the message that
was on this girl's back.

VA29X010.Text:
Hey, exchange student.
Did you notice someone sticking
the card on you?

VA29X013.Text:
(If it was much before the lights
went out, someone would have
noticed...)

VA29X014.Text:
(So, I guess it was just before?
Come to think of it, that
person...)

VA29X016.Text:
This is all well and good,
but why do we have to talk up on
this freezing balcony?

VA29X019.Text:
Don't put your hands on your hips
and cop an attitude, girl!
And monkey, stop imitating her!

VA29X024.Text:
For the time being, since it's a
Student Council meeting, we should
use the Student Council room...

VA29X025.Text:
So it's some kind of school rule?
I guess it can't be helped, then.

VA29X026.Text:
No, it's just so we have the right
atmosphere.

VA29X028.Text:
In any case, it's clear that
a strange new participant has
entered the Dueling Game.

VA29X030.Text:
What's more, they've decided to do
us the courtesy of announcing
their presence.

VA29X031.Text: We should all be duly careful.

VA29X034.Text:
As the one engaged to the Rose
Bride, there's a good possibility
that you might be targeted.

VA29X035.Text:
Man, what a bother.
And why the 25th?

VA29X036.Text:
Can't they just duel me
immediately, like usual?

VA29X037.Text:
That's certainly mysterious.
Why did they designate the 25th,
three days in advance?

VA29X038.Text:
Presumably they're going to use
the time to allow them to beat
Tenjou Utena.

VA29X039.Text:
Hey.
What about you, transfer student?

VA29X041.Text:
Leave her alone, Saionji.
She has nothing to do with this.

VA29X042.Text:
This incident happened on the day
she transferred here.
It's too much to be a coincidence.

VA29X043.Text:
She could have stuck the card on
her back herself and lied about
it.

VA29X044.Text:
She might have thought that
setting the duel three days ahead,

VA29X045.Text:
would give her time to find your
weak point.

VA29X048.Text:
(I'm just a victim here!
Stop looking at me so coldly!)

VA29A001.Text:
(I just transferred here, so my
words won't carry any weight...)

VA29A002.Text:
(I guess I'm going to have to
catch the perpetrator myself.)

VA29A003.Text:
Fine.
I'll catch the real culprit!

VA29A006.Text:
Saionji-senpai, if I do that,
you'll stop grumbling, right?

VA29A008.Text:
Under these circumstances,
it's natural for you to doubt me,
but I didn't do it.

VA29A009.Text:
Your words have won me over.
I believe you.

VA29A010.Text:
Well, no matter who did it,
we'll find out on the 25th.

VA29A011.Text:
Anyway, we probably don't have
enough information from this event
to draw any conclusions.

VA29A012.Text:
We should just each act as we
think best.

VA29A013.Text:
(Good. At least they haven't
decided that I'm guilty.)

VA29A014.Text:
(But should I really have said to
leave the matter of the true
culprit to me...?)

VA29B001.Text:
(Alright... to break up all this
tension, I'm going to have to
break out my special gag!)

VA29B002.Text:
My my, customers!
You all have such long faces!

VA29B003.Text:
Here, to lighten all all your
daaaaaark moods,

VA29B005.Text:
Haaah, slippy slippery,
slippy slippery, slippy slippy
noodles on your slippy bald head!

VA29B006.Text:
Draw back a bow, and then let it
slip; take a stance like a crane
("achou!") and bloody their lip!

VA29B008.Text:
(Alright, did it! That should have
broken the ice... but no, everyone
is just staring at me...!!!)

VA29B011.Text:
Well. Anyway.
We can't conclude that she's the
perpetrator.

VA29B012.Text:
We should just each display due
caution.

VA29B014.Text:
As if we wouldn't have done that
regardless.

VA29B015.Text:
Yes, such words are irrelevant to
someone like me, who's always on
his guard.

VA29B016.Text:
(Well, it looks like the
conversation turned away from me.)

VA29B017.Text:
(My method wasn't very stylish,
but I guess it worked.)

VA30X001.Text:
Man, just after transferring,
I got caught up in some serious
stuff... [yawn]

VA30X002.Text:
Well, it's alright. At times like
this, it's best to just collapse
and go to sleep... hey, wait.

VA30X003.Text:
(I have no bed?
What am I supposed to do?)

VA30A003.Text:
...Actually, I have no bedding.
So, uh...

VA30A004.Text:
Oh, no problem.
Come sleep up here with me.

VA30A006.Text:
Your first day here was pretty
tough, huh?

VA30A008.Text:
It wasn't on my first day, but
it was kinda rough for me, too.

VA30A009.Text:
Suddenly getting thrown into the
duels, and the Rose Bride thing,
and the Sword of Dios...

VA30A011.Text:
Oh, the Dueling Game that you
told me about at lunch.

VA30A012.Text:
Yeah. In the forest behind the
school, there's a Dueling
Arena... that's where it happens.

VA30A014.Text:
Well, I guess after doing it a
few times, I'm starting to get
used to it.

VA30A015.Text:
Anyway, don't worry.
I believe that you're not the
Duelist.

VA30A017.Text:
You don't seem like a Duelist at
all. I believe in you.

VA30C001.Text:
(But I just made friends with
Utena today,)

VA30C002.Text:
(so asking to sleep with her would
be too rude.)

VA30C003.Text:
(No way around it... I guess I'll
just have to sleep by myself. At
least I have this soft blanket.)

VA30C005.Text:
(I'll just settle down...
The floor is kind of hard, but
I'll persevere!)

VA30C006.Text:
(Today was so tiring...
It was just one thing after
another...)

VA30C009.Text:
Chu-Chu.
You want to sleep with me?

VA30C011.Text:
Thanks, Chu-Chu!
Today was tough in lots of ways,
but I'll do my best.

VA30C014.Text:
Huh? You're saying not to worry,
because you'll protect me?

VA30C017.Text:
Because of you, Chu-Chu, I'll be
able to sleep well tonight!
In thanks... [smooch]!

VB01X002.Text:
(Although yesterday, I wasn't
able to ease in at my own
pace at all...)

VB01X003.Text:
(I need to properly experience
my classes, club activities,
and stuff!)

VB01X004.Text:
(The first thing is to start
actively talking to my
classmates.)

VB01X006.Text:
(Come to think of it, that Wakaba
girl said she knew the campus
really well.)

VB01X007.Text:
(Maybe I should ask her who the
interesting people are.)

VB01A001.Text:
(Home room's going to be starting
soon...
Should I chat with Utena, too?)

VB01B002.Text:
Hey, good morning.
Did you sleep well last night?
You had a rough day, after all.

VB01B003.Text:
I had a little trouble sleeping...
Oh, but, it's okay!

VB01B004.Text:
It's just that there are so many
things I want to do, like checking
out club activities, and shopping.

VB01B005.Text:
Oh, yeah? After school today, we
were going to go into town to do
a little shopping...
you wanna come with?

VB01B006.Text:
There's this cafe called
"Magnolia" where they make this
really delicious rose tea.

VB01C001.Text:
(Oh, it looks like the teacher is
coming. I guess we don't have time
to talk.)

VB01D002.Text:
Oh, good morning!
So what are your impressions of
Ohtori after your first day?

VB01D003.Text:
Well, I guess it's so gorgeous and
luxuriant that it's kind of
overwhelming.

VB01D004.Text:
I was pretty flustered at the
masquerade last night...

VB01D005.Text:
What? You seriously got invited to
the ball last night? That's so
cool! I wish I could've gone...

VB01D007.Text:
So, how was it?
Was there anyone who caught your
eye?

VB01D009.Text:
Don't play innocent!
The Student Council members were
there last night too, right?

VB01D010.Text:
There's no way a girl wouldn't
hanker after at least one of them,
right?

VB01D011.Text:
So who do you like? The Student
Council president, Touga? Or do
you prefer the younger Mickey?

VB01D013.Text:
Or, could it possibly be Juri-
oneesama!?

VB01E001.Text:
Yeah... I thought the Student
Council President, Kiryuu-senpai,
was pretty cool.

VB01E002.Text:
But, Utena said he's a playboy,
so I guess I'd have a lot of
competition...

VB01E003.Text: Yeah... but from what I hear,

VB01E004.Text:
Touga-senpai has recently taken a
liking to this music cafe called
"Lilac".

VB01E005.Text:
You might be able to meet him if
you go there.

VB01E006.Text:
After all, it would probably be
tough to get at him at school.

VB01E007.Text:
Thanks. "Lilac", huh?
I'll keep it in mind.

VB01F001.Text:
Definitely Mickey!
After all, boys his age are so
cute.

VB01F003.Text:
I know, right? Mickey's so cute!
But, you know...

VB01F004.Text:
What?
Is it something to do with Anthy?

VB01F005.Text:
Apparently, Mickey really likes
Himemiya Anthy.

VB01F006.Text:
Oh, yeah, I did get that
impression...

VB01F007.Text:
Well, Mickey really likes sweet
things, so maybe you should try
baking him a cake?

VB01F008.Text: You think it will be that easy...?

VB01G001.Text:
I thought Juri-san was pretty
nice.

VB01G002.Text:
Uh, I don't really mean that I'm
interested in that way, don't get
me wrong!

VB01G003.Text:
Sure, sure, I get it, I get it!
You admire her as a woman, right?

VB01G004.Text:
But, you know, there are some
scary rumors about her, too...

VB01G006.Text:
Like, they say that people who go
against her get expelled from the
school. Even teachers.

VB01G007.Text:
And they say that the popular
places in town are her personal
territory.

VB01H004.Text:
He seems like kind of an awkward
person, but that can be nice.

VB01H008.Text:
Just, he seems to like really
traditional Japanese things,

VB01H009.Text:
so maybe you should think in that
direction for presents and dates
and stuff.

VB01H010.Text:
Thanks!
I should keep that in mind.

VB01I001.Text:
I know you have dibs on her
already, but Utena's great, isn't
she? After all, she's so cool.

VB01I002.Text:
I know, right?
Well, if it's you, I'll let you be
her mistress.

VB01I003.Text: Aww... can't I be her legal wife?

VB01I004.Text:
No way, no way!
It's already been decided that
that's me.

VB01I005.Text:
Of course, Anthy is one of her
mistresses too, so you'll have to
share.

VB01J001.Text:
Yeah... there was someone I
noticed.

VB01J002.Text:
But since it was a masquerade,
I didn't hear their name.

VB01J003.Text:
Oh, I see...! Well, if you give me
a description, I'll try to help
you find them!

VB01J004.Text:
Thanks! But don't worry about
it... I'll be looking myself.

VB01J005.Text:
If I don't turn up anything,
I'll be sure to come to you for
help.

VB01J006.Text:
Sure, got it!
Just let me know, okay?

VB02A001.Text:
The bell has rung!
Everyone, get in your seats.

VB02A002.Text:
Just like yesterday, it seems
another new student will be
joining our class.

VB02B001.Text:
Hello.
My name is Sanjouin Chigusa.

VB02B002.Text:
In case you can't tell, my sex is
female.

VB02B003.Text:
I was sick for quite a while,
so I'm 3 years older than the rest
of you, but it's nice to meet you.

VB02B005.Text:
(And doesn't she resemble the
person I danced with at the
ball...?)

VB02B007.Text:
For your seat, let's see...
Why don't you sit behind Ishige,
there?

VB02B009.Text:
My eyes are a little weak, so if
it's possible, I'd appreciate if
I could sit one seat closer.

VB02B011.Text:
Oh, is that right?
In that case, Ishige,
please switch seats with Sanjouin.

VB02B013.Text:
(Wow, all the girls in the class
seem totally infatuated.)

VB02B014.Text:
(Huh? Ishige sat next to me...
So that means the seat she's
switching to is...)

VB02B016.Text:
G... good morning.
Sorry about yesterday.

VB02B019.Text:
Ah... isn't this our first time
meeting?

VB02B022.Text:
(But I'm sure I met her yesterday
at the fencing hall...)

VB04X001.Text:
(Man, I just transferred here
yesterday, but I've already been
totally overshadowed.)

VB04X002.Text:
(Of course, I'm staring just like
everyone else. Here goes!)

VB04A002.Text:
I just transferred here yesterday,
too. Let's be friends, okay?

VB04A004.Text:
(Huh? But the first thing she did
was call me by my name...)

VB04A006.Text:
That's a nice name. Who gave it to
you? Your father? Or was it your
mother?

VB04B004.Text:
Huh?
Do you know my father, Chigusa-
san?

VB04B005.Text:
Of course not - don't be foolish.
It was just polite conversation.

VB04C003.Text:
You mother is still alive,
isn't she?

VB04C005.Text:
Oh, excuse me.
It's just that my mother died long
ago, so...

VB04C006.Text:
Oh.
I was a little surprised.

VB04C008.Text: I'll make it up to you soon.

VB04C012.Text:
(What was with that really scary
look?)

VB06X001.Text:
(It's lunchtime...
I wonder where I should go?)

VB06X003.Text:
(But come to think of it, Utena
said she and the others would be
eating outside today.)

VB06A001.Text:
Hey, Utena.
You said you were eating outside
today, right?

VB06A003.Text:
Hehe... I thought you'd make that
offer.

VB06A004.Text:
Thanks, I'd love to come.
I'm honored by your invitation!

VB06B001.Text:
(Alright, I'll go check out the
cafeteria.)

VB06B002.Text:
(Yesterday, I even got to take
some leftovers home...)

VB07X001.Text:
(Wow, there sure are a lot of
people over there.
What's going on...?)

VB07X003.Text:
(Woah, Chigusa-san is so popular.
I guess it makes sense, though.)

VB07X004.Text:
(She's so cool, and good in class,
too.)

VB07X005.Text:
(I guess if it hadn't been for all
that stuff before, I'd also...)

VB07X006.Text:
(Anyway, eating lunch by myself
would be pretty lonely.)

VB07X007.Text:
(I'd like to eat with someone if
I can...)

VB08X001.Text:
(Okay! Looks like I have a lot of
competition, but I'll try to eat
with Chigusa. There are things
I want to ask her about, too...)

VB08X003.Text:
Chigusa-san.
Do you want to eat together?

VB08X005.Text:
(You don't have to look so
surprised...)

VB08X006.Text:
...
Sorry, everyone. Today, I'm going
to be eating with this girl.

VB08X007.Text:
Um, you're really popular,
aren't you...?

VB08X008.Text:
Well, I have lived for three years
longer than everyone else,

VB08X009.Text:
so I can do a lot more things.
I suppose it's only natural.

VB08X010.Text:
Even in three years, I doubt
I'll measure up to you.

VB08X011.Text: And you do fencing, too, right?

VB08X012.Text:
I mean, I saw you at the fencing
hall yesterday...

VB08X013.Text:
You were saying that this morning,
as well.

VB08X014.Text:
But like I said then, I think you
have the wrong person.

VB08X015.Text:
B-but, you knew my name without
me telling you, and...

VB08X016.Text: It was written on your notebook.

VB08X018.Text:
(That's right...
I had my notebook out at the
time...)

VB08X019.Text:
Anyway, about you... what kind of
club activities do you do?
Do you fence?

VB08X020.Text:
No, not at all.
Though apparently my parents used
to.

VB08X023.Text:
my father even lent me his saber,
and told me to try it out.

VB08X026.Text:
Is that so. Your father's saber.
Really...

VB11X002.Text:
Really!
They're truly the ideal conditions
for a picnic.

VB11X003.Text:
"The ideal conditions for a
picnic"...That's some pretty fancy
Japanese.

VB11X004.Text:
But that's really how it feels. Of
course, I don't have a lunchbox,
just some bread and snacks.

VB11X005.Text:
Woah, what an awesome lunchbox!
It has three levels!
Amazing.

VB11X008.Text:
Really? Anthy, you're a really
domestic girl, huh?

VB11X010.Text:
You should probably wait to admire
it until you see what's inside.

VB11X012.Text: Well, open it up and see.

VB11X013.Text: Is it okay if I open it, Anthy?

VB11X015.Text:
Let's see, the first dish is...
taiyaki? Fish-shaped cakes?

VB11X017.Text:
Uh, and the next dish is...
candied apricots?

VB11X019.Text: So the last dish must be...

VB11X020.Text:
Hey, aren't those sauce rice
crackers?
Man, that takes me back!

VB11X021.Text:
They taste very good, don't they?
I have plum sauce, as well.

VB11X022.Text:
(What the heck? There's nothing
even remotely lunch-like in this
lunchbox.)

VB11X023.Text:
Come to think of it, what about
your lunchbox? I don't see it...
did you forget it?

VB11X025.Text:
If you'd like, feel free to eat
from mine.

VB11A001.Text:
Well then, I guess I'll have some
of yours.

VB11A003.Text:
Are you sure? Those dishes might
be pretty rough on someone who's
not used to them...

VB11A004.Text:
No worries!
I like this kind of festival food.
Thanks for sharing, Anthy!

VB11B001.Text:
Thanks for the offer, but I'm
fine. I was thinking I'd go on a
diet.

VB11B003.Text:
Well, if that's what you really
want...

VB11B004.Text:
Don't worry about me, go ahead
and eat!

VB11B005.Text: Really? Okay, then, let's dig in!

VB11B006.Text:
(I said I'd pass, but...
I'm so hungry!)

VB11B008.Text:
My, Chu-Chu!
That banana looks delicious.

VB11B010.Text:
(You know, Chu-Chu can't tell on
me...)

VB11B011.Text:
(And he's just an animal!
I should be able to trick it off
of him somehow.)

VB11B012.Text:
(Sorry, Chu-Chu... You just had
the bad luck to catch the eye of a
member of a superior species!)

VB11B017.Text:
Strange, she was here just a
moment ago.

VB11B020.Text:
(Dammit, Chu-Chu!
Couldn't you have just let me have
it...?)

VB12X001.Text:
And for the next question...
Sanjouin.

VB12X005.Text:
So for this problem,
you expand it like this...

VB12X006.Text:
%F, if you add
this part and this part, what's
the sum? Please tell us.

VB12X008.Text:
(What should I do?
I think it's "a+18", but I'm not
sure...)

VB12X010.Text:
(If I mess up here, they're all
going to laugh. They'll see the
huge gap between Chigusa and me.)

VB12X011.Text:
(What should I do,
What should I do...!?)

VB12X013.Text:
(That voice just now...
was it Chigusa-san?
Did she just tell me the answer?)

VB12A002.Text:
"38?"
Didn't you hear Sanjouin's answer
a moment ago?

VB12A003.Text:
We're adding to "a+3", so
where did the "a" disappear to?

VB12A004.Text:
Did you not have math class at
your last school?

VB12A005.Text:
(It was wrong!?
But I just repeated what
Chigusa-san told me...)

VB12A007.Text:
(Chigusa-san isn't reacting...
Was it just my imagination?)

VB12A011.Text:
(But I was sure I heard
Chigusa-san's voice...)

VB12B002.Text:
Correct.
Eveyone, looks like our new
students are quite impressive!

VB12B003.Text: Try your best not to fall behind!

VB12B004.Text:
(I'm glad... my first thought was
right after all.)

VB12B005.Text:
(Uh, Chigusa-san is giving me a
pretty hard stare...)

VB12B006.Text:
(Why?
Because I didn't use the answer
she gave me?)

VB13X001.Text:
(Ah, it's finally over...
Ohtori Academy's classes are also
pretty high-level.)

VB13X002.Text:
(Now, I should make the rounds and
check out the clubs right away.)

VF01B001.Text:
(Juri-senpai invited me and all,
so I guess I'll check out the
Fencing Club.)

VF01C001.Text:
(Miki-kun invited me and all,
so I guess I'll check out the
Fencing Club.)

VF01D001.Text:
(I guess I'll check out the
Fencing Club.)

VF01E001.Text:
(I think I'll go see the Kendo
Club.)

VF01E002.Text:
(Weren't Touga-senpai and Saionji-
san both in it...?)

VF01F001.Text:
(Sports clubs seem like they'd be
really hard. I guess I'll go visit
a more cultural one.)

VF02A002.Text:
(But when I came here yesterday,
the chalk-white fencing hall was
here...)

VF02A003.Text:
(What on earth did I see
yesterday?)

VF02A004.Text:
(My dad and the Chairman both
talked about it...)

VF02A005.Text:
(Was I just imagining things...?
Was all that stuff with
Chigusa-san just a dream, too...?)

VF02B001.Text:
(I asked around, and... apparently
this is the real fencing hall?)

VF02B004.Text:
Um... would this happen to be the
fencing hall?

VF02B006.Text:
(Maybe I misunderstood.
About the chalk-white fencing
hall, and meeting Chigusa-san...)

VF02B007.Text:
Are you just visiting?
Or did you want to join?

VF02B008.Text:
Oh, um...
I thought I'd just come and watch.

VF02B010.Text:
You're...
the new student who just moved
into the East Dorm?

VF02B012.Text:
Do you have any interest in
fencing?

VF02B013.Text:
Yes.
Because my parents used to do it.

VF02B014.Text:
Hmm...
Hey! Get this girl a suit and a
saber!

VF02B016.Text:
Trying it out for real is the
fastest way to learn.

VF02B017.Text:
Go ahead and choose a partner.
Of course, feel free to choose me,
as well.

VF02B018.Text:
(...she said to choose someone,
but who?)

VF02C001.Text:
Okay... would you please teach me,
Juri-senpai?

VF02C002.Text:
(Ah... just now, it looked like
she smiled a little.)

VF02D001.Text:
Okay, could I practice with
Miki-kun?

VF02D002.Text:
Sure. Hey, Mickey.
You've been called out.
Come be her partner.

VF02E001.Text:
Oh, um...
I just wanted to watch today...
So...

VF02E002.Text:
I see.
Well, I won't force you.

VF02E003.Text:
(Arisugawa Juri-san...
She seems kind of strict.)

VF03X001.Text:
(Wow, there's so many people...
Even the doorway is crowded.
What's going on here?)

VF03X002.Text:
Hey, what's happening here?
I just came to check out the club,
but...

VF03X003.Text:
Well, you see... the captain,
Saionji-sama,

VF03X004.Text:
has been challenged by this girl
Sanjouin who just transferred here
today!

VF03X005.Text:
And this Sanjouin person is also
totally beautiful!

VF03X006.Text:
Oh, who should I cheer for...?
It's painful!

VF03X008.Text: Excuse me, please let me through!

VF03X009.Text:
Excuse me, let me through, please,
please move!

VF03X010.Text:
(Saionji-san's doing kendo,
but Chigusa-san's in a fencing
stance...)

VF03X012.Text:
(Amazing. Even from here, I can
feel how tense the atmosphere
is.)

VF03X014.Text:
What are those two doing?
They're just standing there
glaring at each other.

VF03X017.Text:
Amazing!
This new person is amazing!
I've become a total fan!

VF03X018.Text:
(Saionji-san really lost!
Sanjouin Chigusa... what kind of
person are you?)

VF03X019.Text:
She's coming over here!
She's even more beautiful from up
close!

VF03A001.Text:
Chigusa-san, you're incredible...
Beating Saionji-san like that.

VF03A002.Text:
Hmph.
This was merely the first step.

VF03A004.Text:
(The first step...
What did she mean by that?)

VF03B003.Text:
It's swollen... you should cool it
off right away. Senpai, let's go
to the nurse's office.

VF03B004.Text:
Thanks for your concern.
But it's unwarranted.

VF04X002.Text:
The captain, Saionji-sama, has
been challenged by that girl,
Sanjouin!

VF04X004.Text:
She's also totally beautiful...
I can't make up my mind who to
root for.

VF04X008.Text:
What are those two doing?
They're just standing there
glaring at each other.

VF04X012.Text:
Amazing!
This new person is amazing!
I've become a total fan!

VF04X013.Text:
(Saionji-san really lost!
Sanjouin Chigusa... what kind of
person are you?)

VF04X014.Text:
She's coming over here!
She's even more beautiful from up
close!

VF05X001.Text:
Well?
Are you ready to give in?

VF05X002.Text:
(Just like Juri-senpai's saying,
I'm pretty much at my limit.
But...)

VF06X001.Text:
(I can't even touch him.
Is Miki-kun really good, or am I
just bad at this...?)

VF06X002.Text:
(But I'm not going to give up just
like that. I'll attack him with
everything I've got!)

VF06X004.Text:
Are you alright!?
Sorry, I really...

VF06X007.Text:
For just a moment, you really went
all-out.

VF06X009.Text:
Just as I'd expect from you,
Miki-kun!
You're really good.

VF06X010.Text:
I wonder if I could get as good
as you.

VF06X011.Text:
I'm sure you can.
Your last attack there made me
shiver a little.

VF06X016.Text:
Are you really okay?
Your foot looks a little swollen.

VF06X019.Text:
Captain, it looks like she hurt
her foot, so I'm going to take her
to the nurse's office.

VF06X022.Text:
...Actually, it looks like it
would be tough for you to walk
in your condition.

VF06X023.Text:
No, don't worry about it.
I'll be fine.

VF06X024.Text:
You shouldn't put any more stress
on it. %F-san, excuse me.
Upsy-daisy!

VF06X026.Text:
(H, hey now...
suddenly carrying me on his back
like this is kind of...)

VF06X028.Text:
(He looks really slender, but he
is a boy, after all.)

VF07X002.Text:
They say your skills are unsur-
passed at the high school level.
I'd like to test them myself.

VF07X003.Text:
You must be Sanjouin Chigusa, the
new transfer student who's both
brilliant in school and talented
at sports.

VF07X004.Text:
Just as expected from Arisugawa
Juri-kun.
News reaches your ears fast.

VF07X005.Text:
Of course, I'm deeply interested
in having a match against you.
But I'm afraid I have to decline.

VF07X007.Text:
It's forbidden to act out personal
conflicts through fencing.

VF07X008.Text:
As the captain, I can't violate
that rule.

VF07X009.Text:
Oh...? Those hardly sound like the
words of a Duelist.

VF07X011.Text:
Well, fine. It doesn't have to be
right now.

VF07X012.Text:
It doesn't matter when.
It's not going to happen.

VF07X013.Text:
Oh, I'm sure you'll become more
receptive towards my challenge.

VF07X015.Text:
So this is Arisugawa Juri,
who they say has the head of any
teacher that opposes her?

VF07X017.Text:
Who knows? You can accept my
challenge any time in the next 24
hours. Ha ha ha...!

VF08X001.Text:
Ahh, we're finally done.
This is pretty intense stuff.

VF08X004.Text:
You should probably take a shower.
I'll show you where they are.

VF08X005.Text: All right. Thank you very much.

VF08X006.Text:
(What an amazing body... She's
slender, glamorous... I'm a woman,
too, but I'm still fascinated.)

VF08A001.Text:
I was just wondering why you
wanted the Power to Revolutionize
the World.

VF08A002.Text: To disprove the power of miracles.

VF08A004.Text:
"Believe in miracles, and your
dreams will come true..."

VF08A006.Text: It has nothing to do with you.

VF08A007.Text:
(That locket that Chigusa-san had
earlier was definitely Juri's.)

VF08A008.Text:
(It must be really important to
her...)

VF08B001.Text:
Um, that locket that Chigusa-san
had earlier...
It was yours, right?

VF08B003.Text:
Does it have a picture of your
lover in it?
Or...

VF08B004.Text: It has nothing to do with you.

VF08B005.Text:
(What's wrong, Juri-san?
Before Chigusa-san came, you
seemed completely different...)

VF08B006.Text:
(What kind of meaning does that
locket have to you...?)

VF12X001.Text:
Okay, it's fine.
You can just leave me off here.

VF12X002.Text:
No, I'll take you the whole way.
We want to take care of that
injury, after all.

VF12A001.Text:
It looks like the nurse isn't
here.

VF12A002.Text:
Apparently, but don't worry.
If it's just a sprain, I should be
able to treat it.

VF12A003.Text:
Thanks.
Seriously, Miki-kun, thank you
very...

VF12A006.Text:
Just because we're alone doesn't
mean you can come at me like a dog
in heat.

VF12A007.Text:
Man, what the hell?
A girl like you is calling it off
now?

VF12A008.Text:
You're such a weirdo, the way you
always go "big brother, big
brother"?

VF12A009.Text:
Getting so worked up just because
things don't go the way you
want... you're a disgrace.
This is why I hate children.

VF12A011.Text:
(Her blouse is all disheveled!
How embarrassing...
Huh?)

VF12A013.Text:
(I mean, she looks like a girl,
but if they switched clothes,
they'd be indistinguishable.)

VF12A014.Text:
(Yeah... I guess Miki-kun is
really cute, just like a girl!)

VF12A016.Text:
Kozue!?
What are you doing here...?

VF12A017.Text: It's none of your business, Miki.

VF12A018.Text:
I hear you haven't been coming to
class much recently. A teacher
warned me about it the other day.

VF12A019.Text:
You're with a girl?
Not bad, Miki.

VF12A021.Text:
It looks like I'm getting in the
way, so I'll take off.
Take your time.

VF12A023.Text:
(Man, this is awkward... I've got
to say something to break the
tension.)

VF12A025.Text:
Oh... my younger twin sister,
Kozue.

VF12A026.Text:
Twins...
I thought you looked a lot alike.

VF12A027.Text:
I'm sorry.
My sister was so rude.

VF12A028.Text:
No problem. But though you might
look similar, your personalities
are really different, huh?

VF12A029.Text:
She didn't used to be this
difficult.
But before I knew it...

VF12A031.Text:
W-well, she's probably going
through a rebellious phase.

VF12A032.Text:
I also had a period where I
randomly lashed out at the people
around me.

VF12A033.Text:
I'd come home late for no reason,
and make my parents worry.
I was so young then...

VF12A036.Text:
"I was so young then", you say...
but senpai, aren't you only
fourteen
years old?

VF12A037.Text:
Well, I'm still a year older than
you, Miki-kun.

VF12A038.Text:
So you should listen to your big
sis.

VF14X001.Text:
Umm, excuse me, I'm just here to
visit...

VF14X002.Text:
Well, there's a lot of stuff
posted on that wall. Go ahead and
take a look.

VF14X003.Text:
That's the newspaper that we
produce.

VF14X006.Text:
Um, excuse me.
So in addition to the chalk-white
fencing hall,

VF14X008.Text:
"Chalk-white fencing hall?"
Our fencing hall isn't white.

VF14X010.Text:
The old fencing hall is that
ruined building near the East
Dorm.

VF14X012.Text:
Yeah. That's the old fencing hall.
Apparently it used to be really
pretty.

VF14X014.Text:
Right. Apparently it burned down
in a fire fifteen years ago.

VF14X016.Text:
There wasn't enough information,
so they still don't know. If we
found out the details, we'd
definitely write an article.

VF14X017.Text:
President, please hurry up.
Aren't you finished yet?
You're just standing there.

VF14X019.Text:
(A fire fifteen years ago...
Ruins...
So, what was it that I saw!?)

VF15X001.Text:
Umm, excuse me, I'm just here to
visit...

VF15X002.Text:
Well, there's a lot of stuff
posted on that wall. Go ahead and
take a look.

VF15X003.Text:
That's the newspaper that we
produce.

VF15X005.Text:
(The "old fencing hall"...
Is that the chalk-white one that
my dad talked about?)

VF15X007.Text:
Hmm? Oh, we haven't finished
writing that one yet. We couldn't
get enough information.

VF15X008.Text:
Oh, really?
What's this "old fencing hall" it
mentions?

VF15X009.Text:
Oh, that's the ruined building
near the East Dorm.

VF15X010.Text:
In the past,
it was a fencing hall.

VF15X011.Text:
They say it used to be a really
pretty building, with chalk-white
walls.

VF15X014.Text: It burned down fifteen years ago.

VF15X016.Text:
Like I said, we don't have enough
information.

VF15X017.Text:
If we found out the details, we'd
definitely write an article on it.

VF15X018.Text:
President, please hurry up.
Aren't you finished yet?
You're just standing there.

VF19X001.Text:
(I've come to such a classy
school...)

VF19X002.Text:
(Now that I'm here, I want to try
to become a well-cultured girl!)

VF19X004.Text:
(I wonder if this is what the
National Diet Library is like...
Not that I've ever been there...)

VF19X005.Text:
(I've heard that the activities
take place in this reference room
on the materials side...)

VF19X007.Text:
I'm sorry!
Are you all right?

VF19X011.Text:
I'm sorry!
You dropped your books.
Here, let me help...

VF19X014.Text:
(Chigusa-san, what are you going
to do with a fifteen year-old list
of students?)

VF19X015.Text:
...So, what are you doing in a
tedious place like this?

VF19X016.Text:
I thought I'd come visit the
literature club.

VF19X017.Text:
Ah, that's a shame. The literature
club is here, but they're not open
to visitors right now.

VF19X019.Text:
Every month, they put out a club
bulletin.

VF19X020.Text:
From the 25th onward, everyone's
very busy working on their
respective manuscripts.

VF19X022.Text:
Now then, I have things to look
up, so... goodbye.

VF19X024.Text:
(Chigusa-san just got here today,
but she seems so familiar with
everything...)

VF19X025.Text:
(Oh, but she went to school here
until three years ago.
Of course.)

VF19X026.Text:
(Still, I wonder what kind of
sickness she had...?)

VB14A001.Text:
(Well, I wasn't able to visit all
the clubs,)

VB14A003.Text:
(I have gym class tomorrow, so
I need to buy some exercise
clothes.)

VB14A005.Text:
(I guess I need someone to show
me...)

VB14A007.Text:
(Chigusa-san also just came here,
so surely she's going to need some
gym clothes too.)

VB14A008.Text:
(And since she lived here before,
she's got to know where the store
is.)

VB14B003.Text:
Oh, it's you.
What is it?

VB14B004.Text:
Oh, um... We have gym class
tomorrow, right?

VB14B005.Text:
I thought that maybe we could go
together to buy exercise clothes
and towels and stuff.

VB14B007.Text:
Well, because I don't know where
the sporting goods store is,

VB14B008.Text:
and if you used to live here,
you must know the layout of the
town, right?

VB14B009.Text:
And since it's been three years,
I thought you might not be
prepared for gym class either.

VF26A001.Text:
Ah, here it is.
It's a pretty big place, huh?

VF26A002.Text:
Hmm, you're right...
It wasn't always such a big store,
though.

VF26A003.Text:
Yeah... unlike me, you lived here
for a long time, right?

VF26A005.Text:
(Her eyes are so far away...
Chigusa-san's such a mysterious
person.)

VF26A006.Text:
(Even though she came shopping
with me like this...)

VF26A007.Text:
(I don't know a single thing about
her.)

VF26A008.Text:
(Does she have siblings?
What illness did she have?)

VF26A009.Text:
(What hobbies does she have?
Does she have a boyfriend?)

VF26A010.Text:
(I want to ask her more questions.
I want to talk with her...)

VF26B001.Text:
Hey, Chigusa-san...
You took a break from school
because of illness, right?

VF26B002.Text:
Is it okay if I ask what kind of
illness it was?

VF26B004.Text:
(By "here" she means...
her chest?
Is she talking about her heart?)

VF26B008.Text:
You could say I ended up eating
the poisoned apple that Snow White
was supposed to eat instead.

VF26B009.Text:
(What does that mean? I wonder if
she means she doesn't want to talk
about it... It might be best not
to pry too deeply.)

VF26C001.Text:
Umm... please listen and don't get
upset, okay?

VF26C003.Text:
Chigusa-san, do you... have, like,
a girlfriend or anything?

VF26C005.Text: Ah, I'm, I'm sorry! I just...

VF26C008.Text:
There have been a lot of misunder-
standings with my appearance, but
I like regular boys.

VF26C012.Text:
(Chigusa-san looks boyish, but
she's a girl.)

VF26D001.Text:
Chigusa-san, do you have a
boyfriend or anything?

VF26D004.Text: I'm often told I look like a boy.

VF26D005.Text:
I don't mean to boast, but I
receive a lot of love letters.

VF26D006.Text:
However, I've never gotten even
one from a boy.

VF26D009.Text:
(Chigusa-san... I wonder if it
bothers her a lot? I might've
asked her something bad...)

VF26E001.Text:
Thanks for coming shopping with
me.

VF26E002.Text:
Not at all, it was my pleasure.
Then, I'll be taking off here.

VF26E003.Text:
(What should I do?
I want to walk around town with
her for a little longer, but...)

VF26F001.Text:
Um, could we walk together a
little longer?

VF26F003.Text:
Only a little.
Long enough for a walk in the
park.

VF26G001.Text:
All right.
I'll see you at school, then.

VF26G003.Text:
(Even though we only went shopping
together,)

VF26G004.Text:
(her fangirls might want to murder
me.)

VF26G005.Text:
(Yeah, I shouldn't be too greedy.
Plus, I'll see her at school again
tomorrow...)

VF32X001.Text: This park is pretty big, isn't it?

VF32X002.Text: It's the biggest park in the city.

VF32X003.Text:
And it's in a nice central
position. It's a pretty standard
date spot.

VF32X004.Text:
Chigusa, have you had dates here,
too?

VF32X005.Text: No, today will be my first.

VF32X007.Text:
("Today..."
Does she mean that walking with me
like this is a date?)

VF32X009.Text:
Do you have someone you like?
Someone you invite on dates,
and such.

VF32A001.Text:
No, there isn't anyone.
I only just transferred in, after
all...

VF32A002.Text:
I see. I don't think time has
anything to do with falling in
love, though.

VF32A003.Text:
(Hmm... maybe Chigusa-san has
experienced love at first sight.)

VF32A004.Text:
(Somehow she doesn't really seem
like the type, but...)

VF32B001.Text:
I wouldn't necessarily say I like
them, but... there is someone I've
noticed.

VF32B002.Text:
Hmm. Is it, by any chance, the
Student Council President?

VF32B005.Text:
I just thought that the athletic
Student Council President

VF32B009.Text:
(Come to think of it, Chigusa-san
was at this school three years
ago, right?)

VF32B010.Text:
(Doesn't that mean she was
Touga-san's classmate?)

VF33X001.Text:
(Well, I'm done shopping, so what
should I do now?)

VF33X002.Text:
I'm tired of just walking around,
so I should go into one of the
stores. Hmm, where should I go?

VF34A002.Text:
(It looks like a pretty upscale
place, so I'll just go in for some
tea.)

VF34A004.Text:
Hey, what a coincidence meeting
you in a place like this.

VF34A005.Text:
Well, I only came to buy my gym
clothes for P.E. class tomorrow,
but...

VF34A006.Text:
I ended up running into you,
Utena.

VF34A007.Text:
This place makes really good rose
tea, so I've taken a liking to it.

VF34A009.Text:
Welcome.
May I take your order?

VF34B001.Text:
Well, I guess I'll go for the rose
tea, too.

VF34B004.Text:
The flavor isn't too strong, and
it isn't too sweet, and don't you
think it feels kind of noble?

VF34B005.Text:
Hee hee...
that sounds so like you, Utena.

VF35A001.Text:
(Clasical music cafe "Lilac"...
 Yeah, it's nice to have
tea in a quiet place sometimes.)

VF35A003.Text:
Hey. What a wonderful coincidence,
that we would happen to meet in
this one shop in the wide city.

VF35A005.Text: This is a shop I often frequent.

VF35A006.Text:
I like drinking tea while
listening to classical music.

VF35A007.Text:
Is that right? So you like
classical music, Touga-san?

VF35A008.Text: Did you come to listen to it, too?

VF35A009.Text:
Or was it simply fate that brought
us together here?

VF35B002.Text:
There wasn't a "classical music
cafe" in my hometown, so I figured
I'd give it a try.

VF35B004.Text:
Don't you think that you and I
would make a good couple?

VF35B005.Text: Uh, well, I don't know if I...

VF35B006.Text:
Well, well. All the boys around
you seem to have all been blind,

VF35B007.Text: to not have noticed your charms.

VF35B010.Text:
Look into my eyes. I'm so drawn in
by your gravity that I can't look
at anything else.

VF35B012.Text:
Hey, you!
What are you doing with Touga!?

VF35B013.Text:
Huh? I, uh, I'm not really...
Ah, excuse me!

VF35B014.Text:
Ahh, hold up, you--hold it right
there!

VF35B015.Text:
[Huff, huff, huff...]
I wasn't doing anything wrong, but
I ran away without thinking...

VF35B016.Text: Haa, my heart is still pounding...

VF35C001.Text:
I had a feeling I might be able to
meet you if I came here...

VF35C002.Text:
It makes me happy to hear that.
Perhaps it's a destiny arranged by
the goddess of love.

VF35C004.Text:
Yes, destiny.
That you and I should become
one...

VF35C006.Text:
Hold it, Touga.
Who is that girl!?

VF35C008.Text:
You said to meet you here at 5
o'clock... But you didn't say
anything about this!

VF35C009.Text:
What are you saying? She's no one
in particular.

VF35C010.Text:
She comes to this shop sometimes
because she likes classical music.

VF35C011.Text:
Hey, you, is that true?
If you're lying to me, you're
gonna pay.

VF35C012.Text:
Oh, uh, yes.
I come here because I like
classical music...

VF35C013.Text:
There, just as I told you. You're
so silly, doubting my love for
you.

VF35C014.Text:
I'm sorry, Touga.
I just got so upset...

VF35C015.Text:
It's fine. It just shows that
you're thinking about me, right?

VF35C018.Text:
(But I wonder if the thing about
being fated together might be
true...?
For some reason, my heart is
pounding...)

VF36X001.Text:
(The game center here has a
fighting game installed that's
super-popular right now.)

VF36X002.Text: (Let's try it out for a bit.)

VF36X006.Text:
Are you playing that game that's
so popular these days?
Do you come to play often?

VF36X008.Text:
This is a two-player fighting
game, right? How many people in a
row have you beaten so far?

VF36X009.Text:
The one I'm fighting right now is
the 49th.

VF36X012.Text:
A-amazing, she trounced 49 people
in a row...

VF36X013.Text:
The challenger seat is open.
Will you have a try too?

VF36A002.Text:
I'll stick with the golden-haired
woman. You're going with... oho,
the ninja, eh?

VF36A003.Text:
Here I go... FIGHT! Take that!
Punch, punch, crouch and kick!

VF36A005.Text:
Huh? It missed. In that case, how
about my punch + guard!

VF36A008.Text:
Argh, the golden-haired woman's
hitting me with a combo mooove!

VF36A010.Text:
Aaugh... I lost...
Juri, you're good.

VF36A011.Text:
There's no way I would lose to you
when you call out your moves
before you attack.

VF36A012.Text:
Huh? Oh, right. I got so into it,
I suddenly started shouting...

VF36A013.Text:
It was quite fun, so no matter.
Let's face off again. Until then,
stack up training sessions.

VF37A001.Text:
(All right, let's head to the cake
shop. It looks like I can drink
some tea in this store, too.)

VF37A003.Text:
Oh, I'll introduce you. This is my
younger twin sister, Kozue. This
girl transferred in yesterday.

VF37A004.Text:
Yeah, that transfer student who
moved into East Dorm. I've heard
of her.

VF37A005.Text:
(Twins, huh... They sure do look
alike. But their personalities
seem kinda different.)

VF37A006.Text:
Welcome. Um, where shall you be
sitting...?

VF37B001.Text:
Oh, I'll take that seat over
there. See you later, Miki-kun.

VF37B002.Text:
Huh? Aren't you going to eat with
us?

VF37B003.Text:
What's wrong with that, Miki? She
said that she's going to eat over
there.

VF37B004.Text:
Yeah, I'm going to eat by myself
over there.

VF37B005.Text:
I see. Ah, if you like, please try
out the Napoleon pie.

VF37C001.Text:
Excuse me, could you
bring my order over here?

VF37C002.Text: Who told you you could sit here?

VF37C005.Text:
But this cake shop is where we eat
cake together alone.

VF37C008.Text: Excuse me, what will you do?

VF37C009.Text:
Um... In that case, please seat me
over there.

VF37C011.Text:
No, it's okay. I'm the one who's
sorry, for ignoring what's going
on with you and Kozue-chan.

VF37D001.Text:
(All right, let's head to the cake
shop. It looks like I can drink
some tea in this store, too.)

VF37D004.Text:
Kozue, you shouldn't take that
tone to an upperclassman.

VF37D006.Text:
(It looks like she completely
hates me for some reason.)

VF37D007.Text:
(I'm sure she must think I'm some
troublesome insect stuck to her
big brother.)

VF37D008.Text:
Welcome. Um, where shall you be
sitting...?

VF38A002.Text:
(A place like this is nice once in
a while. Although I'm not sure if
they'll have coffee or stuff.)

VF38A004.Text: Oh, it's you. Why are you here?

VF38A005.Text:
"Why am I here?"
Uh, I came to drink tea...

VF38A006.Text:
Oho. You're young, but you have
some good taste, don't
you?

VF38A007.Text:
Honestly. Everyone always says
they're crazy about Western-style
tea.

VF38A008.Text:
Why don't they understand how good
Japanese tea is...?

VF38B001.Text:
Yeah, you're right...
For Japanese people, it's gotta
be Japanese tea, right?

VF38B002.Text:
It has vitamins, and it tastes
good even if you don't add extra
stuff like milk and sugar.

VF38B003.Text: Japanese tea is best after all.

VF38B004.Text:
I see... so you understand, too?
I'm happy to hear it.

VF38B005.Text:
(Kendo, Japanese tea...
Saionji-san really likes his
Japanese-style stuff, huh?)

VF38C001.Text:
Japanese tea's good too, but
rooibos tea is really great.

VF38C002.Text:
That South African smell is just
like, 'ahhhh!'

VF38C004.Text:
You're quite right. I would also
like to drink rooibos tea,

VF38C005.Text:
but unfortunately, there are no
stores around that carry it.

VF38C006.Text:
Ahh, I am truly happy that I have
someone like you here.

VF38C007.Text:
So, you like Rooibos tea, too...
I see, I see!

VF38C009.Text:
(Instead of a lover of Japanese
things, it might be more accurate
to call him a plain old weirdo...)

VF39O001.Text:
(Well, I'll be living here for
quite a while.)

VF39O002.Text:
(I guess I don't need to rush
around and see everything today...
Huh?)

VF39O003.Text:
Oh, Chigusa-san...
What're you up to in a place like
this?

VF39O006.Text:
Sanjouin-san, sorry to keep
you waiting.

VF39O007.Text:
(She's an Ohtori student.
She kinda looks like Miki-kun...)

VF39O009.Text:
Ah, I told you about her. She's
that transfer student who moved
into the East Dorm.

VF39O012.Text:
Kaoru Kozue.
First year, Middle School.

VF39O014.Text:
Correct. She's Kaoru Miki-kun's
younger twin sister.

VF39O015.Text:
(Huhhh, no wonder they look alike,
then.)

VF39O016.Text:
(But, I wonder why she and Chigusa
-san are meeting?)

VF39O017.Text: Is this a date, by any chance?

VF39O018.Text:
That's right. I'm going on a date
with another girl...
Got a problem with that?

VF39O020.Text:
And what about you?
Do you not have your own prince
to escort you?

VF39P002.Text:
I see. Well, since you just
transferred here, I guess it can't
be helped.

VF39P003.Text:
I'm sure that soon, one will
appear before you, as well.

VF39P004.Text: A prince on a white horse.

VF39P005.Text:
(My prince...
I wonder who on earth that might
be?)

VF39Q001.Text:
It's not like I don't have one,
but today by chance, um...

VF39Q003.Text:
I-it's true! We were together
until just a bit ago.

VF39Q004.Text:
Hmm? Even though you just
transferred here yesterday?

VF39Q005.Text:
You act like you know nothing, but
so shrewdly find yourself a
Prince. You're her spitting image.

VF39Q007.Text:
Let's go, Kozue-kun.
Our time is limited.

VF39Q009.Text:
(What did she mean? When she said
"spitting image," who was she
comparing me to...?)

VF39B001.Text:
(Well, I'll be living here for
quite a while.)

VF39B002.Text:
(I guess I don't need to rush
around and see everything today...
Huh?)

VF39B003.Text:
Oh, Chigusa-san...
What're you up to in a place like
this?

VF39B006.Text:
Sanjouin-san, sorry to keep
you waiting.
Oh, it's you...?

VF39B007.Text:
Oh, hello.
Earlier, we... um...
nice to meet you.

VF39B008.Text:
Oh, are you two already
acquainted?

VF39B009.Text:
I don't know if I'd go that far,
but...

VF39B010.Text:
This afternoon, we met just
briefly...

VF39B012.Text:
By the way, do you not have your
own prince to escort you?

VB15X001.Text:
I wonder, I wonder,
do you know what I wonder?

VB15X002.Text:
When you hear "class trip",
you think... mountains, the ocean,
and amusement parks!

VB15X004.Text:
I told you, I caught a cold
and couldn't go on that one.

VB15X005.Text:
Anyway, listen!
The year after that, we went
hiking on a mountain, right?

VB15X007.Text:
But then, but then...
when we got to the top and opened
our backpacks, surprise!

VB15X008.Text:
I'd forgotten my box lunch, the
thing we look forward to most on a
trip!

VB15X010.Text:
So I thought, darn, I'll have to
go to everyone else, and try to
gather up a little from each!

VB15X011.Text: You know, score myself a lunch!

VB15X012.Text:
"Please give generously to poor,
foolish me!"

VB15X014.Text:
Actually, there was another girl
who'd forgotten her lunch,
just like me.

VB15X015.Text:
And she'd already gone around to
everyone before I could!

VB15X017.Text:
If there's something you want,
you really do have to go for it
before anybody else does.

VB15X019.Text:
I was talking about you,
you JERK.

VB24A004.Text:
There's so much food!
Do you always eat like this?

VB24A005.Text:
Nah, the boarding house ladies
made a mistake, and accidentally
made too much.

VB24A006.Text:
Without another person, we won't
be able to finish it, don't you
think?

VB24C001.Text:
Then, should we invite someone
over?

VB24D001.Text: Then, why don't we call Touga-san?

VB24D002.Text:
I mean, he invited us to the
masquerade last night, and all.

VB24D003.Text:
I wouldn't have minded not getting
invited, really...

VB24D004.Text:
But okay, sure.
Let's invite him over to take care
of our scraps.

VB24D006.Text:
In that case, I'll go ahead and
call him.

VB24E001.Text: Then, why don't we call Juri-san?

VB24E002.Text:
Since there's only girls here,
inviting a boy would be kind of...

VB24E003.Text:
Yeah. But I dunno if she'll
come...

VB24E004.Text:
At any rate, let's try phoning
her.

VB24F001.Text:
