Then, why don't we call
Saijonji-san?

VB24F002.Text:
I'm sure Saionji-san would be
thrilled to come over.

VB24F003.Text:
Whaaat? Saionji? I mean, I bet
he would be, but...

VB24F005.Text:
No, if you wanna call him, I'm not
gonna stop you, it's just...

VB24F006.Text: Then I'll try to phone him.

VB24G001.Text:
Then, why don't we call Miki-kun?
I'm sure he'd come.

VB24G002.Text:
Oh, I'm all for it. I've got no
problems with Mickey. Himemiya,
you're okay with that too, right?

VB24H001.Text:
Then, why don't we call
Chigusa-san?

VB24H002.Text:
She just returned to school, so
she probably doesn't have any
friends to eat with, right?

VB24H005.Text:
Weird, there's only an address
written here. Does she have a
house to herself?

VB24H006.Text: But the address is quite close.

VB24H007.Text: Alright then, I'll go call on her.

VB24H008.Text:
Please do. Judging by the address,
it shouldn't take you more than
five minutes.

VB24H009.Text:
Okay. Then, I'll be taking the
directory. I'll be back soon!

VB25A001.Text:
Hey.
I'm honored that you all called me
over here.

VB25A002.Text:
Look, inviting you over wasn't my
idea.

VB25A003.Text: My, my, you aren't very honest.

VB25A005.Text:
Now, now, forget that; Utena and
Touga-san, come on inside. The
food will get cold.

VB25B001.Text:
By the way...
Have Utena and Touga-san dueled
before?

VB25B002.Text: In the Dueling Arena, I mean.

VB25B004.Text:
If you're each going in turn,
though, that would mean you're
next.

VB25B005.Text:
That whole card thing wasn't your
doing, was it?

VB25B006.Text:
Of course not. When it's my turn
to duel, I'll tell you directly
and honorably.

VB25B009.Text:
(Both Touga-san and Utena seem
like good all-around athletes,
though.)

VB25B010.Text:
(I'll bet it would be a good
fight.)

VB25C001.Text: So around when will you two duel?

VB25C002.Text:
When the time comes, I'd love to
be able to spectate.

VB25C003.Text:
Hrrm, I really don't think you'd
be all that comfortable.

VB25C004.Text:
Besides which, the rules say that
only those with a Rose Seal may
enter the duel arena.

VB25C006.Text:
Darn, I was thinking that Utena vs
Touga-san would be a great match.
...What a shame.

VB25D001.Text:
That's so neat.
I want to try dueling, too.

VB25D002.Text:
That dueling stuff isn't fun at
all. You shouldn't be so enthusi-
astic about it.

VB25D003.Text:
If you became like me, it would
bring you nothing but trouble.

VB25D004.Text:
You need a Rose Seal to duel,
as well.

VB25D005.Text:
Well, do your best to receive
a letter.

VB25D007.Text:
Their Rose Seals arrived in
letters from the Ends of the
World.

VB25D008.Text:
Oh, is that so...
So, what should I do to get one of
those letters myself?

VB25D009.Text:
If you retain your heart's
nobility, I'm sure that you will
receive one as well.

VB25D010.Text:
In an envelope with a Rose
Seal...

VB25D011.Text:
My heart's nobility...
I don't really get it, but I'll do
my best.

VB25E001.Text:
You guys, I don't think it's good
to duel.

VB25E002.Text:
It'd be awful if you got hurt.
And besides...

VB25E003.Text:
How can we steal away a girl with
a duel?

VB25E005.Text:
Heh. A certain someone said that
to me before, too.

VB25E006.Text:
Anybody with normal sensibilities
would say the same.

VB25E007.Text:
You Student Council Members are
the ones who're messed up.

VB25E008.Text:
"Normal sensibilities," eh?
Those are merely what's normal for
you.

VB25E010.Text:
What is normal is different for
each person.

VB25E011.Text:
For example, Tenjou Utena-kun
dressing in a boy's uniform is
what is normal for her...

VB25E012.Text:
And Himemiya Anthy being the Rose
Bride is what is normal for her.

VB25E014.Text:
You'll understand too, sooner or
later, how normalcy differs from
person to person.

VB25E015.Text:
I don't wanna understand your
hair-splitting.

VB25E017.Text:
(It sounded like the front-page
truth to me...)

VB25E018.Text:
(Normal... What's normal for me.
What is normal for me?)

VB25E019.Text:
(What kind of girl is the "normal"
me...?)

VB26A001.Text:
I wasn't expecting to be invited
to dinner by all of you.

VB26A002.Text:
It wasn't so much "all of us" as
it was her.

VB26A004.Text:
I was thinking I'd really like to
eat dinner together with you,
Juri-san.

VB26A005.Text:
I mean, don't take anything weird
from that! I just...

VB26A006.Text:
Well, instead of standing around,
let's go on in to the dining room.
We can talk there.

VB26A007.Text:
Sure.
Please show me the way, then.

VB26A008.Text:
Uh, sure!
It's right over here...

VB26B001.Text:
By the way, Utena, have you
already fought with Juri-san?

VB26B007.Text:
(It's a really awkward atmo-
sphere... What should I do...?)

VB26C001.Text:
Utena's strong, huh?
I mean, Juri is the Fencing Club
Captain, and all.

VB26C002.Text:
To win against a person like that
is really something!

VB26C003.Text: No way, I mean, I didn't really...

VB26C004.Text:
Don't be modest. You won - you're
stronger. When it comes to winning
and losing, there are no flukes.

VB26C006.Text:
Because things like miracles don't
exist.

VB26D001.Text:
For someone who's the captain of
the fencing club,

VB26D004.Text:
Pay it no mind. It's as she says,
after all.

VB26D005.Text:
That's why I diligently,
repeatedly train each day. That's
how it is.

VB26D006.Text:
So you'll want a rematch before
long?

VB26D007.Text:
Yes, one day. Tenjou Utena, when
that day comes, things won't go
like they did last time.

VB26D008.Text:
Oh no! You're in trouble, Utena.
Whatcha gonna do?

VB26D009.Text:
What can I do? I've got no choice
but to take her on.

VB26D010.Text:
I'll fight with all my strength,
and if I still lose, then there's
nothing I can do.

VB26D011.Text: Heh, that answer's just like you.

VB26E001.Text:
W-well, they say that a match is
based on luck... Next time,
Juri-san might be the winner.

VB26E002.Text:
Y-yeah, you're right. When I won
in the last duel,

VB27A002.Text:
To be able to eat dinner alone
with you again...

VB27A003.Text:
(He must love Anthy a ton. He's so
touched, he's crying.)

VB27A004.Text:
Excuse me! Sorry to interrupt when
you're hopping with glee, but
let's head to the dining room.

VB27A006.Text:
Tch, you boorish wench. Times like
this are when you show some tact.

VB27A007.Text:
Are you seriously telling me what
to do in my own place?

VB27B001.Text:
By the way, Utena, have you
already dueled with Saionji-san?

VB27B003.Text:
Hmph, don't get too comfortable
just because you won twice.

VB27B004.Text:
I'll challenge you to a duel again
soon, and this time for certain I
will win Anthy back.

VB27B005.Text: You sure are full of yourself...

VB27B006.Text:
This is why I didn't want to call
this jerk!

VB27B010.Text:
(It's a really awkward atmo-
sphere... What should I do...?)

VB27C001.Text:
Utena, you must be strong for
Saionji-san to have lost to you
twice.

VB27C002.Text:
Tenjou is NOT strong. I just
happened to be in bad form.

VB27C003.Text:
Hmmm, so you were in bad form
twice in a row.

VB27C004.Text: What did you say!? How unpleasant.

VB27C005.Text:
Are we dining together so that you
could make a laughingstock out of
me!?

VB27C006.Text:
Th-that really isn't what I meant
to...

VB27C007.Text:
We may be halfway through dinner,
but I am going to take my leave.

VB27C008.Text:
I cannot dine with such a rude
lot.

VB27C009.Text:
Anthy, I know it's hard on you,
but be patient for a little while
longer.

VB27C010.Text:
I will win you back from these
mannerless curs soon enough.

VB27E001.Text:
Saionji-san, you're weak for
someone who's the captain of the
Kendo Club.

VB27E002.Text:
You lost against Chigusa-san
today, after all.

VB27E005.Text:
H-how unpleasant. Are we dining
together so that you could make a
laughingstock out of me!?

VB27E006.Text:
Th-that really isn't what I meant
to...

VB27E007.Text:
We may be halfway through dinner,
but I am going to take my leave.

VB27E008.Text:
I cannot dine with such a rude
lot.

VB27E009.Text:
Anthy, I know it's hard on you,
but be patient for a little while
longer.

VB27E010.Text:
I will win you back from these
mannerless curs soon enough.

VB27F001.Text:
Saionji-san, you're weak for
someone who's the captain of the
Kendo Club.

VB27F002.Text: You lost twice in a row.

VB27F003.Text:
H-how unpleasant. Are we dining
together so that you could make a
laughingstock out of me!?

VB27F004.Text:
Th-that really isn't what I meant
to...

VB27F005.Text:
We may be halfway through dinner,
but I am going to take my leave.

VB27F006.Text:
I cannot dine with such a rude
lot.

VB27F007.Text:
Anthy, I know it's hard on you,
but be patient for a little while
longer.

VB27F008.Text:
I will win you back from these
mannerless curs soon enough.

VB27G001.Text:
W-well, they say that a match is
based on luck.

VB27G003.Text:
Exactly right. Back then, I just
happened to be in bad form.

VB27G005.Text:
Shut up. The next time we fight, I
won't lose to the likes of you.

VB27G006.Text:
Now, now, you two. The meal we
went to all this trouble for will
lose its flavor.

VB27G009.Text: V-very well. If you say so, Anthy.

VB27G012.Text:
But I think it would have been
better had someone not brought up
the topic of dueling.

VB28A001.Text:
Thank you very much for inviting
me over tonight.

VB28A003.Text:
Forget the stilted greetings.
C'mon, come right in.

VB28B001.Text:
By the way, Utena, have you
already fought Miki-kun?

VB28B003.Text:
She got me then, but next time,
I won't lose.

VB28B005.Text:
Back then, I let my guard down.
Next time...

VB28B006.Text:
(S-somehow, the atmosphere's
strained. What should I do...?)

VB28C001.Text:
You guys, stop it. The food will
spoil.

VB28C002.Text:
You're one to talk! You're the one
who lit the fire.

VB28C004.Text:
But it's just as senpai says.
Let's stop already.

VB28C005.Text: The food will lose its good taste.

VB28C006.Text:
You're right. All right, let's dig
in. Himemiya, could you pass me
the dressing?

VB28C008.Text:
(Great! For now, the atmosphere
went back to normal...)

VB28D001.Text:
Awright, Miki-kun!
Time for a rematch!

VB28D002.Text:
Hey, hey, don't egg him on! I'm
having enough trouble with just
the day after tomorrow's duel.

VB28D003.Text:
Oh, right. I completely forgot
about that.

VB28D005.Text:
Even though Saionji-senpai held
you under suspicion.

VB28D006.Text:
Th-that's true. It was no time for
me to egg someone on. I'll think
about what I've done...

VB28D007.Text:
There's nothing to think about.
You're not a Duelist.

VB28D008.Text:
Thanks, Utena.
You trust me, don't you?

VB28D009.Text:
I trust you, too. You aren't a
Duelist.

VB28D010.Text:
You aren't the slightest bit like
a Duelist, after all.

VB28D011.Text:
Is that something I should be
happy about...?

VB28F001.Text:
(All right, here's where I make
some kind of accident occur and
point their attention somewhere
else.)

VB28F002.Text:
Aaaah, how awful! The miso soup's
gone flying!

VB28F003.Text:
Aah, I'm so sorry. I'll prepare a
shower for you right away. I'm
really so sorry, Miki-kun.

VB28G001.Text:
Miki-kun, I'll leave the towel and
stuff here for you.

VB28G003.Text:
(Am I just one door away from
Miki-kun in his birthday suit...?)

VB28G005.Text:
(Ahh, the door's open just a
little bit.)

VB28G006.Text:
(I might be able to peek at him
from here...
But...)

VB28H001.Text:
(It won't hurt for just a bit.
It's not like it'd kill me.)

VB28H003.Text:
(The androgynous figure character-
istic of adolescent boys! Couldn't
he face over here a little more?)

VB28H004.Text:
(Aah, I don't think I'll be
getting any sleep tonight...)

VB28I002.Text:
(No matter what, I could never do
anything so disgraceful.)

VB28I003.Text:
Hey, Miki-kun.
I really am sorry.

VB28I004.Text:
It's all right, really. It was my
fault for taking that attitude in
the middle of dinner.

VB28I005.Text: You did it on purpose, didn't you?

VB28I007.Text:
Thank you very much for attending
to me.

VB28I008.Text:
No, I'm the one who's sorry.
I brought up the topic of dueling
in a place like that.

VB29B001.Text:
(So these are ruins after all...
I wonder if the white fencing hall
I saw was just a dream.)

VB29B002.Text:
(I mean, Chigusa-san didn't
recognize me, either...)

VB29B004.Text:
(According to the directory, isn't
this supposed to be Chigusa's
address...?)

VB29B005.Text:
(What should I do?
I don't think anybody could live
here.)

VB29B007.Text:
Sorry, but I'm not going to stop.
The night is still young.

VB29B010.Text:
Well, well. It seems we have an
unexpected interruption.

VB29B012.Text:
What do you want, kitten?
Did you come to confirm whether
this was a ruin or not?

VB29B013.Text:
No, um... I came to invite you to
dinner, Chigusa-san, but...

VB29B015.Text:
Kozue-kun, forgive me.
A classmate has invited me to
dinner.

VB29B017.Text:
I'll see you tomorrow.
We still have plenty of time.

VB30X001.Text:
Huh... so the directory had a
misprint?

VB30X002.Text:
Yes. I'll tell a teacher first
thing tomorrow.

VB30X003.Text:
I thought it was weird!
There's no way anyone could live
in those ruins.

VB30X004.Text:
Of course not.
By the way, Utena-kun.

VB30X005.Text: I hear you aspire to be a prince.

VB30X007.Text:
Do you know the story of Snow
White?

VB30X008.Text:
Sure, she's the one who eats a
poisoned apple, right?

VB30X010.Text:
But you know, I understand the
feelings of the queen who makes
her eat it.

VB30X011.Text:
The queen probably wanted to be
tied to the prince.

VB30X012.Text:
(Chigusa-san... what on earth are
you trying to say?)

VB30X013.Text:
There are only two kinds of girls
in the world.

VB30X014.Text:
Snow White or Evil Queen.
And I wanted to be a queen...

VB30X015.Text:
To know magic myself, to create a
poison apple, and to make Snow
White eat it.

VB30X016.Text:
To pursue happiness through my own
power.

VB30X017.Text:
I hate princesses.
Those princesses, who only cry and
wait.

VB30X018.Text:
But princes... they're inclined to
choose women like that.

VB30X019.Text:
Tenjou Utena... what about you?
Will you become a princess... or
a queen?

VB30X021.Text:
Oh, so is that why you take the
appearance of a boy? So you don't
have to become either?

VB30X022.Text:
(Chigusa-san, the way you're
talking is so cruel...)

VB30A004.Text: He... heheheh... ha ha ha ha ha!

VB30A005.Text: I believe I'll take my leave now.

VB30A006.Text:
Tenjou Utena, sooner or later, it
will become clear who you truly
are.

VB30A007.Text:
I'm sorry, Utena. This turned into
a real disaster.

VB30A008.Text:
It's okay. I was happy about
what you said.

VB30A010.Text:
I mean, I was also kind of
surprised, but... thanks.

VB30B001.Text:
Actually, I'm also "taking an
appearance", but in a totally
different way!

VB30B002.Text:
In fact, I'm really the the
president of Planet Slippy!

VB30B003.Text:
What, you don't believe me?
In that case, let me show you the
proof!

VB30B013.Text:
Haaah, slippy slippery,
slippy slippery, slippy slippy
noodles on your slippy bald head!

VB30B014.Text:
Draw back a bow, and then let it
slip; take a stance like a crane
("achou!") and bloody their lip!

VB30B017.Text:
(Hah... hah... Looks like by
putting myself out there with a
gag, I managed to change
the flow of the conversation.)

VB30B018.Text:
(Anthy seeemed amused, but only
Anthy. I guess everyone else was
just too "fan-thy" for it!)

VB30B019.Text:
(Okay, that pun was also terrible.
I guess I don't have any comedic
sense after all.)

VB35X001.Text:
(Well, it's good that I have a bed
now... but it's also kind of a
shame.)

VB35X002.Text:
(Starting today, I'm going to have
to sleep by myself.)

VB35X003.Text:
(For some reason, I don't feel
sleepy... I wonder why?)

VB35X004.Text:
(Who is it that I have on my
mind...?)

VB35B001.Text:
(I just can't get to sleep.
Maybe I should go outside
and get some fresh air.)

VB36A001.Text:
(Ah, that feels so good!
I wonder why the air feels so
clean...?)

VB36A002.Text:
(Maybe because there are so many
plants up on this hill?)

VB36A003.Text: Huhh? So you came here too?

VB36A004.Text:
I just couldn't get to sleep.
You, too?

VB36A006.Text:
How 'bout it? You wanna play for a
bit? It's boring to play by
myself.

VB36A008.Text:
(I can't believe I'm playing
basketball alone with Utena this
late at night...)

VB36A010.Text:
(This is kind of like a situation
from out of a movie or a drama.)

VB36A011.Text:
(I'm so glad I came to Ohtori
Academy...)

VB36A012.Text:
Phew, I'm pooped.
Shall we get going?

VB36A013.Text:
After all we sweated out, we'll be
counting sheep this time.

VB36A015.Text:
I'm gonna crash after I take a
shower; how about we take one
together?

VB36B001.Text:
(For all that Utena dresses like a
boy, her figure sure is feminine.)

VB36B002.Text:
(If she put on a skirt, I bet
she'd be deluged with boys.)

VB36B003.Text:
(...Well, even now the girls are
all over her.)

VB36B004.Text:
What's the matter? Is there
something weird about my body?

VB36B005.Text:
Nope, not at all. I was charmed by
how pretty it is.

VB36B006.Text:
Huhh? No way, no how! You're the
pretty one here.

VB36B007.Text:
Your skin looks so soft, I bet it
feels good to hug...

VB36B008.Text:
Huh...? Don't tell me, Utena.
Were you checking me out...?

VB36B009.Text:
N-no, I wasn't! I like totally
normal boys.

VB36B010.Text:
Sounds shady... I seeee. I'm gonna
have to keep my eye on you, huh?
Heeheehee.

VB36B011.Text:
C'mon, I told you I wasn't!
Quit picking on me.

VB36B012.Text:
Teehee, sorry 'bout that.
I was just teasing you a little.

VB36B013.Text:
(But I think it did make my heart
leap a bit.)

VB36B014.Text:
(Even though we're both girls...
Is that kinda weird...?)

VB37X001.Text:
(Ah, that feels so good!
I wonder why the air feels so
clean...?)

VB37X002.Text:
(Maybe because there are so many
plants up on this hill?)

VB37X003.Text:
Well, well.
Are you also out for an evening
stroll?

VB37X005.Text:
It's dangerous for a lady to walk
alone at this time of night.
What on earth are you up to?

VB37X006.Text:
W-well... I just couldn't get to
sleep.

VB37X007.Text:
Hehh, what a coincidence. I was
the same.

VB37X008.Text:
I couldn't sleep because I was
thinking of you.

VB37X010.Text:
It's no lie.
You were on my mind....

VB37X013.Text:
You're Sanjouin Chigusa, right?
I hear you took down Saionji.

VB37X014.Text:
As I'd expect from the Student
Council President. News reaches
your ears fast.
By the way, is that girl next to
you your lover?

VB37X018.Text:
That girl who can do nothing but
cry...

VB37X019.Text:
So in other words, you're saying I
should break it off with her and
choose you instead, right?

VB37X021.Text:
(Chigusa-san...
Why did you say those things...?)

VB37X022.Text:
(I wonder if I did something bad
to her...)

VB37X023.Text:
(I don't get it...
I just don't get it.)

VB38X001.Text:
(Huh? Isn't that Saionji-san
standing over there?)

VB38X002.Text:
Hey, Saionji-san!
What're you doing in a place like
that?

VB38X004.Text: By any chance, are you peeping?

VB38X005.Text:
H-how impertinent!
I only came to hand this to Anthy.

VB38X007.Text:
It is. Could you hand this to
Anthy personally? Please!

VB38X009.Text:
Thank you. I'll repay you another
time, sooner or later. Farewell.

VB38X011.Text:
(But never mind that; who knew
Anthy was keeping an exchange
diary with Saionji-san?)

VB39A003.Text:
Your usual uniform is also good,
but you look great in that too,
Juri-san!

VB39A005.Text:
What're you doing in a place like
this, Juri-san?

VB39A006.Text:
I couldn't quite get to sleep, so
I went out for a night stroll.

VB39A007.Text:
Same here.
I couldn't sleep, either.

VB39A008.Text:
(No way... could Juri-san possibly
have been thinking about me, too?)

VB39A012.Text:
You saw her, didn't you?
The girl who challenged me to
a duel.

VB39A013.Text:
On top of which, you may be
unaware of this,

VB39A014.Text:
but she challenged Saionji, too...
and won.

VB39A015.Text:
But even though she's so skilled,
I've never heard her name before
in regard to fencing.

VB39A016.Text:
But, up until three years ago,
she was here at Ohtori, right?
So...

VB39A018.Text:
she wasn't in the Fencing Club
while I was in middle school.

VB39A020.Text:
About last night's incident.
Saionji seems to suspect you,
but I'm of a different opinion.

VB39A022.Text:
Yes. I don't think that you're the
culprit.

VB39A024.Text:
I can't confirm it, but I'm
certain she's involved.

VB39A025.Text:
Sanjouin Chigusa... there's
something about her.

VB39A026.Text:
She has the scent of a Duelist,
unlike Tenjou Utena...

VB39B003.Text:
Your usual uniform is also good,
but you look great in that too,
Juri-san!

VB39B005.Text:
What're you doing in a place like
this, Juri-san?

VB39B006.Text:
I couldn't quite get to sleep, so
I went out for a night stroll.

VB39B007.Text:
Same here.
I couldn't sleep, either.

VB39B008.Text:
(No way... could Juri-san possibly
have been thinking about me, too?)

VB39B012.Text:
Today, Sanjouin Chigusa came to
challenge me.

VB39B014.Text:
Personal matches are forbidden in
the fencing club, so I refused,
though.

VB39B015.Text:
On top of which, you may be
unaware of this,

VB39B016.Text:
but she challenged Saionji, too...
and won.

VB39B017.Text:
But even though she's so skilled,
I've never heard her name before
in regard to fencing.

VB39B018.Text:
But, up until three years ago,
she was here at Ohtori, right?
So...

VB39B019.Text:
At the very least, she wasn't in
the Fencing Club while I was in
middle school.

VB39B021.Text:
About last night's incident.
Saionji seems to suspect you,
but I'm of a different opinion.

VB39B023.Text:
Yes. I don't think that you're the
culprit.

VB39B025.Text:
I can't confirm it, but I'm
certain she's involved.

VB39B026.Text:
Sanjouin Chigusa... there's
something about her.

VB39B027.Text:
She has the scent of a Duelist,
unlike Tenjou Utena...

VB40X001.Text:
(Huh?
Isn't that Miki-kun standing
over there?)

VB40X002.Text:
Hey, Miki-kun!
What are you doing?

VB40X004.Text: What, were you trying to peep?

VB40X005.Text:
No, of course not!
I just...

VB40X007.Text: I just have this letter, and...

VB40X009.Text:
H-here, please hand this to
Himemiya-san.

VB40X012.Text:
Well, he said "please" and all,
but still.

VB40X013.Text: I guess this is a love letter.

VB40X014.Text:
Hmm, so Miki really likes Anthy...
I'm a little disappointed.

VB40X015.Text:
I wonder what he wrote...
Probably "please go out with me!"

VB40X016.Text:
Or maybe he's just asking to be
friends?

VB40X017.Text:
Hey, wait a minute...
There's nothing in this envelope!

VB40X018.Text:
Forgetting the letter...
I guess even Miki-kun sometimes
does really careless things.

VB41X013.Text:
You're Sanjouin Chigusa, right?
I hear you took down Saionji.

VB41X014.Text:
As I'd expect from the Student
Council President. News reaches
your ears fast.

VB41X015.Text:
But it's a shame that you weren't
there.

VB41X016.Text:
I was thinking I might polish off
all the Student Council members.

VB41X018.Text:
I will. As long as that girl
exists.

VB41X020.Text:
As long as you exist, I won't lose
to anyone.

VB41X021.Text:
Not to you, not to Tenjou Utena,
and not to a prince.

VB41X024.Text: (What on earth is it about me...?)

VC01B004.Text:
Hey, transfer student!
Throwing yourself into the campus
lifestyle, I hope?

VC01B006.Text:
Good! By the way... did you hear
about the match between Kyouichi
Saionji and Sanjouin Chigusa?

VC01B008.Text:
Yesterday, Sanjouin-san went to
the kendo hall, and challenged
Saionji-san to a duel!

VC01B010.Text:
They say Sanjouin-san won by a
narrow margin!
Aaah, I wish I'd seen it!

VC01B011.Text:
It would have been a chance to
cheer for someone other than
Utena.

VC01B013.Text:
Kidding! I'm all yours, Utena.
Hey, speaking of these rumors,
check it out.

VC01B014.Text:
Hey, next to Chigusa-san,
isn't that Kozue-chan?

VC01B015.Text:
You're right!
She's hanging off her arm.
Ah, here they come...!

VC01B018.Text:
Oh? I recognize your face from
yesterday.

VC01B020.Text:
Hm, I don't want to hear such an
informal greeting from you.

VC01B021.Text:
Let's go Sanjouin-san.
Just like you said, she's really
an unpleasant girl.

VC01B022.Text:
Wait a minute,
what do you mean by that?

VC01B023.Text:
(What was that all about?
What did Chigusa-san say about
me...?)

VC01B024.Text: Man, what was up with Kozue-chan?

VC01B025.Text:
I kiiinda got a feeling like they
were radiating hate waves. Did you
do something?

VC01B026.Text:
...Nothing in particular comes to
mind, but...

VC01B027.Text:
Nobody else can understand a
person's reason for hating
someone.

VC01B028.Text:
Especially not the person in
question.

VC01B031.Text:
(But I don't have the slightest
idea why!
Why is it...?)

VC02X001.Text:
Alright! Today, split into teams
according to whether your seat
number is even or odd,
and we'll have a soccer match!

VC02X002.Text:
(I'm in an odd-numbered seat,
so I'm on Utena's team!)

VC02X003.Text:
(And Chigusa's on the other one.
Alright, I'll do my best!)

VC02X004.Text:
(They're both so great!
I kind of feel like they're on a
different level...)

VC02X005.Text:
(Utena versus Chigusa-san...
Who's going to win?)

VC02X006.Text: You'll have to stop here, Prince.

VC02A005.Text:
(In my lungs, the air...
I'm losing consciousness...
Someone, help...)

VC02B001.Text:
(If she took the ball from Utena,
there's no way I could stop her.)

VC02B003.Text:
Hmph, what a coward.
You won't get away.

VC02B004.Text:
(Huh!?
Why is Chigusa coming towards
me!?)

VC02B008.Text:
(In my lungs, the air...
I'm losing consciousness...
Someone, help...)

VC03X004.Text: You blacked out during gym class.

VC03X005.Text:
Sanjouin-san carried you here,
be sure to thank her.

VC03X007.Text:
It seems that, due to contact with
her elbow, the air burst from your
lungs for a moment.

VC03X008.Text:
I understand it happens a lot in
martial arts, but...

VC03X009.Text:
It was probably an accident; in
soccer, it's rare for people to go
that far for the sake of victory.

VC03X011.Text:
You aren't really wounded, so
it's fine if you want to go back
to class.

VC04A001.Text:
(That elbow... she definitely used
it deliberately.)

VC04A003.Text:
That's the fencing hall!
It's the chalk-white fencing hall!

VC04A005.Text:
Saionji-san, open up! Let me in!
Chigusa-san is there too, right?
Hey!

VC04B005.Text:
Juri-san, open up! Let me in!
Chigusa-san is there too, right?
Hey!

VC04C001.Text:
(That elbow... she definitely used
it deliberately.)

VC04C003.Text:
That's the fencing hall!
It's the chalk-white fencing hall!

VC04C005.Text:
Miki-kun, open up! Let me in!
Chigusa-san is there too, right?
Hey!

VC04H006.Text:
You ARE the one who I met here
two days ago, right?
Open the door!

VC05X001.Text:
(The chalk-white fencing hall is
here after all!)

VC05X002.Text:
(If I show it to someone
immediately...)

VC05A001.Text:
(Right, I should go consult with
Utena. Knowing her, I'm sure
she'll believe me.)

VC05B001.Text:
(Right, I should go consult with
Touga. He should be able to
think of a good plan.)

VC05C001.Text:
(Right, I should go consult with
Saionji-san)

VC05C002.Text:
(Even Saionji-san's got to be
concerned about Chigusa-san.)

VC05D001.Text:
(Right, I should go consult with
Juri. She'll definitely lend me
her help.)

VC05E001.Text:
(Right, I should go consult with
Miki. He'll definitely believe
me.)

VC06X001.Text:
(I'll ask about Chigusa-san, and
we'll go see the chalk-white
fencing hall.)

VC06X002.Text:
(And then we'll surely...
We'll surely figure it out...)

VC06X003.Text:
Just a minute, you.
Could you grant me a moment of
your time?

VC06X005.Text:
What? Are you saying you don't
know who I am?

VC06X006.Text:
I see.
Then I'll have to educate you.
Keiko-san, Aiko-san, Yuuko-san.

VC06X007.Text:
Yes, Nanami-sama!
Full name, Kiryuu Nanami.

VC06X008.Text:
Ohtori Middle School, first year.
Born on August 8th; a Leo.
Blood type B, sex: female.

VC06X009.Text:
Boasting the greatest beauty on
campus, and her grades are
superior, too!

VC06X010.Text:
Her reflexes are excellent, and
her fashion sense is unrivaled!
In every field, she's a perfect
young lady!

VC06X011.Text:
Her brother is the Student Council
President, Kiryuu Touga, and if it
was for his sake, she'd even be
willing to commit murder...

VC06X012.Text:
But she's a person who, even if
she were to commit crimes, would
never personally sully her hands.

VC06X015.Text:
Um... I see.
So, um, what was it you wanted,
Nanami-sama?

VC06X017.Text:
Although you just transferred
here, do you think you've suddenly
become a big man on campus?

VC06X019.Text:
Keiko-san, Aiko-san, Yuuko-san.
Would you kindly instruct this
person about proper etiquette
at this school?

VC06X020.Text:
What happens to people who walk
around all full of themselves,
without even greeting me...?

VC07X003.Text:
Tenjou Utena...
Again, you're getting in my way.
Grrrr!

VC07X005.Text: I've got a bit of a stomachache.

VC07X006.Text:
I've been feverish ever since
yesterday...

VC07X008.Text:
Whatcha gonna do? If you wanna
fight, I'll take you on.

VC07X009.Text:
H-hmph. I'll let you off with a
warning for today.

VC07X010.Text: But don't you get too cocky.

VC07X011.Text:
I'll get you next time, Tenjou
Utena. Oohhohhohho!

VC07X012.Text:
Hey, now, that's totally a
villain's line.

VC07X014.Text:
Ah, don't worry about it. More
importantly, they didn't do
anything to you, did they?

VC07X015.Text:
Nope, I'm fine. You came just in
time, Utena.

VC07X016.Text:
You're a lifesaver.
I'm glad you happened to be
passing by.

VC07X017.Text:
I didn't just happen by. I came
looking for you.

VC07X018.Text:
For me? Oh, I get it. Are you
gonna invite me to lunch?

VC07X019.Text:
Bzzt. There's a special Student
Council meeting.

VC07X021.Text:
(A special Student Council
meeting...
And they want me to go?)

VC07X022.Text:
(I wonder what on earth this
means.)

VC08X003.Text:
B-big brother!?
What are you doing here...?

VC08X004.Text:
Exchange students should be
treated kindly, Nanami.

VC08X006.Text:
This girl said she didn't know
where the library was, so we were
simply informing her.

VC08X007.Text:
You can get there yourself from
here, right?
Then, I'll just be going...

VC08X011.Text:
No, on the contrary, I should
apogolize for my sister, Nanami.

VC08X012.Text:
Yeah, well... Anyway, I'm glad you
happened to be passing by.
You really saved me.

VC08X013.Text:
Hm, no... that wasn't coincidence.
This is fate, isn't it?

VC08X015.Text:
Haha, just kidding.
Actually, there's a special
Student Council meeting.

VC08X016.Text:
So I thought I'd come ask you to
participate, too.

VC08X018.Text:
Yeah. By all means, come -
it concerns you, too.

VC08X019.Text:
(A special Student Council meeting
...
With me, too...?)

VC08X020.Text:
(I wonder what on earth this
means.)

VC09X003.Text:
Saionji!?
What... kindly stay out of my way!

VC09X004.Text:
I'm not getting in your way.
However...

VC09X005.Text:
W... what the heck?
Are you that worked up to fight a
girl?

VC09X007.Text:
Hph... Always practicing, but you
still lost to that invalid,
Sanjouin.

VC09X008.Text:
F... fine! I'll let you go with
just that this time, transfer
student.

VC09X009.Text:
Just keep in mind that if you
meddle in my brother's affairs,
you're going to pay.

VC09X012.Text:
I was just practicing my swings.
I didn't do anything that you
should thank me for.

VC09X014.Text:
But, you really saved me!
Since you just happened to have
come by.

VC09X015.Text:
No, it wasn't a coincidence.
Actually, I came to fetch you.

VC09X017.Text:
That's right. Touga is calling a
special Student Council meeting.

VC09X018.Text:
A special...?
So does that have anything to do
with me...?

VC09X019.Text:
Yes, it relates to you. Anyway,
you'll find out when we get there.
Come with me.

VC09X020.Text:
(A special Student Council meeting
...
With me, too...?)

VC09X021.Text:
(I wonder what on earth this
means.)

VC10X003.Text:
Juri!?
Even you have an interest in
this new girl?

VC10X004.Text:
Perhaps.
But it's not just me.

VC10X005.Text:
Your brother also has considerable
interest in her.

VC10X007.Text:
That's the situation, so I came to
fetch her.

VC10X008.Text:
H-hold on.
WHAT's the situation exactly?

VC10X009.Text:
Just because you're kind of
pretty, and well-preportioned, and
great at fencing,

VC10X012.Text:
It was your beloved big brother
who asked for me to come and get
her.

VC10X014.Text:
The Student Council is holding a
special meeting, and he selected
her to participate.

VC10X015.Text:
I see... my big brother.
Then I guess there's no helping
it.

VC10X017.Text:
Come on, everyone.
Let's not waste any more of our
time here.

VC10X020.Text:
Thank you very much, Juri-san!
Umm, you said something about a
special Council meeting...?

VC10X021.Text:
Mmm, there's just been a little
incident. It involves you, too.

VC10X023.Text:
(What could it be?
Is it about the whole white
fencing hall thing...?)

VC11X004.Text:
Don't you think it's cruel to
treat a new transfer student that
way?

VC11X006.Text:
Anyway, she's been summoned by the
Student Council, so I need to
borrow her.

VC11X008.Text:
We're holding a special Student
Council meeting. The president
wants her there as an observer.

VC11X009.Text:
What kind of weird meeting is
that?

VC11X010.Text:
I'm afraid I can't tell you.
Senpai, let's go.

VC11X013.Text:
(A special Student Council
meeting...
I wonder what it is?)

VC12A001.Text:
Well, well.
This was certainly a sudden
meeting.

VC12A002.Text:
Have you figured something out
about the incident from the day
before yesterday?

VC12A003.Text:
I've got a basketball mini-game
after this, so could you keep it
quick?

VC12A004.Text:
Last night, a letter arrived at my
place from the Ends of the World,
marked with the rose crest.

VC12A006.Text:
According to the letter, the duel
announced on the message card two
days ago is, indeed,
an official challenge.

VC12A007.Text:
So I guess there really is a sixth
Duelist.

VC12A008.Text:
Correct. Does anyone have some
knowledge about whom that sixth
Duelist might be?

VC12A009.Text:
(I-I have to tell them. I have to
tell them right here about the old
fencing hall.)

VC12A012.Text:
I saw something!
I saw Chigusa-san enter the chalk-
white fencing hall!

VC12A014.Text:
No, not the one that you guys use,
Miki-kun.
The one that's in ruins now.

VC12A015.Text: How do you get into a ruin?

VC12A016.Text:
That's, well...
When I saw it, it wasn't in ruins.

VC12A017.Text:
It was a pretty white building,
and Chigusa opened the double
doors and went inside...

VC12A018.Text:
I'm serious!
The chalk-white fencing hall was
definitely...

VC12A019.Text:
I understand.
We should keep an eye on this
person called Sanjouin Chigusa.

VC12A020.Text:
Does anyone else have anything to
add?

VC12A023.Text:
(I mean, I guess if someone told
me that a ruin  suddenly became a
shiny new building, I'd find it
hard to believe, too...)

VC12A024.Text:
(And then, I'm a new transfer, so
I don't have a lot of cred-
ibility...)

VC12A026.Text:
(But it's true! If I could just
bring one other person to the
white fencing hall...)

VC12F001.Text:
Touga... what's the meaning of
this special Student Council
meeting?

VC12F002.Text:
Good grief...
Of course you're the one who got
here last.

VC12F003.Text:
What...!?
Miki isn't even here yet!

VC12F004.Text:
Mickey isn't coming.
In fact, he hasn't been in his
classes since this morning.

VC12F005.Text:
Hah, so he's skipping?
How unusual for an honor student
like him.

VC12F006.Text:
Mickey's not that kind of person.
If he's disappeared, there's got
to be a good reason.

VC12F007.Text:
That's what I think, too.
Have any of you seen Mickey today?

VC12F008.Text:
Hmm... Himemiya, do you know
anything?

VC12F010.Text:
(I-I have to tell them. I have to
tell them right here about the old
fencing hall.)

VC12F013.Text:
I saw him!
He went with Chigusa-san into the
fencing hall.

VC12F014.Text:
Fencing hall, you say...?
You mean the one we use?

VC12F015.Text:
No, not the one that you use, Juri
-san. The one that's in ruins now.

VC12F016.Text: How do you get into a ruin?

VC12F017.Text:
That's, well...
When I saw it, it wasn't in ruins.

VC12F018.Text:
It was a pretty, chalk-white
building, and Miki-kun opened the
double doors and went inside,
and then Chigusa-san also...

VC12F019.Text:
I'm serious!
The chalk-white fencing hall was
definitely...

VC12F020.Text:
I understand.
We should keep an eye on this
person called Sanjouin Chigusa.

VC12F021.Text:
Does anyone else have anything to
add?

VC12F024.Text:
(I mean, I guess if someone told
me that a ruin  suddenly became a
shiny new building, I'd find it
hard to believe, too...)

VC12F025.Text:
(And then, I'm a new transfer, so
I don't have a lot of cred-
ibility...)

VC12F027.Text:
(But it's true! If I could just
bring one other person to the
white fencing hall...)

VC12G003.Text:
I'll explain. The truth is, Juri
hasn't been seen since early this
morning.

VC12G004.Text:
She vanished? And flouted her
Student Council work? Inexcusable.

VC12G005.Text:
This, coming from you?
It's all over.

VC12G008.Text:
More importantly, where in the
world has Juri-san gone to?

VC12G011.Text:
(I-I have to tell them. I have to
tell them right here about the old
fencing hall.)

VC12G014.Text:
I saw her!
She went with Chigusa-san into the
fencing hall.

VC12G015.Text:
Fencing hall, you say...?
You mean the one we use?

VC12G016.Text:
No, not the one that you guys use,
Miki-kun.
The one that's in ruins now.

VC12G017.Text: How do you get into a ruin?

VC12G018.Text:
That's, well...
When I saw it, it wasn't in ruins.

VC12G019.Text:
It was a pretty, chalk-white
building, and Juri-san opened the
double doors and went inside,
and then Chigusa-san also...

VC12H001.Text:
It's late.
Saionji isn't here yet?

VC12H002.Text:
That's what I called everyone here
to talk about.

VC12H006.Text:
As usual, that guy just refuses to
work with others.

VC12H007.Text:
He's always the first person to be
targeted.

VC12H008.Text: It's Saionji, so what can you do?

VC12H009.Text:
What did Saionji-san do, for you
guys to talk about him this way?

VC12H010.Text:
Anyway, as the President, I can't
overlook the disappearance of the
Vice President.

VC12H011.Text:
You know, I've always wondered -
why is Saionji the Vice-President?

VC12H012.Text: Ah, I've wondered about it myself.

VC12H016.Text:
Then, Touga, is that also why
you're the President...?

VC12H017.Text:
Now that you mention it, Touga-
senpai was born June 4th and
Saionji-senpai on August 25th...

VC12H018.Text:
So the President and
Vice-President are really decided
by such a trifling thing...?

VC12H019.Text:
Anyway, let's get back to the
matter of Saionji.
Has anyone seen him lately?

VC12H022.Text:
(I-I have to tell them. I have to
tell them right here about the old
fencing hall.)

VC12H025.Text:
I saw him. Saionji-san went into
the white fencing hall with
Chigusa-san.

VC12H026.Text:
Fencing hall, you say...?
You mean the one we use?

VC12H027.Text:
No, not the one that you guys use,
Miki-kun.
The one that's in ruins now.

VC12H028.Text: How do you get into a ruin?

VC12H029.Text:
That's, well...
When I saw it, it wasn't in ruins.

VC12H030.Text:
It was a pretty, chalk-white
building, and Saionji-san opened
the double doors and went inside,
and then Chigusa-san also...

VC12H031.Text:
I'm serious!
The chalk-white fencing hall was
definitely...

VC12H032.Text:
I understand.
We should keep an eye on this
person called Sanjouin Chigusa.

VC12H033.Text:
Does anyone else have anything to
add?

VC12H036.Text:
(I mean, I guess if someone told
me that a ruin  suddenly became a
shiny new building, I'd find it
hard to believe, too...)

VC12H037.Text:
(And then, I'm a new transfer, so
I don't have a lot of cred-
ibility...)

VC12H039.Text:
(But it's true! If I could just
bring one other person to the
white fencing hall...)

VC13A001.Text: Touga-san, do you have a moment?

VC13A004.Text:
Yes.
Would you come with me to the old
fencing hall?

VC13A005.Text:
If we do, I think everything will
become clear.

VC13A006.Text:
I want to look at that strange
graffiti...

VC13A007.Text:
I understand.
I'll escort you there.

VC13A011.Text:
It's the truth! Please believe me!
There was definitely a chalk-white
building here before...

VC13A013.Text:
Well, well.
What are you two up to?

VC13A014.Text:
Having a tryst in such a deserted
place? You're quite the smooth
operator.

VC13A015.Text:
Chigusa-san, you saw it, right?
The chalk-white fencing hall that
was standing here.

VC13A016.Text:
Are you still going on about that?
President, you should be careful.

VC13A017.Text:
This girl makes up lies all the
time. Really, she's quite
reprehensible.

VC13A019.Text:
President, you should stop going
out on dates with such a liar.

VC13A020.Text:
But if you like,
you could date me.
How about it?

VC13A021.Text:
Sorry, but I happen to believe
her.

VC13A024.Text:
Now, do you mind leaving?
We're in the middle of an
important date.

VC13A027.Text:
Hmph. Well, fine.
You can stay with your princess,
until tomorrow.

VC13A028.Text: I'm willing to overlook it today.

VC13A029.Text:
Thank you, Touga-san...
for believing in me.

VC13A030.Text:
Heh, I'll always be on your side.
Don't worry. I want you to rely on
me.

VC13A032.Text:
(But, when Touga-san said he
believed in me, Chigusa-san looked
really sad.)

VC13B001.Text: Saionji-san, do you have a moment?

VC13B004.Text:
Yes.
Would you come with me to the old
fencing hall?

VC13B005.Text:
If we do, I think everything will
become clear.

VC13B006.Text:
I want to look at that strange
graffiti...

VC13B008.Text:
Please, believe what I'm saying!
I know I don't have any evidence,
but...

VC13B009.Text:
It isn't that I particularly
disbelieve you.

VC13B011.Text:
This time, I will win against
Chigusa.

VC13B012.Text:
We don't know yet if she's the
Duelist, but once we find out I'll
resolve everything.

VC13B014.Text:
I'll definitely win.
So right now, I don't want to hear
any unnecessary chatter.

VC13C001.Text: Juri-san, do you have a moment?

VC13C005.Text:
Tonight, I'll be investigating
whether or not Sanjouin is the
sixth Duelist.

VC13C006.Text:
It's not something that you should
get involved in too deeply.

VC13C009.Text:
Don't stick your nose in.
This is a warning.

VC13D001.Text: Miki-kun, do you have a moment?

VC13D004.Text:
About Sanjouin Chigusa. She's the
transfer student who defeated
Saionji-san, correct?

VC13D006.Text:
She's a celebrity, after all.
Moreover, even the Student
Council has our eye on her.

VC13D008.Text:
Yes, it's just that no one told
you. They were picking on you.
But why mention this to me?

VC13D009.Text:
Well... I thought that, knowing
you, you might believe my story,
Miki-kun.

VC13D010.Text: I'm glad that you trust me.

VC13D011.Text:
It's all right; at the very least,
I don't think that you are a
Duelist.

VC13D012.Text:
But whether Chigusa-san's a
Duelist or not is a different
matter.

VC13D013.Text:
The rumors I hear about her say
nothing but good things.

VC13D014.Text:
Oh... but that's not all there is
to her.

VC13D015.Text:
She doesn't show it to everyone,
just to me...

VC13D016.Text:
Hey there!
Don't you badmouth Sanjouin-san.

VC13D018.Text:
Trying to shove the blame onto
someone else just because you're
under suspicion--you're scum!

VC13D020.Text:
Get away from Miki, you thieving
cat!

VC13E001.Text:
Hey, Utena.
Do you have a moment?

VC13E004.Text:
Yes.
Would you come with me to the old
fencing hall?

VC13E005.Text:
If we do, I think everything will
become clear. I want to look at
that strange graffiti, too.

VC13E007.Text:
If the chalk-white fencing hall is
there like you said, everyone
will believe you.

VC13E011.Text:
I'm serious!
There was definitely a chalk-white
building here before...

VC13E012.Text:
Well, well. It seems the school's
major players are converging on
this place en masse.

VC13E013.Text:
Ah, Chigusa-san. You saw it too,
didn't you?

VC13E014.Text:
The chalk-white fencing hall that
was standing here.

VC13E015.Text:
Hmph. Are you still going on about
that?

VC13E016.Text:
Tenjou Utena-kun, you should be
careful.

VC13E017.Text:
This girl makes up lies all the
time. Really, she's quite
reprehensible.

VC13E019.Text:
Well, Middle School Prince?
Are you going to choose this
boring girl, too?

VC13E020.Text:
This girl, who isn't strong or
noble, but completely
insignificant?

VC13E025.Text:
It's not here right now, but the
chalk-white fencing hall must have
been here before.

VC13E026.Text:
Hmph. You're saying you believe
what she says?

VC13E028.Text:
Tenjou Utena, you're truly...
a prince.

VC13E029.Text:
Thank you, Utena...
for believing in me.

VC13E030.Text:
Don't worry about it.
You don't seem like a Duelist at
all.

VC13E031.Text:
Umm... I'm not sure whether I
should be happy about it.

VC14X001.Text:
Everyone, do you understand?
Then, please split into groups of
two, and try it right away.

VC14X003.Text:
(Huh? What do I do...? It looks
like everybody's already picked
someone.)

VC14X004.Text: Teacher, I don't have a partner.

VC14X005.Text:
Ah, I see.
Is there anyone who still doesn't
have a partner?

VC14X007.Text:
See, look over there!
Sanjouin-san, please partner up
with her.

VC14A002.Text:
(What a wonderful smile. Maybe I
was over-thinking all the stuff
about Chigusa.)

VC14A003.Text:
It looks like my chocolate sauce
is just about ready. Could you do
a small taste-test for me?

VC14A007.Text:
(A thumbtack!
Why was this thing in there!?)

VC14A008.Text:
It's best if you don't talk.
But what's with the thumbtack...?

VC14A009.Text:
T-Tenjou-san.
Please take her to the infirmary
right away.

VC14A010.Text:
I got it.
Come on, let's go.
We should get you treated quickly.

VC14A012.Text:
Come on, let's go.
Close your mouth.

VC14A013.Text:
(She's laughing.
She put the thumbtack in the
sauce.)

VC14A014.Text:
(Why... Why would she do something
like that...?)

VC15X002.Text:
Yeah. I was surprised when blood
came out, but it was nothing
serious.

VC15X003.Text:
Oh, thank goodness!
By the way, here.

VC15X004.Text:
I brought you the cake that you
made earlier.

VC15X005.Text:
Since you already made it,
it'd be a shame if it went to
waste!

VC15X007.Text:
(Or so I say, but with my tongue
like this... I should probably
give it to someone else.)

VC17B001.Text:
Hey, Utena.
Would you like to eat this?

VC17B003.Text:
It's ok.
With my tongue like this, I can't
taste anything anyway.

VC17B005.Text:
I feel like I should do something
for you in return, though.
Any ideas?

VC17C001.Text:
Okay then, maybe you could
bake me a cake yourself some time.

VC17C003.Text:
Just, there aren't enough kitchen
utensils at East Dorm, so would
you mind waiting for the next Home
Ec class?

VC17C004.Text:
Sure, that's fine. Oooh, I can't
wait for next week!

VC17C005.Text:
I don't want you getting your
hopes up too high.

VC17D001.Text:
Ok then, how about singing me
a song?

VC17D002.Text:
Pop, rock, enka, or a nursery
rhyme. Anything's fine.

VC17D003.Text:
Uhm... a song?
Well, I'll give it a shot.

VC17D005.Text:
I don't really think it pays for a
cake, but since it's what you
asked for...

VC17D008.Text:
Well, since you enjoyed it,
I guess it's all good.

VC18X001.Text:
You're giving this to me? Thank
you; I'll take it with pleasure.

VC18X002.Text:
Um, please don't expect much from
it.

VC18X003.Text:
If you're imagining something like
the ones they had at the
masquerade ball the other day...

VC18X004.Text:
Heh, no, I'm certain it will be
absolutely delicious.

VC18X005.Text:
After all, this is something you
made from the heart. Right?

VC18X007.Text:
Hey, you. What are you giving to
my brother?

VC18X009.Text:
I gave you a warning earlier, but
it seems you still don't
understand.

VC18X010.Text:
My big brother has the ultimate
lady, namely me, by his side,

VC18X011.Text:
so he would not invite the likes
of you there!

VC18A001.Text:
My, my. Talking to children with
no common sense sure is tiring.

VC18A003.Text:
By law, a brother and sister can't
get married. In other words,
you're not even a man and a woman
to each other.

VC18A004.Text:
But in that regard,
he and I definitely are...

VC18A008.Text:
The nurse's office!
Carry her to the nurse's office!

VC18A009.Text:
Please get a hold of yourself,
Nanami-samaa!

VC18A011.Text:
O-oh, I'm so sorry! That was so
over-familiar of me.

VC18A013.Text:
If Nanami hadn't come, I'm sure I
would have been the over-familiar
one.

VC18A015.Text:
Whoops, it's time.
I'll gladly accept this cake.

VC18B001.Text:
W-well, then, Touga-san, I should
get going...

VC18B003.Text:
That's right!
Get out of here already!

VC18B005.Text:
(But I feel like I'd have more
peace of mind if I hadn't stirred
up trouble in front of that Nanami
girl... Ah, oh well.)

VC19A001.Text:
Saionji-san, I made this in
cooking practice, so if you'd
like...

VC19A002.Text:
A cake?
You made this by yourself?

VC19C001.Text: No, I made it with Chigusa-san.

VC19C004.Text:
I see. In that case, I
unfortunately can't possibly eat
this.

VC19C006.Text:
There's no way I could brazenly
eat a cake my enemy made under the
pretext of showing humanity to me.

VC19C008.Text:
That's simply how it is.
Excuse me.

VC19C009.Text:
(Aw maaan. Even if it would've
been a lie, I should've told him I
made it with Anthy.)

VC19D002.Text:
Oh!
So Anthy made this cake for me...

VC19D003.Text:
Well, no, it wasn't so much Anthy
as me...

VC19D004.Text:
I understand, Anthy. I will gladly
accept this cake, into which you
baked your feelings.

VC19D006.Text:
Oh, Anthy! You're always thinking
about me, aren't you?

VC19D007.Text:
Yes, I haven't forgotten you
either, Anthy!

VC19D008.Text:
(It's no good.
He's totally on cloud nine.)

VC19D009.Text:
(Well, he seems happy, so I guess
it's a good thing...)

VC19E001.Text:
Saionji-san, I made this in
cooking practice, so if you'd
like...

VC19E004.Text:
Did you give Anthy what I gave you
last night?

VC19F001.Text:
Uh, yes. Of course I handed it to
her.

VC19F002.Text:
She's probably writing a response
around now, I guess?

VC19F003.Text:
I see, so you delivered it to her?
You have my gratitude, transfer
student.

VC19F004.Text: O-oh, no... It was no big deal...

VC19F005.Text:
(Hahaha, wow, I kind of feel
guilty. But, well, I can just hand
it to her tonight.)

VC19G001.Text:
Sorry. I never quite got a chance
to...

VC19G002.Text:
What did you say?!
Ohh, my poor Anthy!

VC19G003.Text:
Right now, you must be grieved
that you haven't received the
diary from me!

VC19G004.Text:
(She didn't look like that to
me...)

VC19G005.Text:
This is no time for you to
be leisurely baking cakes! Go back
right now and hand it to her!

VC19G007.Text:
(Darn it. Who cares if it would've
been a lie; I should've told him
I'd handed it over...)

VC20X001.Text:
Juri-san, I made this in cooking
class, so if you'd like...

VC20X002.Text:
A cake, eh?
It seems quite well-made.

VC20A001.Text:
I've got some confidence in my
cooking.

VC20A002.Text:
Oho, I look forward to tasting it.
I'll be sure to savor it
later.

VC20A003.Text:
Great. There's a fork inside too,
though it's made of plastic.

VC20A005.Text:
(I'm so glad; Juri-san seems happy
about it.)

VC20B001.Text:
Please don't expect much from it.
I don't know if it will suit your
tastes or not, Juri-san...

VC20B002.Text:
For these sorts of things, what's
important is not how it tastes,

VC20B003.Text:
but the meaning behind your
feelings when you brought it to
me.

VC20B004.Text:
Something that simply tastes
delicious can be acquired easily
so long as you have money.

VC20B005.Text:
But something made from the heart
is quite difficult to come by.

VC20B007.Text:
Thank you. I'll be sure to savor
it later.

VC20B008.Text:
(I'm so glad; Juri-san seems happy
about it.)

VC21A001.Text:
Miki-kun, I made this in cooking
class, so if you'd like...

VC21A002.Text:
Thanks very much!
Ah... it looks delicious.

VC21A003.Text:
And, about that letter from last
night...

VC21A004.Text: D-did you deliver it for me?

VC21A006.Text:
I guess you're right.
Asking you to deliver it was
too selfish.

VC21A007.Text:
It's not that...
There was nothing inside.

VC21A009.Text:
It looks like you were in such a
rush, you forgot to put in the
letter.

VC21A010.Text:
[sigh]
I guess there's no way Himemiya-
san and I...

VC21A011.Text:
Hey.
This was a love letter, right?

VC21A013.Text:
Busted! Miki-kun, you're very
smart, but you're not very good at
this sort of thing, are you?

VC21A015.Text:
(Ah, don't make that face...
You're getting me depressed too
now, somehow.)

VC21B002.Text:
Anthy seems like she's a stranger
to matters of love, too. You two
might be a better match than
you'd expect.

VC21B005.Text:
Thank you so much. I'll try to
write a letter again.

VC21B006.Text:
Yeah, that sounds good. But make
sure you put it in the envelope
this time, okay?

VC21C001.Text: Alright, leave it to your big sis!

VC21C003.Text:
To learn how to win the heart of a
girl, listening to a girl is best!

VC21C004.Text:
I'll teach you to write a love
letter, ask a girl out on a date,
and everything!

VC21C006.Text: Rest assured, leave it all to me!

VC21C007.Text:
So, meet me outside of the front
gate this afternoon, ok?

VC21D001.Text:
Miki-kun, I made this in cooking
class, so if you'd like...

VC21D002.Text:
Thanks very much!
Ah... it looks delicious.

VC21D003.Text:
Hmm, it's pretty well-made, isn't
it.

VC21D005.Text:
Using food to reel in a man is an
old trick--about as old as
crocodile tears. You disgust me.

VC21D006.Text:
Stop that, Kozue. It's none of
your business, is it?

VC21D007.Text:
...none of my business? Right, it
isn't any of my business.

VC21D009.Text:
(Whatever she might say, I bet
she really does care about her
brother...)

VC21E001.Text:
That's right. And since it's none
of your business, you should get
lost.

VC21E002.Text:
You bitch. You're exactly like
Sanjouin-san said.

VC21E003.Text:
I'm sorry my sister said such
awful things.

VC21E004.Text:
It's okay. I was pretty harsh with
her, too. Anyway, make sure you
eat that cake, okay?

VC21F001.Text:
Miki-kun, you shouldn't talk to
your little sister like that.

VC21F002.Text:
Kozue-chan cares about you, and
doesn't want you getting snagged
by a troublesome insect.

VC21F003.Text:
You're her big brother, so you
should understand her a little.

VC21F005.Text:
If you like, you guys can eat that
cake together. See you.

VE07X001.Text:
It seems that the Evil Queen has
finally started to move in
earnest.

VE07X002.Text: One more day until the duel.

VE07X003.Text:
How many Duelists will she be able
to draw to her, with her poisoned
apple?

VE07X004.Text:
Anyone's heart is disturbed when
their own precious thing is taken
from them.

VE07X005.Text:
Their heart is disturbed, and
their nobility lost...
Yes, even them...

VE07X006.Text:
It will be interesting to see if
any of them can hold onto their
hearts.

VC23X001.Text:
(Ah, class is finally over!
For some reason, I'm even more
tired than yesterday.)

VC23X003.Text:
(Should I keep visiting the clubs?
Or maybe I should just chat with
Utena and the others...?)

VC23A001.Text:
(Yeah, I think I'll chat with
Utena and the others.)

VC23B001.Text:
(I'll go check out the Fencing
Club.)

VC23C001.Text:
(I guess I'll go visit the Kendo
Club.)

VW00X001.Text:
It's true!
Kotobi said she saw it.

VW00X002.Text:
A guy with reaaaaaly long hair was
standing in the ruins!

VW00X003.Text:
And then she heard, like,
"are you a prince, or a princess?"

VW00X004.Text:
Oh, dear. What should you do if
you're a king?

VW00X005.Text:
Oh, come on.
That's not the problem here.

VW00A001.Text:
Um, so that ghost was at the old
fencing hall?

VW00A003.Text:
You said those ruins were
originally a fencing hall.

VW00A004.Text: Where did you hear that from?

VW00A005.Text:
I heard it at the newspaper club.
They said their next feature is on
"the Seven Mysteries of the
school".

VW00A006.Text:
Huhh, I didn't know our academy
had those.

VW00A007.Text:
Not like you don't hear those
kinds of stories at almost any
school.

VW00A008.Text:
Hey, hey, what other mysteries
were there?

VW00A009.Text:
Uhhh, stuff like "the mysterious
ukulele", and "the Phantom Thief,
Rose Cloak"...

VW00A010.Text: Oh, I know that ukulele mystery.

VW00A011.Text:
An ukulele? Somehow that doesn't
seem very frightening.

VW00A013.Text:
Night after night, you can hear
the sounds of the resentful
ukulele...

VW00B001.Text:
Those ruins... were they by any
chance the old fencing hall?

VW00B002.Text:
Yeah, I think so. They say it used
to be a really pretty building.

VW00B003.Text:
Hmmm. Come to think of it, isn't
the newspaper club's new feature
"the 7 mysteries of the school"?

VW00B004.Text:
Oh, yeah, yeah! Stuff like "the
Phantom Thief, Rose Cloak" and
"the mysterious ukulele".

VW00B006.Text:
An ukulele? Somehow that doesn't
seem very frightening.

VW00B008.Text:
Night after night, you can hear
the sounds of the resentful
ukulele...

VW02X001.Text:
Hey, by the way, don't you have
someone that you like?

VW02X004.Text:
Because here at Ohtori Academy,
there's a traditional good luck
charm for people seeking love.

VW02X005.Text:
If you want, I thought I could
teach it to you!

VW02X007.Text:
Of course! It's a traditional good
luck charm that's been handed down
from way long ago!

VW02X008.Text:
Okay, okay, I believe you!
So what d'you have to do?

VW02X009.Text:
First, take the name tag of the
person you like.

VW02X012.Text:
You know, like on the walls of the
sports clubs, they have the names
of the club members written on
those tags? Those things.

VW02X014.Text:
Well, usually it's one of those,
but apparently even the one from
their locker or room will do.

VW02X015.Text:
Then you tie a red string to it,
and bring it to your own locker
room.

VW02X016.Text:
If you do that, your feelings will
reach them!

VW04A002.Text:
She's already beaten 20 people in
a row... It feels almost unreal...

VW04A003.Text:
Yeah, she's really not holding
anything back. I wonder why?

VW04A004.Text:
But... the only person who can
give Arisugawa-senpai a proper
fight now is Mickey.

VW04A005.Text:
So, come to think of it, where is
Mickey today?

VW04A006.Text:
He's taking a break today.
I think he's in the music room.

VW04A007.Text:
(Hmm...
So Miki is in the music room...)

VW04B002.Text:
She's already beaten 20 people in
a row... It feels almost unreal...

VW04B003.Text:
Yeah, she's really not holding
anything back. I wonder why?

VW04B004.Text:
But... the only person who can
give Arisugawa-senpai a proper
fight now is Mickey.

VW04B005.Text:
So, come to think of it, where is
Mickey today?

VW04B006.Text:
Apparently he hasn't been at his
classes, either.
You think maybe he's sick?

VW04C001.Text:
Geez, it's so low-energy here
today.

VW04C002.Text:
For sure.
Arisugawa-senpai isn't here... and
Mickey's in the music room, right?

VW04C003.Text:
Without the two of them, it's
so...

VW04C005.Text:
(And Miki-kun
is in the music room...)

VW05X003.Text:
Arisugawa-senpai sure has a lot of
momentum, huh? At this rate, she's
going to go through everyone in
the club!

VW05X004.Text: So, go up and take your turn!

VW05X005.Text:
Ehhh? But, if I go up against
senpai today, I'm afraid I might
die...

VW05A001.Text:
What's wrong?
Isn't there anyone else who wants
to come up against me?

VW05A005.Text:
(I don't think I'm any kind of a
match for Juri-san...)

VW05A006.Text: (But, I want to help her out!)

VW05A007.Text:
(If by sparring with her, I can
help her practice even a bit...)

VW05B002.Text:
...this has nothing to do with
you.

VW05B003.Text:
Practicing this hard will damage
your body!
Why are you doing it, Juri-san?

VW05B004.Text:
My opponent tonight... is that
Sanjouin person.

VW05B005.Text:
Saionji is an idiot, but he's a
skillful swordsman.

VW05B006.Text:
If Sanjouin Chigusa managed to
defeat him, I shouldn't take her
abilities lightly...

VW05B008.Text:
Now, I know you came all the way
out here, but please leave.

VW05B009.Text:
I'm happy that you're worried
about my health, but your concern
is unnecessary.

VW05B011.Text:
Sorry I used such a harsh tone.
However, you don't need to worry,
so let me continue to practice.

VW05B012.Text:
Alright.
But please, don't push yourself
too hard.

VW06X001.Text:
Those two are amazing...
They've been at it almost an hour.

VW06X002.Text:
That girl is really going at it.
Even though she can't even graze
Arisugawa-senpai...

VW06X003.Text:
Well, at least she's making an
effort.

VW06X006.Text:
You've worked hard.
Let's stop here.

VW06X008.Text:
I'm the one who should be thanking
you. That was a good practice.

VW06X010.Text:
I'm going to be going to the
showers now.
Would you like to come, too?

VW06X011.Text:
(What should I do?
I'm totally sticky with sweat,
but...)

VW07X001.Text:
Juri-san, is it okay if I ask you
a question?

VW07X002.Text:
Sure, if it's something I can
answer.

VW07X004.Text:
What would you do if you got the
Power to Revolutionize the World?

VW07A001.Text:
I'm sorry.
That was too intrusive, wasn't it?
Please, forget I asked that.

VW07A002.Text:
No, it's fine.
I'll tell you.

VW07A003.Text:
I participate in the duel games in
order to disprove miracles with
the power to revolutionize the
world.

VW07A006.Text:
"Believe in miracles, and your
dreams will come true."

VW07A009.Text:
It's just a boring old story.
Forget about it.

VW07A011.Text:
(I don't really understand it,
but Juri's reason for dueling
seems really sad.)

VW07A012.Text:
(Fighting in order to disprove
something... that's just too sad!)

VW08A002.Text:
Ah, senpai.
I'm surprised you knew to find me
here.

VW08A003.Text:
I heard from the people in fencing
club.

VW08A005.Text:
And, about that letter from last
night...

VW08A006.Text: D-did you deliver it for me?

VW08A008.Text:
I guess you're right.
Asking you to deliver it was
too selfish.

VW08A009.Text:
It's not that...
There was nothing inside.

VW08A011.Text:
It looks like you were in such a
rush, you forgot to put in the
letter.

VW08A012.Text:
[sigh]
I guess there's no way Himemiya
-san and I...

VW08A013.Text:
Hey.
This was a love letter, right?

VW08A015.Text:
Busted! Miki-kun, you're very
smart, but you're not very good at
this sort of thing, are you?

VW08A017.Text:
(Ah, don't make that face...
You're getting me depressed too
now, somehow.)

VW08B002.Text:
Anthy seems like she's a stranger
to matters of love, too. You two
might be a better match than
you'd expect.

VW08B005.Text:
Thank you so much. I'll try to
write a letter again.

VW08B006.Text:
Yeah, that sounds good. But make
sure you put it in the envelope
this time, okay?

VW08C001.Text: Alright, leave it to your big sis!

VW08C003.Text:
To learn how to win the heart of a
girl, listening to a girl is best!

VW08C004.Text:
I'll teach you to write a love
letter, ask a girl out on a date,
and everything!

VW08C006.Text: Rest assured, leave it all to me!

VW08C007.Text:
So, meet me outside of the front
gate this afternoon, ok?

VW08D002.Text:
I'm surprised you knew to find me
here.

VW08D003.Text:
I heard from the people in fencing
club.

VW08D007.Text:
I mean, I guess Kozue-chan always
seems to be with Chigusa-san
lately...

VW08D008.Text:
Whoever Kozue is seeing...
It's none of my business.

VW08D009.Text:
(Miki-kun... You look awfully
depressed for someone who says
it's not his business...)

VW08E001.Text:
Aren't you worried about your
sister?

VW08E002.Text:
Like I said,
it's none of my business!

VW08E003.Text: Ah, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to...

VW08E004.Text: You didn't mean to get agitated?

VW08E005.Text:
Like I thought, Miki-kun. You're
worried about Kozue-chan after
all. That's why you responded like
that...

VW08E007.Text:
Kozue-chan is on your mind, right?
That's why you were so vehement...

VW08E008.Text:
Yeah, I guess so. Even though I
said we need to walk our own
paths...

VW08E010.Text:
I don't think so. I think it's
great that you care about her so
much.

VW08E012.Text:
Thank you. Hearing that from you
makes me feel a little better.

VW08E013.Text:
I might not look it, but I have
the edge over you in life
experience.

VW08E014.Text: Heehee, though only by one year.

VW08F003.Text:
But if Kozue wants to see her, who
am I to stop her?

VW08F004.Text:
Who are you? Miki-kun, you're
Kozue-chan's big brother, that's
who.

VW08F006.Text:
I know that. But there's nothing I
can do, is there...?

VW08F008.Text:
I'm sorry. Could you please leave
me alone? If you won't leave,
then...

VW08F009.Text:
No, I'm sorry. I'll go ahead and
leave.

VW08F010.Text:
But, you know, I don't think you
need a reason to protect your
loved ones.

VW09X001.Text:
(Should I listen to Miki play the
piano for a little longer?
Or should I go somewhere else?)

VW10X001.Text:
I've heard this melody before.
What's it called again?

VW10X002.Text:
"The Sunlit Garden"...
Kozue and I wrote it when we were
little.

VW10X003.Text:
Huh? But this is a famous song,
isn't it?

VW10X004.Text:
For as far back as I can remember,
Kozue and I always played with the
piano as our toy.

VW10X005.Text:
When we played the piano, the
adults around us would always be
amazed.

VW10X006.Text:
Huh, so Kozue-chan plays the
piano, too.

VW10X007.Text:
Yes. There was a shining thing in
my sister's piano-playing.

VW10X009.Text:
Yes. I continue to duel because I
want to obtain that shining thing.

VW10A001.Text:
So then, does it look like you'll
obtain your shining thing?

VW10A003.Text: I see. I'm friends with Utena,

VW10A004.Text:
so I can't cheer you on openly,
but good luck. I hope you get your
shining thing.

VW10B002.Text:
Besides, I'm sure that nothing you
obtain through the duels could
be your shining thing, Miki-kun.

VW10B003.Text:
No, I finally have found a shining
thing.

VW10B004.Text:
But she's the Rose Bride, and...
being the Rose Bride means...

VW10B006.Text:
I'm sorry. Could you please leave
me alone? If you won't leave,
then...

VW10B007.Text:
No, I'm sorry. I'll go ahead and
leave.

VW10B008.Text:
But, Miki-kun, I don't think
dueling suits you. See you later.

VW11A001.Text:
(It's closed...
Is it because Saionji-san lost to
Chigusa-san...?)

VW11A002.Text:
(Anyway, I guess it's no use
hanging around here.)

VW11B001.Text:
(It's closed...
That's right, the club president
Saionji-san is gone...)

VW11B002.Text:
(Anyway, I guess it's no use
hanging around here.)

VW11D003.Text:
(Oh, Anthy. It's rare to see her
without Utena.)

VW11D004.Text:
(But this is good timing. I'll try
asking her where Saionji-san is.)

VW11D005.Text:
Hey, Anthy! Good timing.
Would you happen to know where
Saionji-san is?

VW11D006.Text:
Saionji-senpai?
If you're looking for him, he's
probably in that place.

VW11E003.Text:
(Oh, Anthy?
But I thought she was in the
classroom just a moment ago...)

VW11E004.Text:
Oh?
Weren't you going to go visit
clubs?

VW11E005.Text:
Hey, Anthy! Good timing.
Would you happen to know where
Saionji-san is?

VW11E006.Text:
Saionji-senpai?
If you're looking for him, he's
probably in that place.

VW12X002.Text:
(T... this is embarrassing...
But I also can't really take my
eyes off him.)

VW12X003.Text:
(His wet hair is kind of sexy...
He's a really attractive guy.)

VW12X004.Text:
(And the way that loincloth is
cutting into his butt...
Aah! So sexy...!)

VW12X006.Text:
Oh, it's you...
I'm surprised you knew I was here.

VW12A003.Text:
(Huh?
He's not all that happy about it
today, is he?)

VW12A005.Text:
"She?"
Oh, Anthy.
Well, she seemed fine to me.

VW12A006.Text:
I see. Although you can't see me,
you're still striving to keep your
chin up, Anthy.

VW12A007.Text:
But, until I beat that Sanjouin
Chigusa, I won't see you, Anthy.
No, I can't.

VW12A009.Text:
I've decided that, until I win
against her, I'm abstaining from
Anthy.

VW12A011.Text:
Ohhh! It's unbearable!
But I must continue my special
training. I hope my spirit is
sufficiently disciplined.

VW12A013.Text:
Soon I shall defeat Sanjouin, then
ride that momentum to defeat that
boy-girl Tenjou...

VW12A014.Text:
With this arm, I'll take you back.
Oh, Anthy!
You're my Rose Bride - mine only.

VW12A016.Text:
(Huh. I thought that Saionji-san
was feeling kind of worn down...)

VW12A017.Text:
(But thank goodness, it looks like
he's energetic as usual.)

VW12B001.Text:
Well, I really had to search
around to find you...

VW12B002.Text:
I see. By the way, how's Tenjou
Utena doing?

VW12B003.Text:
Utena? I guess she seems the same
as usual.

VW12B004.Text:
Hmph. As always, that girl is
completely without integrity.

VW12B006.Text:
Even though she has a duel
tomorrow, she's not doing even a
little special training, or
cleansing herself under a
waterfall, or anything.

VW12B008.Text:
In any case, I'll be the one to
win in the end.

VW12B010.Text:
Special training. I may be a
prodigy, but I still can't slack
off in my efforts. Heh.

VW13X001.Text:
Saionji-san, can I ask you a
question?

VW13X003.Text:
Saionji-san, why do you want the
Power to Revolutionize the World?

VW13X006.Text:
They say that the person engaged
to the Rose Bride will some day
rise up and enter the castle that
floats above the Dueling Arena.

VW13X008.Text:
Together with her, I will obtain
that eternal thing.

VW13X009.Text:
She told me that she desires
eternity as well...

VW14X001.Text:
(Alright, I'm going to try to find
Touga! But I wonder where he
is...?)

VW14X002.Text:
Hey. What are you doing around
here? There's no practice today,
you know.

VW14X004.Text:
The club captain hasn't shown his
face since yesterday's duel, you
see. And the vice-captain tends to
skip practice, too.

VW14A001.Text:
Tends to skip practice? Touga-san,
aren't YOU the vice-captain?

VW14A002.Text:
Oh, am I? I hardly ever come to
club meetings, so I'd completely
forgotten.

VW14A005.Text:
According to the masked Duelist,
you'll likely die tomorrow.

VW14A006.Text:
Despite that, here you are to
observe clubs.

VW14A008.Text:
Well, that's fine. After all, the
one dueling tomorrow is Tenjou
Utena, not you.

VW14A009.Text:
You should take your time and
enjoy what might be your last day
on Earth.

VW14A010.Text:
(My last day on Earth... Is it
really? Will I vanish, just like
that masked person said...?)

VW14B001.Text:
Um, did you learn anything about
Chigusa-san?

VW14B002.Text:
I mean, Touga-san, you said you'd
keep an eye on her...

VW14B003.Text:
Yes, I did find out something
interesting.

VW14B004.Text:
They say that she's been away from
the school for three years.

VW14B005.Text: That would make her my classmate.

VW14B006.Text:
But I don't remember her at all.
And she's not exactly
inconspicuous.

VW14B008.Text:
Of course, I also checked the
student directory from three years
ago. She isn't in there, either.

VW14B009.Text:
I was about to go to the library
to do some research... would you
like to come with me?

VW14B010.Text:
We may learn more details about
Sanjouin Chigusa.

VW15X001.Text:
Well well, if it isn't you two.
Where are you off to?

VW15X002.Text:
It's a secret. I've invited her on
a date course that I've been
keeping in reserve.

VW15X004.Text:
(What should I do...
I'm definitely suspicious of
Chigusa-san, but...)

VW15A002.Text:
There, you heard her. We're about
to head out on a date.

VW15B001.Text:
Sorry, Chigusa-san.
We're on a date, so could you move
out of the way?

VW15C002.Text:
You're going to snatch him away
like this again!?

VW15C003.Text:
Without any talent, without any
effort, you're going to snatch him
from me again!?

VW15C005.Text:
Hah! Oh, it hurts, princess?
Then why don't you cry about it?

VW15C007.Text:
Why?
Honestly, you people always act so
innocent when you hurt others!

VW15C009.Text:
That's what I can't forgive about
you people.

VW15C011.Text:
(Chigusa-san, why do you look so
sad...? You seem so different from
normal.)

VW15C014.Text:
(She's usually so composed,
but she got so mad...
What on earth could it be?)

VW15C015.Text:
(Chigusa-san, I don't understand
anything about you...!)

VW16X002.Text:
Yes, the materials you asked about
are all currently checked out.

VW16X004.Text:
Let's see... apparently, they're
all being borrowed by someone
named Sanjouin.

VW16X005.Text:
If you absolutely need them,
please try asking her directly.

VW16X009.Text:
There's nothing to be done. We
should look for another method.

VW16X010.Text:
I'll check the Student Council
archives.

VW16X011.Text:
You should approach it from your
own angle.

VW16X013.Text:
I suspect that she's the sixth
Duelist.
I'm counting on your help.

VW17X001.Text:
Oh, no!
It's that time already?

VW17X003.Text:
I forgot that I was going to go
help out the baseball team!

VW17X004.Text:
Uh oh!
I guess it's already over, huh?

VW17X005.Text:
Yeah... it probably is. But I
should go and see, anyway.

VW17X006.Text: Maybe they found a pinch hitter.

VW17X007.Text:
That's wishful thinking, isn't it?
Without you there, they probably
already lost.

VW17X009.Text: Oh, wait! I'll come cheer you on!

VC24X001.Text:
Um, teacher. You called for me by
name on the intercom --
what is it?

VC24X002.Text:
Ah, sorry for the trouble.
Actually... there was a phone call
from the police earlier.

VC24X005.Text:
(I haven't done anything that the
police would call for me in for
yet...)

VC24X006.Text:
They said they'd found something
of yours that you'd dropped.
Did you go into town yesterday?

VC24X007.Text:
(Ah... oh, I just lost something,
huh?)

VC24X008.Text:
Um, yeah.
I went to buy gym clothes for
today's class.

VC24X009.Text:
Is that right?
You must have lost it then.

VC24X010.Text:
Well, I could have just told you
tomorrow, but I thought it might
be something you need.

VC24X011.Text:
Um, yes.
Thank you very much.
I'll go pick it up right away.

VC24X012.Text:
Sure. They have it at the police
box in front of the port.
Don't be too late.

VC25A001.Text:
Sorry to keep you waiting,
Miki-kun.

VC25A002.Text:
Not at all.
I'm just grateful that you're
helping me today.

VC25A003.Text:
Yep!
Just leave it to your "big sis".

VC25A004.Text:
But before that, I have a little
errand.

VC25A005.Text:
Can you wait for me in front of
the fancy goods store?

VC25A007.Text:
No, no, that's okay! It's just a
little personal errand.

VC25A009.Text:
Geez! When a girl seems like she
doesn't want to give you a reason
for something, you shouldn't pry.

VC25A010.Text:
Uh, right!
I'll see you later, then.

VC25A011.Text:
(Going to the police to pick up
something I lost is pretty uncool,
so I'd rather he not see it.)

VC25B002.Text:
(What could it be? I don't feel
like I'm missing anything in
particular...)

VC26X001.Text:
Excuse me, I'm %F %N.
I received a message that you were
keeping something of mine...

VC26X002.Text:
Ah, you're here. We've been
waiting.

VC26X003.Text:
Just to make sure, will you take a
look inside, and confirm that
nothing's missing?

VC26X005.Text:
Were you out visiting someone
sick, or something?

VC26X008.Text: Yes. I wasn't carrying an apple.

VC26X009.Text:
Huh, how odd... what should we do?
Hey, looks like there's something
else in here.

VC26X010.Text: Isn't this a picture of you?

VC26X011.Text:
This picture... it's of my mother,
when she was young. Why did
somebody tear it so violently...?

VC26X012.Text:
And then, this apple...
Who on earth...?
And why...?

VC26X016.Text:
Who was it who brought in these
items!?

VC26X017.Text:
Let me think...
She was tall, and I thought she
was a man at first...

VC26X018.Text:
...I'm fairly sure she said she
was a student at Ohtori Academy.

VC26X019.Text:
(It was Chigusa-san!
Why did she do this?)

VC26X020.Text:
Hey. Are you involved in some kind
of trouble?

VC26X021.Text:
Uh, no, I'm fine.
It was probably just some kind of
practical joke.

VC26X024.Text:
You look really pale...
Are you sure you're alright?

VC26X026.Text:
(Chigusa-san, this is so cruel!
Not just me, but my mother's
picture...)

VC43B002.Text:
(It looks like a pretty upscale
place, so I'll just go in for some
tea.)

VC43B004.Text:
Hey, what a coincidence. Are you
shopping today or something?

VC43B005.Text:
You aren't waiting to
meet up with a date, are you...?

VC43B008.Text:
No, it's nothing!
What're you doing here, Utena?

VC43B009.Text: Ahh, I came to buy this.

VC43B010.Text:
It's the kind that you and Anthy
use. Did one of them break?

VC43B013.Text:
It felt like we were leaving you
out of the group when you were the
only one with a different one,

VC43B014.Text:
so Himemiya wondered if you
were feeling down.

VC43B016.Text:
(I can never tell what Anthy's
thinking, but she honestly is a
really nice girl, isn't she...)

VC43B017.Text: By the way, what's up today?

VC43C001.Text:
Oh, I just come to drink some tea.
There wasn't really a deep meaning
to it.

VC43C002.Text:
Honest, I only came because I kind
of felt like it.

VC43C003.Text:
(I wonder if the lady doth
protest too much...)

VC43C004.Text:
Hmm, so that's all.
But sometimes you just feel that
way, you know?

VC43C006.Text:
(Whew, I'm lucky Utena's not the
type to sweat the details...)

VC43C008.Text:
(I don't wanna say the wrong thing
and make her worry about me any
more.)

VC43D001.Text:
(All right, let's just come out
with it and talk about earlier.
If I talk to someone about it,
I might feel a little better...)

VC43D002.Text:
The truth is, I came because I
heard something I'd lost had been
delivered to a police box, but...

VC43D003.Text:
Hmmm, I had no idea. That must've
been a disaster.

VC43D005.Text:
From now on, if any weird lost
items pop up, tell me about it.

VC43D006.Text:
I'll open the box up first for
you.

VC43D007.Text:
That way, even if it's a time bomb
or a razor, you won't have to
worry.

VC43D009.Text:
(That's not quite right...
but hey, whatever.)

VC43D010.Text:
(Not worrying about stuff too
much, like Utena,)

VC43D011.Text:
(might be the trick to doing well
here at Ohtori Academy...)

VC43E002.Text:
(Is there a chance that Utena will
be here again today...?)

VC43E004.Text:
Hey, you came today too?
You must really like it here.

VC43E006.Text:
So what brings you into town
today? Shopping or something?

VC43E007.Text:
You aren't waiting to
meet up with a date, are you...?

VC44B001.Text:
(The classical cafe might be the
best for calming myself
down.)

VC44B004.Text:
What's wrong?
You have a sad look in your eyes.

VC44B006.Text:
Yeah, I understand everything
about you.

VC44B007.Text:
(Is he serious? Touga-san is such
a playboy, you can never tell.)

VC44C001.Text:
Okay then, can I ask you a few
questions?

VC44C010.Text:
Your best subject is language
arts. Your karaoke specialty is
Rondo Revolution.

VC44C011.Text:
You sleep in pajamas.
You haven't had your first kiss
yet.

VC44C012.Text: Do you have any other questions?

VC44C015.Text:
Whoa, is it that time already?
I'm afraid I'll have to excuse
myself.

VC44C016.Text:
If it's okay with you, let's meet
again tonight. I'll leave the door
to my room unlocked.

VC44C018.Text:
("I'll leave the door to my room
unlocked"... he said. What an
adult thing to say.)

VC44C019.Text:
(I wonder if I should take him
seriously? Tonight, I might
just... hee!)

VC44D001.Text:
Really?
Do you really understand me?

VC44D002.Text:
Yes, of course.
Everything about you.

VC44D003.Text:
However, the atmosphere isn't
quite right for us to understand
everything about each other.

VC44D005.Text:
I'll be waiting in my room
tonight.

VC44D007.Text:
("I'll be waiting in my room"...
 What an adult thing to say.)

VC44D008.Text:
(I wonder if I should take him
seriously? Tonight, I might
just... hee!)

VC44E001.Text:
(The classical cafe might be the
best for calming myself
down.)

VC44E002.Text: Hey. So you came back again today?

VC44E004.Text:
What's wrong?
You have a sad look in your eyes
today.

VC44E006.Text:
Yeah, I understand everything
about you.

VC44E007.Text:
(Is he serious? Touga-san is such
a playboy, you can never tell.)

VC44F001.Text:
Okay then, can I ask you a few
questions?

VC44F010.Text:
Your best subject is language
arts. Your karaoke specialty is
Rondo Revolution.

VC44F011.Text:
You sleep in pajamas.
You haven't had your first kiss
yet.

VC44F012.Text: Do you have any other questions?

VC44F015.Text:
Whoa, is it that time already?
I'm afraid I'll have to excuse
myself.

VC44F016.Text:
