If it's okay with you, let's meet
again tonight. I'll leave the door
to my room unlocked.

VC44F018.Text:
("I'll leave the door to my room
unlocked"... he said. What an
adult thing to say.)

VC44F019.Text:
(I wonder if it would be okay if
I really went...?)

VC44G001.Text:
Really?
Do you really understand me?

VC44G002.Text:
Yes, of course.
Everything about you.

VC44G003.Text:
However, the atmosphere isn't
quite right for us to understand
everything about each other.

VC44G005.Text:
I'll be waiting in my room
tonight.

VC44G007.Text:
("I'll be waiting in my room"...
 What an adult thing to say.)

VC44G008.Text:
(I wonder if it would be okay if
I really went...?)

VC45A001.Text:
Oh, huh, they're closed...
Nothing I can do about that.
Let's head to some other shop.

VC45B002.Text:
(I've been so busy with the
transfer, I haven't been in one
recently.)

VC45B003.Text:
(I wonder if they have that
fighting game I used to like.)

VC45B004.Text:
(Hey, they have it!
And it looks like nobody's using
this side.)

VC45B005.Text:
(Alright, just for fun, I'll give
it a go!)

VC45B006.Text:
(What's that? Looks like they're
in an uproar over there.)

VC45B007.Text:
Amazing! Finally, 100 opponents
beaten in sucession!

VC45B008.Text:
Phoenix Sara...
It's the Legendary Phoenix Sara.

VC45B009.Text:
(100 opponents in a row?
Amazing!
I wonder who it is...)

VC45B011.Text:
Hey, it's you.
So, how about it?

VC45B013.Text:
(...alright! When it comes to this
game, I'm also pretty confident.)

VC45B015.Text:
The other machine appears to be
open.

VC45B016.Text:
Uh, okay!
Then, please take me on!

VC45C001.Text:
I lost.
It's been a long time since
I lost at this game.

VC45C002.Text:
Well... I just got a little lucky,
is all.

VC45C003.Text:
No, it was your skill. You won
through your own skill. So...
would you please fight me again?

VC45D001.Text:
(Oh yeah, when I challenged
Juri-san yesterday, she kicked my
butt...)

VC45D002.Text:
(Yeah, now that I've taken a step
back, I really do suck at fighting
games.)

VC45D003.Text:
(All right! Maybe I'll practice
a little for when I fight Juri-san
next time...)

VC45D004.Text:
(What's that? Looks like they're
in an uproar over there... Could
it be--?)

VC45D005.Text:
Amazing! Finally, 200 opponents
beaten in sucession!

VC45D006.Text:
That's the Legendary Phoenix Sara
for you!

VC45D009.Text:
Hey, so it's you. Does this mean
you want a return match?

VC45D011.Text:
(L-let's do this. I can't stand
staying the loser. I'll win for
sure this time...)

VC45D012.Text:
The other machine appears to be
open.

VC45D013.Text:
Uh, okay!
Then, please take me on!

VC45E002.Text:
This is the first time since I was
born that I've lost on this
character...

VC45E003.Text:
Well... I just got a little lucky,
is all.

VC45E004.Text:
No, it was your skill. Next time,
I'll be the one to come challenge
you.

VC45E005.Text: When I do, will you accept?

VC46A001.Text:
Oh, huh, they're closed...
Nothing I can do about that.
Let's head to some other shop.

VC46B001.Text:
(Yeah. There's nothing better than
sweets for when you're feeling
depressed.)

VC46B004.Text:
Do you like sweet things too,
Miki-kun?

VC46B005.Text:
Huh? Yes. The cake at this shop is
delicious, so I come here often.

VC46B006.Text:
Oh.
Can I sit next to you?

VC46B009.Text: Oh no, it's not that, but...

VC46B010.Text:
Why don't we sit in those seats
over there?
I'll move, too.

VC46C002.Text:
You know, when you transfer
schools, all sorts of stress piles
up,

VC46C003.Text:
like moving and making new friends
and classes.

VC46C004.Text: So it's hard for me to relax.

VC46C005.Text:
Oh, I see. The Napoleons here
are delicious.

VC46C006.Text: What is it that you like, senpai?

VC46C007.Text:
Hmmm, I like Napoleons too, but my
favorite is Mont Blanc, I guess.

VC46C008.Text:
Oh, the Mont Blancs are great
here too.

VC46C009.Text:
They use cream with chocolate in
it, not simple chestnut cream; it
tastes divine!

VC46C010.Text:
Ohh, all right, in that case, I'll
take one of those Mont Blancs!

VC46C011.Text:
(Yeah. Let's eat some delicious
cake and quit moping already!)

VC46D001.Text:
The truth is, I came because I
heard something I'd lost had been
delivered to a police box, but...

VC46D003.Text:
I'm sorry; you came all this way
to eat some delicious cake, and
here I dump this on you...

VC46D004.Text:
No, not at all. I'm sorry I did a
poor job of comforting you...

VC46D005.Text:
No, don't worry about it. Just
having you hear me out has made me
feel tons better...

VC46D009.Text:
(That's right. That wasn't a
conversation to make over
delicious cake.)

VC46D010.Text:
(I was supposed to come here to
relax, too.)

VC46D011.Text:
(Now I just don't know what I came
here to do... I'm such an idiot.)

VC46E001.Text:
(Yeah. There's nothing better than
sweets for when you're feeling
blue.)

VC46E006.Text:
Oh.
Well then,
do you mind if I sit next to you?

VC46E007.Text:
Uh, actually...
I'll come move over to you.

VC46F001.Text:
I really like this place's cake.
Miki-kun, I understand now why you
always come here.

VC46F003.Text:
My favorite is their Napoleon,
but what kind of cake do you like,
senpai?

VC46F005.Text:
The Mont Blancs here are very
good.

VC46F006.Text:
They use cream with chocolate in
it, not simple chestnut cream; it
tastes divine!

VC46F007.Text:
Really?
Then I'll try ordering one today.

VC46F008.Text:
(Yeah. Let's eat some delicious
cake and quit moping already!)

VC47A001.Text:
Oh, huh, they're closed...
Nothing I can do about that.
Let's head to some other shop.

VC47B001.Text:
(When you're feeling down, you've
gotta go for a mellow, Eastern-
style atmosphere. Let's try here!)

VC47B005.Text:
Don't just stand there; why don't
you have a seat?

VC47B007.Text:
I don't really care. I was just
thinking that it's about time
I left.

VC47C001.Text:
You can't... I only just went out
of my way to come here,

VC47C002.Text:
so let's take it easy for a little
longer.

VC47C003.Text:
No. I've taken it easy more than
enough. Excuse me.

VC47C004.Text:
Don't say that. Please hang around
to chat with me, just for a
little.

VC47C005.Text: Shut up! I loathe women's chatter!

VC47C006.Text:
Ladies really are best when
they're quiet and mild-mannered.
Yes, like Himemiya Anthy...

VC47C007.Text:
You should learn from Anthy a
little, too.

VC47C008.Text:
You're living with her, so try
to to take a leaf out of
her book.

VC47C010.Text:
(So Saionji-san likes traditional
Japanese girls. I totally blew
it...)

VC47C011.Text:
(Somehow, I do nothing but piss
people off.)

VC47C012.Text:
(I bet I pissed Chigusa-san off
like this, too...)

VC47D001.Text:
I see. Do you have some business
to attend to after this?

VC47D002.Text:
I'm heading back to my special
training. Having lost to Sanjouin,
I can't afford to leave myself
as I was.

VC47D003.Text:
I guess there's no helping it.
I'd wanted to be with you for a
little longer, Saionji-san, but...

VC47D004.Text:
Please do your best with the
special training.

VC47D005.Text: Yes, just leave it to me.

VC47E001.Text:
(When you're feeling down, you've
gotta go for a mellow, Eastern-
style atmosphere.

VC47E002.Text:
(Saionji-san was here yesterday...
could he be here again today, too?

VC47E004.Text:
Oh, it's you.
Come to drink Japanese tea again,
eh?

VC47E006.Text:
Don't just stand there; why don't
you have a seat?

VC47E008.Text:
I don't really care. I was just
thinking that it's about time
I left.

VC48X002.Text:
Uh, senpai, is something wrong?
You look pale.

VC48X003.Text:
I'm fine.
I think I have a bit of a cold.

VC48X004.Text:
(...If I told him about what
happened at the police box,
he'd just worry.)

VC48X005.Text:
I see.
Well, don't push yourself.

VC48X006.Text: Please, tell me if you get tired.

VC48X008.Text:
But, I feel better just from your
concern.

VC48X009.Text:
I wasn't worried just to try and
score points with you.

VC48X010.Text:
Uh, you know, girls hate getting
treated like they're all the same.

VC48X011.Text:
I want to feel like you're
treating me specially.

VC48X012.Text:
So it's important that I notice
a little difference.

VC48X014.Text:
Well then, let's start in on
today's main subject.

VC48X015.Text:
All girls are weak against
presents.

VC48X016.Text:
So first, get your partner's
interest with a present.

VC48X018.Text:
Your first date should be
something like a movie.

VC48X019.Text:
You shouldn't do something
really romantic right away.

VC48X020.Text:
That way they won't be too
self-conscious.

VC48X021.Text:
Watch something fun, like a comedy
or action movie.

VC48X023.Text: After the movie, go have tea!

VC48X024.Text:
You can ease into conversation by
talking about the movie you just
saw.

VC48X026.Text:
Once you're done with tea, it
should already be getting into the
evening.

VC48X027.Text:
Even a normal park should have a
romantic feeling.

VC48X029.Text:
Well? We're done going over the
standard date course for now, so
how about inviting Anthy next?

VC48X030.Text:
Well, in any case, I've gained
some confidence.
Thank you for today, sensei!

VC48X031.Text:
Very good indeed!
Now then, one final practical-use
question.

VC48X032.Text:
It's evening. You're bathed in the
sunset, and there's a good mood
between the two of you.

VC48X033.Text:
You're thinking that you want to
stay together a little longer.

VC48X035.Text:
Right.
So, what should the boy do then?

VC48X037.Text:
Bzzzt, totally missed the target!
The correct answer is this.

VC48X038.Text: Ahh... h, hang on a moment!

VC48X039.Text:
That's no good! If the girl is
acting assertive, you shouldn't
reject her.

VC48X041.Text:
The correct answer is to
nonchalantly take the girl's arm.

VC48X042.Text: O... oh, so that's what to do?

VC48X043.Text:
That's right! If you get it, then
hold her a little closer. Match
her pace; don't go too quickly.

VC48X044.Text:
Um, yes...
Kind of like this?

VC48X047.Text:
(Right, I guess since he does so
much fencing... and he's a boy...)

VC48X048.Text:
What's wrong?
Your face looks red.

VC48X049.Text:
Huh? Oh, no, not at all.
It's just because of the sunset,
I'm sure.

VC48X050.Text:
(That's right... I'm his teacher,
so I shouldn't do this.)

VC48X052.Text:
(Right. I'm just a replacement for
Anthy. I mustn't get the wrong
idea...)

VC49X002.Text:
(I took the role of the older
sister, and said I'd teach
Miki-kun about girls...)

VC49X003.Text:
(I'm getting all worked up over
Miki. Even though he said he liked
Anthy, I'm using such cowardly
methods.)

VC49X006.Text:
I heard from Chigusa-san. You
shameless girl. I'll never hand
over Miki to someone like you.

VC49X008.Text:
Hmph, playing dumb?
Why not try asking yourself that
question?

VC50X001.Text:
Oh, thank goodness!
You came to.

VC50X003.Text:
You fell down some stairs.
You were out for about an hour.
What happened?

VC50X004.Text:
(I fell down the stairs...?
That's right, I... Kozue-chan...)

VC50X005.Text:
(But I can't tell Miki-kun that
Kozue-chan did it...)

VC50X006.Text:
Oh, it was nothing. I was just
lost in thought. I guess I'm
really careless, huh?

VC50X009.Text:
It was Kozue's handiwork, right?
This kind of thing has happened
before.

VC50X012.Text:
She doesn't usually do this sort
of thing, but... she's been a
little strange since we entered
middle school.

VC50X013.Text:
I really don't understand my
little sister anymore.
What should I do...?

VC50X014.Text:
She's probably jealous.
It's because you're so important
to her.

VC51X002.Text:
Oh, welcome back.
You were out late, weren't you?
Dinner is ready.

VC51X003.Text:
Oh, you're right!
Well, I'll just drop my bag off,
and then I'll be down in a moment.

VC52X007.Text:
Well, first of all, let's clean it
up.

VC52X011.Text:
My fencing saber isn't here.
The one that my father gave me.

VC52X012.Text:
I had it standing against my
bed...

VC53A002.Text:
It was quite a sudden call.
By any chance, are you inviting me
on a date?

VC53A004.Text:
You said you were at Ohtori
Academy three years ago? That
would make you the same age as me.

VC53A005.Text:
Yet I don't remember you being
here.

VC53A006.Text:
And there's no way I would forget
the existence of someone as extra-
ordinary as you.

VC53A007.Text:
I see... I was hoping I could save
you for last,

VC53A008.Text:
but I suppose there's no helping
it, prince.

VC53A010.Text: Yes. You so resemble my prince...

VC53B002.Text:
I thought I might find you if I
came here too.

VC53B003.Text:
Hmm.
Do you have business with me?

VC53B004.Text:
Fight me, Sanjouin.
I, Saionji Kyouichi, won't lose to
you a second time.

VC53B005.Text:
I heard that you lost to Tenjou
Utena twice, though.

VC53B007.Text:
Heh heh heh.... our dueling ground
is already set up inside.
Come on in, Saionji Kyouichi-kun.

VC53C002.Text:
Aren't you a little early for our
appointment? I believe you said
midnight.

VC53C003.Text:
You aren't the only business I
need to attend to around here.

VC53C004.Text:
Well, whatever. I've come like you
asked, so keep your end of the
bargain.

VC53C005.Text:
My end?
Oh, you're talking about that
locket with the cute girl inside.

VC53C006.Text:
I'm not going to let you bait me.
Just hand it over.

VC53C007.Text:
Unfortunately, I left the locket
inside. Why don't we go in and get
it?

VC53C008.Text:
Don't look so suspicious,
Arisugawa Juri-kun.
This won't take long.

VC53D002.Text:
Kozue...
So you're here after all...

VC53D003.Text:
What?
I'm free to date who I please.

VC53D006.Text:
Miki-kun... I'd like for us to get
along better than we have.
What do you say?

VC53D007.Text:
Why have you gotten close to
Kozue? Is it to win your duel
against Tenjou-senpai?

VC53D008.Text:
I should warn you... whatever
happens to me, it's not going to
affect the outcome of that duel.

VC53D009.Text:
As I'd expect from the boy
genius. You catch on quick.
But you've made one mistake.

VC53D011.Text:
The outcome of the duel might
indeed depend on you...

VC54X001.Text:
Cheer up. I reported it to the
school, so I'm sure they'll catch
the culprit.

VC54X003.Text:
After dinner, we'll take another
look around.

VC54X004.Text:
Maybe you just left it in the
bathroom, or on the roof or
somewhere. That kind of thing
happens a lot.

VC54X008.Text:
We're all out of soy sauce,
Utena-sama.

VC54X009.Text:
That's a problem... we're having
fried shrimp tonight.

VC54X010.Text:
Yes. After all, you can't have
fried shrimp without soy sauce...

VC54X011.Text:
Okay! Let's borrow some from
someone.

VC54X012.Text:
And while we're at it, we'll ask
them to eat with us. It'll be a
party!

VC54X014.Text:
See, you think so too, right?
Now, who should we call...?
Have any requests?

VC54B002.Text:
I'll bet he's out on a date with
some girl.

VC54B003.Text:
Well, that's fine - let's give up
on that playboy and call someone
else.

VC54C002.Text:
Yes, that's right.
Actually, we're out of soy sauce.

VC54C003.Text:
Yes. Yes, thank you.
Oh, you'd like to give
us something?

VC54C004.Text:
Yes, I understand.
Thank you for your trouble.

VC54C005.Text:
Kiryuu-senpai says that he'll be
over soon.

VC54C006.Text: What does he want to give us?

VC54C007.Text:
I wonder? In any case, he said he
would bring it over.

VC54C008.Text:
Man, I hope it's not another
dress, or lipstick, or something.
Honestly, he's such a playboy.

VC54E002.Text:
Really? Well, forget that guy.
Let's call someone else.

VC54F002.Text:
Yes, that's right.
Actually, we're out of soy sauce.

VC54F003.Text:
Yes. Yes, thank you.
Oh, you'd like to give
us something?

VC54F004.Text:
Yes, I understand.
Thank you for your trouble.

VC54F005.Text:
Saionji-senpai says that he'll be
over soon.

VC54F006.Text: What does he want to give us?

VC54F007.Text:
I wonder? In any case, he said he
would bring it over.

VC54F008.Text:
Is this going to be like that
exchange diary thing again?
Man, how annoying...

VC54H002.Text:
Really? Well, nothing we can do
about that. Let's call someone
else.

VC54I002.Text:
Yes, that's right.
Actually, we're out of soy sauce.

VC54I003.Text:
Yes. Yes, thank you.
Oh, you'd like to give
us something?

VC54I004.Text:
Yes, I understand.
Thank you for your trouble.

VC54I005.Text:
Arisugawa-senpai says that she'll
be over soon.

VC54I006.Text: What does she want to give us?

VC54I007.Text:
I wonder?
Anyway, she said she'd bring it
over.

VC54I008.Text:
What could it be?
Now I'm curious...

VC54K002.Text:
Huh, and Kozue-chan isn't there
either? Weird...

VC54K003.Text:
Well, if they're out, then that's
that. Let's call someone else.

VC54L002.Text:
Why, yes.
Actually, we're out of soy sauce.

VC54L003.Text:
Yes, could you?
Oh, there's something you want to
give us?

VC54L005.Text:
Miki-san says that he'll be over
soon.

VC54L006.Text: What does he want to give us?

VC54L007.Text:
I wonder? In any case, he said he
would bring it over.

VC54L008.Text:
I wonder what it is.
Think it might be a love
letter...?

VC54M001.Text:
Oh dear, Utena-sama...
I'm afraid I don't know Chigusa-
san's phone number.

VC54M003.Text:
And if we go all the way out to
her, the fried shrimp is gonna get
cold...

VC54M004.Text:
No helping it, I guess.
Let's call someone else.

VC55X002.Text:
So you were planning on cutting me
out and enjoying a dinner with my
brother? Nice try, Tenjou Utena!

VC55X003.Text:
I'm not really the one who
invited...

VC55X005.Text:
You're right! Then the one who
slipped in and stole it from your
room was...

VC55X006.Text:
What?
Are you calling me a thief?

VC55X007.Text:
Well, sorry to dissipoint you!
This monkey was carrying the
saber.

VC55X009.Text:
So that's what you wanted to give
us? ...Does that mean Chu-chu is
responsible for that room!?

VC55X010.Text: My. You did a bad thing, Chu-chu!

VC55X012.Text: He's saying that it wasn't him.

VC55X013.Text:
Yeah, I guess there's no way
Chu-chu could wreck a room that
badly.

VC55X014.Text:
Either way, isn't it about time to
go inside?

VC55X015.Text: You invited me over, didn't you?

VC55X016.Text:
And I brought over this specially-
ordered Southern Italian soy
sauce.

VC55X017.Text:
European soy sauce?
Isn't that kind of weird?

VC55X018.Text:
Well, anyway, now that my saber
has been returned, let's eat.

VC55X019.Text: The fried shrimp will get cold.

VC56X001.Text:
[munch, munch...]
Man, soy sauce really does go well
with fried shrimp.

VC56X002.Text:
These fried oysters are good as
well, Utena-sama.

VC56X003.Text:
I can't believe you're eating
fried shrimp with soy sauce!

VC56X004.Text:
The best thing with fried shrimp
is mayonnaise. Don't you agree?

VC56X006.Text:
Anyway, I'm really glad that the
saber was returned.

VC56X007.Text:
Yeah. Touga-san, really, thank you
very much.

VC56X008.Text:
No, it's nothing you need to thank
me for.

VC56X009.Text:
I'm more concerned about whoever
trashed your room.

VC56X011.Text:
Oh, I'm sure there was nothing
worth stealing in her room,

VC56X012.Text:
or in this entire building, for
that matter.

VC56X015.Text:
And I was so sure you couldn't
hear me. I'm sorry!

VC56X018.Text:
No, nothing was stolen.
I mean, at first I thought the
saber was, but...

VC56X019.Text:
But since Chu-Chu was carrying
that...
I wonder what this was all about.

VC56X020.Text:
Hmm... and none of the other rooms
were ransacked?

VC56X022.Text:
I see... that's worrying.
In that case, how about sleeping
in my room tonight?

VC56X023.Text:
I could protect you during the
night.

VC56A001.Text:
Is... is that really alright?
Thank you!

VC56A002.Text:
H, hey...
If you go to this guy's room, you
have no idea what might happen!

VC56A003.Text:
Such harsh words.
Could you possibly be jealous?

VC56A006.Text:
There's no way you'd invite a
worthless girl from who-knows-
where like her to our house.

VC56A007.Text: You've gone a bit too far, Nanami.

VC56A009.Text:
Well, it's fine.
The night is still young.

VC56A010.Text:
Please think it over.
My door will be unlocked...

VC56A012.Text:
(I... I wonder if it's seriously
okay to do that. Then maybe,
tonight I could... ah!)

VC56B001.Text: I'm not that kind of girl!

VC56B002.Text:
Oh, dear. I'm afraid I overstepped
my bounds.

VC56B003.Text:
Of course you did!
If you think you can draw in any
woman, you're completely wrong.

VC56B004.Text:
Hmph, spoken by a woman with a
true inferiority complex.

VC56B005.Text:
My big brother would never go out
with a girl like you anyway, so of
course you go "No, no! I would
never!"...

VC56B008.Text:
Hey, we're in the middle of a
meal, you two. Take it somewhere
else.

VC56C001.Text:
Um, thanks for the concern,
but I think I'll pass.

VC56C003.Text:
Obviously, my big brother was just
being polite anyway.
Don't take it seriously.

VC56C004.Text:
A girl like you from who-knows-
where couldn't pass the threshold
of our house,

VC56C006.Text:
To catch my brother's attention,
you would need to be

VC56C007.Text:
attractive in face and figure,
good at all sports, excellent in
her studies, quick-witted, pretty
and pure of heart...

VC56C008.Text:
luxurious and gorgeous, smooth
sailing, auspicious for all
occasions, born in the Pure Land,
a beauty fated to die young,
and truly outrageous,

VC56C009.Text:
...or at the very least, not an
unfortunate weirdo.

VC56C010.Text:
Hey!
Are you guys listening to me!?

VC56C011.Text:
Of course. You're explaining how
you're a really shy, bashful
person, right?

VC56C012.Text:
Hey, pay attention to what I'm
saying...!!

VC57X001.Text:
Ohh, Anthy! I can acutely feel
your love for me in this kind
invitation to dinner...

VC57X004.Text:
Hmph, this? This monkey came over
to my place carrying this sword,
and challenged me.

VC57X005.Text:
Of course, he was simply defeated
again. Ha ha ha ha.

VC57X006.Text:
Man, Saionji, you're so cruel!
Are you okay, Chu-Chu?

VC57X009.Text:
But then, if Chu-Chu took the
saber, then what about the room?
Did he also...?

VC57X010.Text: My. You did a bad thing, Chu-chu!

VC57X012.Text: He's saying that it wasn't him.

VC57X013.Text:
Yeah, I guess there's no way
Chu-chu could wreck a room that
badly.

VC57X014.Text:
I don't really care either way,
but do you want the soy sauce,
or not?

VC57X015.Text:
I brought my treasured Shiba
Prefecture-made, vintage 17 year-
old sauce, after all...

VC57X017.Text:
Now that my saber has been
returned, let's eat!

VC58X001.Text:
[munch, munch...]
Man, soy sauce really does go well
with fried shrimp.

VC58X002.Text:
These fried oysters are good as
well, Utena-sama.

VC58X003.Text:
Anyway, I'm really glad that the
saber was returned.

VC58X004.Text:
Yeah. Saionji-san, really, thank
you very much.

VC58X005.Text:
Hah... yes, it's all thanks to me.
You should indeed be grateful.

VC58X006.Text:
Did you do anything besides bully
Chu-chu?

VC58X008.Text:
When I saw the monkey carrying
that saber, it immediately caught
my eye.

VC58X010.Text:
Why, you... watch how you talk to
your senpai!

VC58X011.Text:
Tenjou Utena... let's settle this
right here, right now!

VC58X012.Text:
(Man, this is bad...
I don't think these two are going
to stop.)

VC58A002.Text:
Saionji-san, and Utena, too.
This isn't the time or the place!

VC58A003.Text:
Utena, you have a duel tomorrow!
And Saionji-san, if you want to
challenge Utena, take it to the
Dueling Arena!

VC58A006.Text:
Tch. Blast it, woman... you think
you can order me around?

VC58A008.Text:
Please sit down, everyone.
Dessert will be out soon.

VC58A009.Text:
Ah...
Well, if Anthy says so...

VC58A010.Text:
(Well, looks like the situation
got defused somehow...)

VC58B004.Text:
Before you fight Utena, you need
to have a return match with
Chigusa-san. You don't want to
leave things as they stand, right?

VC58B005.Text:
Hm, no. I suppose you're correct.
I'm grateful to you for reminding
me.

VC58B006.Text:
That's how it is, Tenjou Utena.
I must keep myself in top
condition for my fight against
Sanjouin.

VC58B007.Text:
So just for today, I'll let it
slide.

VC58B008.Text:
Tch, can you believe the things
this bozo says?

VC58B010.Text:
(Whew. I'm glad I was able to
defuse the situation, at least...)

VC58C001.Text:
Hey, Anthy.
You should say something to them!

VC58C002.Text:
You're the only one Saionji-san
will listen to.

VC58C005.Text:
Well, then...
Excuse me, Saionji-senpai. We
seem to have run out of soy sauce.

VC58C006.Text:
What?
But I brought an entire bottle
of it...!

VC59X003.Text:
Oh, is it? This monkey came to my
place.

VC59X004.Text:
It seemed like he wanted me to
teach him fencing.

VC59X005.Text:
So he's what you wanted to give
us?

VC59X006.Text:
...Does that mean Chu-chu is
responsible for that room!?

VC59X007.Text: My. You did a bad thing, Chu-chu!

VC59X009.Text: He's saying that it wasn't him.

VC59X010.Text:
Yeah, I guess there's no way
Chu-chu could wreck a room that
badly.

VC59X011.Text:
Well, either way.
Did you want the soy sauce?

VC59X013.Text:
Now that my saber has been
returned, let's eat!

VC60X001.Text:
[munch, munch...]
Man, soy sauce really does go well
with fried shrimp.

VC60X002.Text:
These fried oysters are good as
well, Utena-sama.

VC60X003.Text:
Anyway, I'm really glad that the
saber was returned.

VC60X004.Text:
Yeah. Juri-san, really, thank you
very much.

VC60X005.Text:
No, it's nothing you need to thank
me for.

VC60X006.Text:
But I am concerned about whoever
trashed your room.

VC60X007.Text:
Nothing was stolen, though.
What could it have been about?

VC60X008.Text:
Oh, I've got it!
They were after the saber.

VC60X009.Text:
But since Chu-chu already had it,
they couldn't take it...

VC60X010.Text:
Oh, but Utena-sama.
Their motive might have been
something besides theft.

VC60X011.Text:
There are all kinds of things that
a woman can lose.

VC60X013.Text:
Anyway, they might come again, so
be careful.

VC60A001.Text:
But the criminal might still be
lurking around somewhere.

VC60A002.Text: I'll be too scared to sleep...

VC60A003.Text:
Alright, then.
Why not sleep in our room tonight?

VC60A005.Text:
My, my. Three girls sharing a
room. It's almost like a school
trip.

VC60B001.Text:
Too bad I wasn't there when the
thief came last time.

VC60B002.Text:
If they come again, I'll
definitely turn the tables on 'em!

VC60B004.Text:
You have your saber back now, so
after dinner, how about I teach
you a simple combination attack.

VC60C001.Text:
Heh heh, he must have been after
my body. What a sin it is to be so
beautiful!

VC60C002.Text:
You sound like Nanami.
I should introduce the two of you.

VC60C003.Text: You think that's a good idea?

VC60C004.Text:
Yes, if you bring the positive
ends of two magnets together, they
repel.

VC60C005.Text:
Hang on, guys.
What are you talking about?

VC61X001.Text:
Ah, Himemiya-san! I'm honored that
you invited me to dinner.
Um, I...

VC61X005.Text:
Chu-Chu came to my place.
It seemed like he wanted me to
teach him fencing.

VC61X006.Text:
So he's what you wanted to give
us? ...Does that mean Chu-Chu's
responsible for your room!?

VC61X007.Text: My. You did a bad thing, Chu-chu!

VC61X009.Text: He's saying that it wasn't him.

VC61X010.Text:
Yeah, I guess there's no way
Chu-chu could wreck a room that
badly.

VC61X011.Text:
Um, Tenjou-senpai.
May I come in, at least?

VC61X014.Text:
It's soy sauce, of course!
I brought thick, thin, low-salt,
premium, white, nuoc mam...

VC61X015.Text:
Yeah, that must be heavy.
Anyway, come in! The fried shrimp
is going to get cold.

VC62X001.Text:
[munch, munch...]
Man, soy sauce really does go well
with fried shrimp.

VC62X002.Text:
These fried oysters are good as
well, Utena-sama.

VC62X003.Text:
Anyway, I'm really glad that the
saber was returned.

VC62X005.Text:
Oh, no, it was nothing...
But I am a little worried about
whoever ransacked your room.

VC62X006.Text:
Yeah... though it doesn't seem
like anything's missing.

VC62X007.Text:
I don't think they came here to
steal.

VC62X008.Text:
I mean, it doesn't seem like
there's much a thief would want...
Oh, excuse me!

VC62A001.Text:
No, don't worry about it.
You're right, there really isn't
anything worth stealing.

VC62A002.Text:
It's strange, though. What could
have been the perpetrator's
objective...?

VC62A003.Text:
Women have all kinds of things to
lose besides objects...

VC62A006.Text:
Wow, you've both gone bright red.
You're more innocent than I'd
thought.

VC62B001.Text:
Yeah. I don't think this was about
theft, either.

VC62B002.Text:
A woman has all kinds of things to
lose, after all.

VC62B004.Text:
Aw, Miki-kun, you're blushing.
How cute!

VC62B006.Text:
It's because you said such a mean
thing! I was just getting back at
you a bit.

VC62B007.Text:
Hahaha. Well, there you go.
I guess Mickey loses that round.

VC62C001.Text:
There might not be any goods
to steal,

VC62C002.Text:
but there is one super-classy,
smoking-hot girl!

VC62C003.Text:
To boys, I'm the greatest treasure
of all!

VC63X002.Text: Do you know what I wonder?

VC63X003.Text:
Night is the best time to perform
fairy tales!

VC63X004.Text:
Long, long ago,
in a certain place,
there was a prince, a princess,
and an evil queen.

VC63X006.Text:
The evil queen grew rich through
her powerful magic.
She had status, and fame, too.

VC63X008.Text:
But, the only place her hand
couldn't reach was the prince's
heart. Therefore...

VC63X010.Text:
What is it? We're just getting to
the good part!

VC63X011.Text:
You're doing great, but I can't
see your performance at all.

VC64X001.Text:
(For some reason, I can't sleep.
I guess a lot of things happened
today...)

VC64X002.Text:
(I wonder what I should do?
Is there anything I can do, all by
myself?)

VC64X003.Text:
(Back at the masquerade,
the masked person said...
that I would disappear.)

VC64X006.Text:
(Maybe, before I disappear
tomorrow, I should go consult with
someone...?)

VC64A001.Text:
(Yeah, I'll go talk to Utena.
She'll definitely help me out...)

VC64B001.Text:
(Yeah, I'll talk with Touga-san.
He'll definitely come up with a
good plan...)

VC64C001.Text:
(Yeah, I'll go talk with Touga-
san. He said he'd leave his door
open, after all...)

VC64C002.Text:
(N, not that I have any weird
expectations or anything.)

VC64C003.Text:
(I just think that Touga-san will
be able to come up with a good
plan...)

VC64C004.Text:
(...I'm acting stupid.
Who am I making excuses to,
anyway?)

VC64D001.Text:
(I guess I'll go talk with
Saionji-san...)

VC64F001.Text:
(I guess I'll talk with Juri-
san...)

VC64F002.Text:
(Yeah, I'll go meet Juri-san.
Of course, she might be angry with
me for coming at this unreasonable
time of night...)

VC64F003.Text:
(But still, I want to see her.
I feel like I need to...)

VC64G001.Text:
(I guess I'll talk with Juri-
san...)

VC64G002.Text:
(Come to think of it, Juri said
she was going to duel Chigusa-san
tonight...)

VC64H001.Text:
(Yeah, I'll go talk with Miki-kun.
Miki-kun will definitely empathize
with me...)

VC64I001.Text:
(No, this is my problem.
I should settle it on my own.)

VC64I002.Text:
(I don't know what will happen
tomorrow.)

VC64I003.Text:
(I should just count sheep and get
to sleep quick.)

VC64I005.Text:
(Man, just when I'd resolved to go
to sleep...)

VC64I006.Text:
Go to sleep, Chu-Chu!
I'll play more cards with you
tomorrow.

VC64I010.Text:
You want me to look out the
window?

VC64I011.Text:
Fine, then... But if you're just
saying the stars are pretty, I'm
going to be angry.

VC64I014.Text:
A Duelist...?
Who's coming?
Chigusa-san, is that you?

VC64I017.Text:
You will be erased from both the
past and the future.

VC64I018.Text:
(I will... disappear? What did
they mean, "from both the past
and the future?")

VC65X005.Text:
(Now that my bed arrived, I guess
that's kind of a weird thing to
ask...)

VC66X001.Text:
Hey, Utena.
Tomorrow is the duel.

VC66X002.Text:
Oh... now that you mention it,
that's right.

VC66X004.Text:
I guess... I mean, I would have
been if we'd had the duel
immediately,

VC66X005.Text: but this three-day wait is just...

VC66X006.Text:
Honestly, why three days later?
If you're gonna have a duel, it's
better to have it right away.

VC66X007.Text:
So, you're pretty confident about
tomorrow.

VC66X008.Text:
Not particularly.
I mean, I don't even know who I'm
facing.

VC66X009.Text: But you're not worried about it?

VC66X010.Text:
It's not that I'm not worried at
all, it's just... I just have to
take it as it comes.

VC66X012.Text:
I guess what I'm saying is that
there's no use brooding about it.

VC66X013.Text:
I guess not. [giggle]
I like how you don't overthink
things, Utena.

VC66X015.Text:
Of course.
Somehow, talking to you made me
feel better.

VC67X001.Text:
So.
You came to my place after all...

VC67X002.Text:
Yes. Sorry to come in the middle
of the night like this.
But I'm worried, and...

VC67X003.Text:
I understand.
You wanted some human company
tonight, right?

VC67X005.Text:
No need for words.
Just let yourself go, and leave
everything to me...

VC67X006.Text:
Touga-san...
I, didn't mean for us to...
Ah!

VC68X002.Text:
(He's out here in a downpour like
this... but it's like he doesn't
even notice... Ah!)

VC68X004.Text:
I won't lose any more...
This time...
I'll obtain... eternity...

VC70X001.Text:
He's started to catch pneumonia.
He needs complete bed rest.

VC70X003.Text:
I can't believe he was out in that
rain. Doing that level of strict
training... he has no common sense
at all.

VC70X004.Text: What on earth was he thinking?

VC72A001.Text:
(I really didn't want to pass by
here.)

VC72A002.Text:
(But it's the shortest route to
Juri-san's place...)

VC72A005.Text:
I guess this is important to you
after all... Arisugawa Juri-kun.

VC72A006.Text:
Well, well, I have the wrong
person. Why are you out here,
kitten? It's dangerous to walk
alone at night.

VC72A008.Text:
That's right.
Arisugawa Juri's treasured
possession.

VC72A011.Text:
Hand over Juri-san's locket!
It's important to her.

VC72A012.Text:
Shouldn't I return it to its
owner, then?

VC72A013.Text:
Give it to me. I'll return it to
Juri-san myself.

VC72A015.Text:
Then I'll have to take it back by
force!

VC72A017.Text:
You seem serious.
Well, fine. Take it.

VC72A018.Text:
After all, I want to wait until
the "last scene" to deal with
you...

VC72A021.Text:
(Chigusa-san... what did you want
with Juri-san? And... with me...?)

VC72A024.Text: You came to get this back, right?

VC72A026.Text: I got it back from Chigusa-san.

VC72A027.Text:
Sanjouin handed it over to you?
Why?

VC72A028.Text:
Well... because I asked her to
return it.

VC72A029.Text:
That's all? You didn't have to
make some strange promise or
bargain?

VC72A032.Text: You shouldn't get in too deep.

VC72A033.Text:
You should be more normal...
Chat with your friends, study,
fall in love...

VC72A034.Text:
That sort of peaceful student life
suits you.

VC72A035.Text:
Juri-san, why did you try to
handle this all by yourself?

VC72A036.Text:
I'm not anyone special,
but please, you can talk to me!

VC72A037.Text:
Even if I can only help you a
little...

VC72A038.Text:
Don't get in too deep.
That's my last warning.

VC72B001.Text:
(Juri-san said that she was going
to meet Chigusa-san tonight.)

VC72B002.Text:
(If my hunch is right, they'll be
at the old fencing hall...)

VC72B003.Text:
(Weird. I thought for sure they'd
be here...)

VC72B006.Text:
I guess this is important to you
after all... Arisugawa Juri-kun.

VC73X004.Text: Sorry, I know it's really late.

VC73X005.Text:
No, it's okay.
Is something wrong?

VC73X007.Text:
Well, whatever it is, please come
in. Let me make you some tea.

VC74X004.Text:
No.
She'll come back in the morning,
though.

VC74X006.Text:
I was in the beginning, but I've
gotten used to it.

VC74X008.Text:
(When you first opened the door,
you thought I was Kozue-chan, and
you looked really relieved.)

VC74X009.Text:
But never mind that.
Why are you here so late?
Is something wrong?

VC74X010.Text:
No.
I just wanted to talk with you.

VC74X011.Text:
If you enjoy my company, you can
have it as much as you'd like.

VC74X017.Text:
(I understand why the high school
girls make such a fuss over
him...)

VD03X002.Text:
Welcome home.
Why were you out all night?
I was worried.

VD03X004.Text:
Yeah, a little. I'm glad nothing
happened, though.
Where'd you go, anyway?

VD03X006.Text:
Utena-sama, girls our age have
some things they want to keep
secret.

VD03X009.Text: Well, okay then. I won't ask.

VD03X010.Text:
But from now on, could you let us
know when you're staying over
somewhere?

VD03X012.Text:
(Sorry, Utena.
But it was a really important
night to me...)

VD04A004.Text:
Where are you headed?
Class is about to start... and the
school's this way.

VD04A009.Text:
My, what an unromantic girl.
The two of us are going on a date.
It's uncouth to pry further.

VD04A012.Text:
(Where are they going...?
That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...)

VD04A013.Text: They make such a cute couple...

VD04B006.Text:
(Saionji-san's greeting to Anthy
seemed strangely subdued...)

VD04B007.Text: Excuse me, I'm going on ahead...

VD04B008.Text:
Hey, Saionji! That's the wrong...
ah, he already left.

VD04B009.Text:
The school is this way.
Where does he think he's going?

VD04B010.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could he be...?)

VD04C003.Text: Oh, you have your locket back.

VD04C005.Text:
It's a really pretty locket.
Whose picture is in it?
Your lover or someone?

VD04C008.Text: That's not the way to school.

VD04C009.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could she be...?)

VD04D003.Text:
Oh, you aren't with Kozue-san
today.

VD04D004.Text:
No, she didn't return home last
night.

VD04D005.Text:
Huh, really?
You must be worried.

VD04D006.Text:
It's not anything new.
I'm sure she'll be at school.

VD04D007.Text:
Hmm... I wonder where she could
be.

VD04D008.Text:
Presumably, she had a lover's
tryst.

VD04D009.Text:
(Wow, Anthy, that was a pretty
direct answer. I mean, I was
thinking it too, but...)

VD04D010.Text:
It could be something else,
Miki-kun.

VD04D011.Text:
I'll bet she was just at a
friend's place. I mean, girls
often sleep over with each other.

VD04D012.Text:
That's true. Her partner wasn't
necessarily a member of the
opposite sex.

VD04D015.Text: Excuse me, but I have to go...

VD04D016.Text:
Hey, Mickey!
Class is going to start soon...!
Ah, he's already gone.

VD04D017.Text:
The school is the other way,
though.

VD04D018.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could he be...?)

VD04E003.Text:
What's his problem?
We were just saying "hi."

VD04E004.Text:
Saionji-san seemed kind of weird.
Do you think something's wrong?

VD04E005.Text:
Honestly, Touga, your best friend
is hopeless.

VD04E006.Text:
Chigusa-san...
Why are you and Touga-san...?

VD04E007.Text:
Oh? Do you think it's strange that
I'm walking with a man?
Or are you just jealous?

VD04E009.Text:
Let's leave these kids alone,
Touga. Nothing ruins a date like
parents or children.

VD04E013.Text:
Geez, class is about to start.
Are those two and Saionji all
going to play hooky?

VD04E014.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could they be...?)

VD04F003.Text: Oh, you have your locket back.

VD04F005.Text:
It's a really pretty locket.
Whose picture is in it?
Your lover or someone?

VD04F008.Text:
The school is in the other
direction.

VD04F010.Text:
Chigusa-san...
Why are you and Touga-san...?

VD04F011.Text:
Oh? Do you think it's strange that
I'm walking with a man?
Or are you just jealous?

VD04F013.Text:
Let's leave these kids alone,
Touga. Nothing ruins a date like
parents or children.

VD04F017.Text:
Geez, class is about to start.
Are those two and Arisugawa-senpai
all going to play hooky?

VD04F018.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could they be...?)

VD04G003.Text:
Oh, you aren't with Kozue-san
today.

VD04G004.Text:
No, she didn't return home last
night.

VD04G005.Text:
Huh, really?
You must be worried.

VD04G006.Text:
It's not anything new.
I'm sure she'll be at school.

VD04G007.Text:
Hmm... I wonder where she could
be.

VD04G008.Text:
Don't be dense.
Isn't it obvious that she snuck
out for a lover's tryst?

VD04G009.Text:
Chigusa-san...
Why are you and Touga-san...?

VD04G010.Text:
Oh? Do you think it's strange that
I'm walking with a man?
Or are you just jealous?

VD04G014.Text:
Why are you with Kiryuu-senpai?
Don't you have a different target?

VD04G015.Text:
Heheh... are you worried about
your little sister?

VD04G017.Text:
Good timing. You should come with
us. There's something interesting
that I want to show you.

VD04G018.Text:
What? It's okay, we have a little
time before school starts.
Well?

VD04G021.Text: Don't worry. I'll be back soon.

VD04G022.Text:
Now that that's settled, please
excuse us. Come, Touga, let's go.

VD04G025.Text:
"What?" I'm talking about Chigusa
-san and Miki-kun...

VD04G026.Text:
Oh, yeah, you're right...
First period is gonna start any
minute. They're cutting it close.

VD04G027.Text:
Our math teacher is pretty strict
about that kind of thing.

VD04G030.Text:
Ah, it's because we were standing
around talking... If we don't
hurry, class is gonna start!

VD04G032.Text:
(Chigusa-san and the others were
headed towards the old fencing
hall... Could they be...?))

VD04H003.Text:
What's his problem?
We were just saying "hi."

VD04H004.Text:
Saionji-san seemed kind of weird.
Do you think something's wrong?

VD04H008.Text: Oh, you have your locket back.

VD04H009.Text: Oh, now that you mention it...

VD04H010.Text:
It's a really pretty locket.
Whose picture is in it?
Your lover or someone?

VD04H013.Text:
Uh, anyway, what was up with
Saionji?

VD04H014.Text:
Arisugawa-senpai, you said you
thought something was wrong too,
right?

VD04H015.Text:
Or to be more exact, something's
about to be.

VD04H017.Text:
Good morning, everyone. It's nice
to see you all getting along this
morning, but would you kindly move
out of the way?

VD04H018.Text:
Um, but, the school is the other
way...

VD04H019.Text:
Honestly. This is the problem with
children. Isn't it obvious that
we're going on a date?

VD04H021.Text:
That's right.
Chigusa and I are going on a date.

VD04H022.Text:
So there you go.
Feel free to give our regards to
the teachers.

VD04H023.Text:
Oh, that's right.
Juri, why don't you come along to
our date spot, too?

VD04H024.Text:
...You know I'm not able to
refuse.

VD04H027.Text:
Geez, class is about to start.
Are those three and Saionji all
going to play hooky?

VD04H028.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could they be...?)

VD04I003.Text:
What's his problem?
We were just saying "hi."

VD04I004.Text:
Saionji-san seemed kind of weird.
Do you think something's wrong?

VD04I005.Text:
Honestly, Touga, your best friend
is hopeless.

VD04I006.Text:
Chigusa-san...
Why are you and Touga-san...?

VD04I007.Text:
Oh? Do you think it's strange that
I'm walking with a man?
Or are you just jealous?

VD04I009.Text:
Let's leave these kids alone,
Touga. Nothing ruins a date like
parents or children.

VD04I013.Text:
Is there something wrong with
that? I'm free to love who I
please.

VD04I014.Text:
Don't worry, the girl is already
waiting in the usual place.

VD04I020.Text:
Geez, class is about to start.
Are those three and Saionji all
going to play hooky?

VD04I021.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could they be...?)

VD04J006.Text:
Why are you two together this
morning? Did the Fencing Club
have morning practice?

VD04J008.Text:
Do you have Student Council
business, then? Classes are about
to start, though...

VD04J010.Text:
Let's go, Miki.
What's the use in talking to them?

VD04J012.Text:
Well, that was harsh.
Somehow, I feel worried...

VD04J013.Text:
Shall I explain the situation for
you?

VD04J015.Text:
There's something that each of
them want.

VD04J019.Text:
Leave it at that.
Besides, weren't you going to take
us somewhere?

VD04J021.Text:
Let's go, Touga.
We'll show them a fun place...

VD04J023.Text:
Hey, that's not the way to the
school...

VD04J024.Text: What did they mean "a fun place"?

VD04J025.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could they be...?)

VD04K002.Text:
You're right. It's rare to see
them all together.

VD04K009.Text: My, my. Did they not notice us?

VD04K010.Text:
Couldn't be.
We were standing right here.

VD04K011.Text:
All four of them seemed kind of
strange.

VD04K012.Text:
Yeah. And class is about to start,
too. I wonder where they're
headed?

VD04K015.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall... Maybe they...?)

VD04L003.Text:
What's his problem?
We were just saying "hi."

VD04L004.Text:
Saionji-san seemed kind of weird.
Do you think something's wrong?

VD04L005.Text: Would you get out of the way?

VD04L008.Text:
Um, sure...
Oh? Juri-san, you got your locket
back.

VD04L010.Text:
Now that you mention it, I've been
wondering. Whose picture is in
that locket?

VD04L013.Text:
Where are those two off to?
Class is about to start...

VD04L014.Text:
(That's the way to the old fencing
hall... Could they be...?)

VD04M003.Text:
What's his problem?
We were just saying "hi."

VD04M004.Text:
Saionji-san seemed kind of weird.
Do you think something's wrong?

VD04M005.Text:
Now that you mention it, yeah.
Usually he won't shut up about
"Anthy, Anthy!"

VD04M009.Text:
Oh, you aren't with Kozue-chan
today.

VD04M010.Text:
No, she didn't return home last
night.

VD04M011.Text:
Huh, really?
You must be worried.

VD04M012.Text:
It's not anything new.
I'm sure she'll be at school.

VD04M013.Text:
Hmm... I wonder where she could
be.

VD04M014.Text:
Presumably, she had a lover's
tryst.

VD04M015.Text:
(Wow, Anthy, that was a pretty
direct answer. I mean, I was
thinking it too, but...)

VD04M016.Text:
It could be something else,
Miki-kun.

VD04M017.Text:
I'll bet she was just at a
friend's place. I mean, girls
often sleep over with each other.

VD04M018.Text:
That's true. Her partner wasn't
necessarily a member of the
opposite sex.

VD04M021.Text: Excuse me, but I have to go...

VD04M022.Text:
Hey, Mickey!
Class is going to start soon...!
Ah, he's already gone.

VD04M023.Text:
The school is the other way,
though.

VD04M024.Text:
(That's the direction of the old
fencing hall...
Could she be...?)

VD04N003.Text:
What's his problem?
We were just saying "hi."

VD04N004.Text:
Saionji-san seemed kind of weird.
Do you think something's wrong?

VD04N005.Text:
Now that you mention it, yeah.
Usually he won't shut up about
"Anthy, Anthy!"

VD04N013.Text:
Why are you two together this
morning? Did the Fencing Club
have morning practice?

VD04N015.Text:
Do you have Student Council
business, then? Classes are about
to start, though...

VD04N017.Text:
Let's go, Miki.
What's the use in talking to them?

VD04N019.Text:
Well, that was harsh.
Somehow, I feel worried...

VD04N020.Text: Oh, you have your locket back.

VD04N022.Text:
Oh, yeah. Come to think of it,
I haven't seen you wearing it
recently.

VD04N023.Text:
You know, I've been wondering.
Whose picture is in that locket?

VD04N026.Text:
Where are those two off to?
Class is about to start...

VD04N027.Text:
(That's the way to the old fencing
hall... Could they be...?)

VD04O006.Text:
Why are you two together this
morning? Did the Fencing Club
have morning practice?

VD04O008.Text:
Do you have Student Council
business, then? Classes are about
to start, though...

VD04O010.Text:
Let's go, Miki.
What's the use in talking to them?

VD04O013.Text:
Well, that was harsh.
Somehow, I feel worried...

VD04O014.Text: Oh, you have your locket back.

VD04O016.Text:
Oh, yeah. Come to think of it,
I haven't seen you wearing it
recently.

VD04O017.Text:
You know, I've been wondering.
Whose picture is in that locket?

VD04O020.Text:
Where are those two off to?
Class is about to start...

VD04O021.Text:
(That's the way to the old fencing
hall... Could they be...?)

VD04P003.Text:
Huhh? Aren't you gonna say good
morning to me?

VD04P005.Text:
By the way, today is finally the
duel, isn't it?
How do you feel?

VD04P006.Text:
How do I feel...?
Eh, I dunno. I don't even know who
my opponent is.

VD04P007.Text:
But surely you don't expect to
lose.

VD04P010.Text:
You've had a rough time since you
transfered here, but things should
settle down after today.

VD04P012.Text:
Hey, we still don't know whether
I'll actually win. Don't act like
everything's resolved already.

VD04P013.Text:
You shouldn't talk like that.
I want you to keep winning until
you face me.

VD04P015.Text:
I won't forgive you if someone
beats you before me.

VD04P016.Text:
You've already gotten two whole
chances!

VD04P017.Text:
Shut up!
They say "the third time's a
charm."

VD04P018.Text:
But they also say "what happens
twice, happens thrice."

VD04P020.Text:
What are you all going on about,
so early in the morning?

VD04P021.Text:
You're inconveniencing others
by standing in a big clump in the
street like this.

VD04P022.Text:
Not to mention that the first bell
is going to ring soon.

VD04P023.Text:
Oh, you're right!
It's almost time.

VD04P024.Text:
Come to think of it, I don't see
any other students still on their
way to class.

VD04P025.Text:
Oh, no!
Let's run for it, Himemiya, %N!

VD04P029.Text:
I'm arriving late today because I
had Student Council business.
I'm not tardy.

VD04P031.Text:
Oh, I see!
I didn't think of that.

VD04P032.Text:
Well then, since the three of us
have been so busy all morning,
let's take our time, shall we?

VD05X002.Text:
(There was that stuff this
morning, too... I'm a little
worried...)

VD05B002.Text:
(The Student Council members have
all disappeared.
Could Chigusa-san have, too...?)

VD05B003.Text:
(According to the message from the
masquerade ball, there should be
a duel today.)

VD05B004.Text:
(Will I disappear like the Student
Council members...?
What should I do...!?)

VD05B007.Text:
I'm afraid I wasn't feeling well
this morning.

VD05B011.Text:
Well, next time, please contact
your homeroom teacher.
We were worried.

VD05B015.Text:
Good morning.
What's wrong?
Surprised that I came to school?

VD05B017.Text:
It's just that the Student Council
members have all disappeared, and
I thought maybe you'd also...

VD05B018.Text: I was just worried, is all.

VD05B021.Text: I see. You really are alike.

VD05B023.Text:
Smiling innocently at me.
Unaware of how that smile hurts
me...

VD05B025.Text:
Hey, you two!
No talking in class.

VD05B027.Text:
(What did she mean?
Who does she think I'm like...?)

VD06X003.Text:
(But Touga-san seemed strange this
morning... I'm worried.)

VD07A001.Text:
(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07A002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07A004.Text:
(This is Touga-san's...
What is it doing here?)

VD07B001.Text:
(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07B002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07C002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07C004.Text:
(This is Juri-san's...
What is it doing here?)

(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07D002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07E001.Text:
(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07E002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07E003.Text:
(These are Touga-san's and
Saionji-san's...
What are they doing here?)

(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07F002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I

Huh?)

(I came to check it out because

Huh?)

(I came to check it out because

(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I

Huh?)

VD07H004.Text:
(These are Touga-san's and
Saionji-san's. And Juri-san's,
too... What are they doing here?)

VD07I001.Text:
(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07I002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07I004.Text:
(These are Touga-san's and
Saionji-san's. And Miki-kun's,
too... What are they doing here?)

(I came to check it out because

VD07J002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I

Huh?)

VD07J004.Text:
(These are Touga-san's and
Juri-san's. And Miki-kun's, too...
What are they doing here?)

(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07K002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07K004.Text:
(These are the Student Council
members'...
What are they doing here...?)

VD07L001.Text:
(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07L002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07L004.Text:
(These are Saionji-san's and
Juri-san's...
What are they doing here?)

VD07M001.Text:
(I came to check it out because

VD07M002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I

Huh?)

VD07M004.Text:
(These are Saionji-san's and
Miki-kun's...
What are they doing here?)

VD07N001.Text:
(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07N002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
