Huh?)

VD07N004.Text:
(These are Saionji-san's and
Juri-san's. And Miki-kun's, too...
What are they doing here?)

VD07O001.Text:
(I came to check it out because
I was worried, but...)

VD07O002.Text:
(Nobody is here after all. Maybe I
was over-thinking things...
Huh?)

VD07O004.Text:
(These are Juri-san's and
Miki-kun's...
What are they doing here?)

VD08X002.Text:
I'm afraid I wasn't feeling well
this morning.

VD08X005.Text:
Well, next time, please contact
your homeroom teacher.
We were worried.

VD08X008.Text:
You came to the fencing hall,
didn't you?

VD08X010.Text: But I'm afraid you were too late.

VD08X011.Text:
(What do you mean, Chigusa-san?
Could you have...?)

VD09X002.Text:
I'm afraid I wasn't feeling well
this morning.

VD09X005.Text:
Well, next time, please contact
your homeroom teacher.
We were worried.

VD09X008.Text:
Well, I have to give those Student
Council people credit.

VD09X010.Text:
But I'm still going to win. Even
without borrowing their power.

VD09X011.Text:
(What do you mean, Chigusa-san?
Could you have...?)

VD10X001.Text:
Ahh, it's finally over.
C'mon, let's head home.

VD10X002.Text:
Huh!? But we still have the whole
afternoon to go...

VD10X004.Text:
The school cancelled afternoon
classes today. Didn't you hear?

VD10X006.Text:
(According to that masked person
at the ball, today's also the day
I disappear...)

VD10X008.Text:
What is it?
Is there something on my face?

VD10X010.Text:
Hey, Utena.
According to that card,you have a
duel today, right?

VD10X012.Text:
"That's today"...?
Utena, did you forget about it?

VD10X013.Text:
No, I knew it was coming up soon,
but...

VD10X014.Text:
It's just kind of a pain, you
know? Duels usually happen right
away.

VD10X015.Text:
And why the 25th, anyway?
I'd rather just get it over with.

VD10X016.Text:
Hey, Utena. If you lose, I might
disappear.

VD10X018.Text:
But we don't know whether that's
true... and if I win, it'll
probably be fine, right?

VD10X020.Text:
I may not look it, but I'm pretty
strong. I'm undefeated in my four
duels, you know.

VD10X022.Text:
C'mon, don't look so gloomy.
Today's a half-day... let's go
into town to celebrate.

VD10X024.Text: Utena, your duel is this evening!

VD10X027.Text:
Yeah, but, unlike normal, I don't
even know who I'm dueling... so I
don't know how nervous to be.

VD10X029.Text:
(What should I do...?
Is there someone I can talk to
other than Utena...?)

VD11X002.Text:
Oh, I'm sorry.
I was in a hurry, and...

VD11X005.Text:
I had something I needed to talk
with someone about, and...
Oh, what am I saying...?

VD11X006.Text:
"Talk with someone?"
It's good that you have someone
you can talk about things with.

VD11X008.Text:
Even if you only have a single
person, that's enough.

VD11X009.Text:
But if that one last person you
can speak to should disappear,
you're welcome at my place.

VD11X010.Text:
You can come in for a consultation
at any time.

VD11X012.Text:
(Who was that guy? I haven't seen
his uniform before...
Is he a high school student?)

VD11X013.Text:
(Oh, I don't have time for this...
I've got to hurry up.)

VD12B001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Touga-san.
He didn't seem like himself this
morning...)

VD12B002.Text:
(And I have a bad feeling about
what Chigusa-san said...)

VD12C001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Touga-san.
I'm sure he'll help me...)

VD12E001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Saionji-san.
He didn't seem like himself this
morning...)

VD12E002.Text:
(And I have a bad feeling about
what Chigusa-san said...)

VD12F001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Saionji-san.
I'm sure he'll help me...)

VD12H001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Juri-san.
She didn't seem like herself this
morning...)

VD12H002.Text:
(And I have a bad feeling about
what Chigusa-san said...)

VD12I001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Juri-san.
I'm sure she'll help me...)

VD12K001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Miki-kun.
He didn't seem like himself this
morning...)

VD12K002.Text:
(And I have a bad feeling about
what Chigusa-san said...)

VD12L001.Text:
(Right, I'll go see Miki-kun.
I'm sure he'll help me...)

VD12M002.Text:
Huh? She was here just a moment
ago... Well, she probably went to
the rose garden.

VD12M003.Text:
Okay...
I'll go look for her there.

VD13A001.Text:
Huh!?
Touga-san never showed up for
class?

VD13A002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen him all day.

VD13A003.Text:
What did you want to tell him?
I can pass along a message for
you.

VD13A004.Text:
Uh, no, it was nothing.
Thank you...

VD13B001.Text:
Huh!?
Touga-san never showed up for
class?

VD13B002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen him all day.

VD13B003.Text:
What did you want to tell him?
I can pass along a message for
you.

VD13B004.Text:
Uh, no, it was nothing.
Thank you...

VD13B005.Text:
(Touga-san, when I woke up, you
were already gone...)

VD13B007.Text:
(Last night, I was so worried,
sad, and lonely, I didn't know
what to do.)

VD13B009.Text:
(But in your arms, I opened up to
you.)

VD13B010.Text:
(Oh, I can't do anything without
you...)

VD13B011.Text:
(Once more... even just once more,
I want to...)

VD13C001.Text: Hey, what's wrong? You look upset.

VD13C002.Text:
All that brooding spoils your
pretty face.

VD13C005.Text:
I just had the feeling that you'd
disappeared...

VD13C006.Text:
Don't be silly. Of course
I haven't.

VD13C007.Text:
There's no way I would abandon
you like that.

VD13C009.Text:
Alright. You're worried about the
duel, right?

VD13C011.Text:
You think so...?
I don't mean to doubt her, but...

VD13D002.Text:
Duels, the Rose Seal, the Ends of
the World... I don't understand
any of it.

VD13D003.Text:
Until last week, I was just an
ordinary middle school student.
Why is all this happening...?

VD13D004.Text:
It's okay if you want to go home
and cower.

VD13D006.Text:
You're not the one who's going to
duel. Tenjou Utena is.

VD13D007.Text:
And if she wins, you won't
disappear, right?

VD13D009.Text:
As you can see, I'm rather busy.
Excuse me.

VD13D011.Text:
Aren't you going to go home and
pray for Tenjou's victory?

VD13D013.Text:
(Like he said, there's nothing
I can do but pray...)

VD13E001.Text:
I want to know...
about everything that's happening.

VD13E002.Text:
I can't stand the thought that my
fate might be decided...

VD13E003.Text:
...based on things I don't even
understand.

VD13E004.Text:
I see. And if it turns out that
your situation is hopeless?
Would you still want to know?

VD13E008.Text:
I understand.
Here, you can use this.

VD13E010.Text:
A key to the Student Council
archives. If you want to learn her
true identity, try looking there.

VD13E012.Text:
And now, I'll take my leave.
I'm busier than I look, you know.

VD13E014.Text:
Good luck. Your destiny is yours
to decide.

VD13E016.Text:
(He was talking about Chigusa-san.
Alright... I'll go check out the
archives.)

VD13F003.Text:
I can't stand the thought that my
destiny might be decided without
me.

VD13F004.Text:
I want to take my fate into my own
hands.

VD13F005.Text:
Then even if the result is that
I disappear, I'll...

VD13F007.Text:
Then, you should be able to hear
it.

VD13F010.Text:
If your soul hasn't truly given
up,

VD13F011.Text:
then you should be able to hear
that sound, which races about the
Ends of the World.

VD13F012.Text: A sound...? I don't really... ah!

VD14A001.Text:
Huh!?
Saionji-san never showed up for
class?

VD14A002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen him all day.

VD14A003.Text:
The Kendo Club is shut down for
the moment, too... I guess he had
quite a shock.

VD14B001.Text:
Huh!?
Saionji-san never showed up for
class?

VD14B002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen him all day.

VD14B003.Text:
The Kendo Club is shut down for
the moment, too... I guess he had
quite a shock.

VD14B005.Text:
(Saionji-san. You were let out of
the infirmary, so where did you
go...?)

VD14B006.Text:
(The doctor told you to get some
bed rest...)

VD14B007.Text:
(Surely you didn't try to
challenge Chigusa to a rematch,
in the shape you were in...?)

VD14B008.Text:
(Or could you be behind the rose
garden!?)

VD14B009.Text:
(You were doing that ridiculous
special training, with your body
already strained...)

VD14B010.Text:
(Only you would try something like
that...)

VD14B011.Text:
(I need to go check. I can't just
leave Saionji-san alone, in the
shape he's in.)

VD14C002.Text:
Well, I just wanted to consult
with you about something...

VD14C003.Text:
Consult with me?
Fine, I'm listening.

VD14D001.Text:
I think the person at the
masquerade ball that night was
Chigusa-san after all.

VD14D002.Text:
In other words, that girl is the
next Duelist.

VD14D004.Text:
The only people Chigusa-san has
approached since her return are
ones connected to the Rose Seal.

VD14D005.Text:
She challenged you, seduced
Kozue-chan, and took Juri-san's
locket...

VD14D007.Text:
I see.
And what do you want me to do
about it?

VD14D009.Text:
Whether that girl is a Duelist or
not, I can't allow myself to lose
to her again.

VD14D011.Text: I need to go practice. Excuse me.

VD14D012.Text:
You should go tell Tenjou about
Chigusa.

VD14D014.Text:
Oh, right.
Can you do me one favor?

VD14D016.Text:
Hold on to this for me.
I'm going to practice, and don't
want to lose it.

VD14D018.Text:
The Student Council archives.
They have a lot of old school
records.

VD14D019.Text:
Old school documents, huh...?
So then--

VD14D020.Text:
Keep it for me until tomorrow.
I'm counting on you, transfer
student.

VD14E002.Text:
Heh, of course you do.
If Utena loses, you're supposed to
disappear, right?

VD14E004.Text:
But it's not just that!
Utena is the first friend I made
here at the school.

VD14E006.Text:
To even imagine that Utena might
lose to someone... I...

VD14E010.Text:
A key to the Student Council
archives. There's a lot of old
school records and stuff there.

VD14E011.Text:
I don't know whether you can help
Tenjou Utena or not, but if you do
some research, it might help.

VD14E013.Text:
Just so you know, I'm not doing
this to help Tenjou. Just out of
consideration of your feelings
of friendship.

VD14E014.Text:
Yes, I understand.
Thank you again, Saionji-san.

VD14F003.Text:
I can't stand the thought that my
destiny might be decided without
me.

VD14F004.Text:
I want to take my fate into my own
hands.

VD14F005.Text:
Then even if the result is that
I disappear, I'll...

VD14F006.Text:
But only bearers of the Rose Seal
can enter the Dueling Arena.

VD14F007.Text:
Besides, I doubt the sixth Duelist
would fight you. You're not even
engaged to the Rose Bride.

VD14F011.Text:
Don't make such a scary face,
my friend.

VD14F012.Text: Who are you calling your friend?

VD14F013.Text:
It would be rather sad to just
write her off like that.

VD14F014.Text:
Don't you think it's rather
charming that she wants to duel?

VD14F015.Text:
Hey. Do you truly want to duel
yourself?

VD14F016.Text:
Even though if you lose, you might
disappear?

VD14F017.Text:
Don't you think it would be safer
to leave it to Tenjou-kun?

VD14F018.Text:
Maybe. But I want to decide my
fate myself.

VD15A001.Text:
Huh!?
Juri-san never showed up for
class?

VD15A002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen her all day.

VD15B001.Text:
Huh!?
Juri-san never showed up for
class?

VD15B002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen her all day.

VD15B004.Text:
(Is something bothering Juri-san?
Was I too much of a busy-body last
night...?)

VD15B005.Text:
(I wonder what that locket means
to her?)

VD15B006.Text:
(Maybe I made her angry.
But I just want to know more about
her...)

VD15C001.Text:
I was wondering who was asking for
me... so it's you.

VD15C002.Text:
Excuse me.
It's just that I wanted to talk
with you about something...

VD15C003.Text:
About today's duel, right?
But I'm not the one who will be
fighting. Tenjou Utena is.

VD15C004.Text:
And, I don't know whether there's
really a sixth Duelist,

VD15C005.Text:
or whether you'll really disappear
if Tenjou loses.

VD15D002.Text:
Of course, Utena's going to fight
the duel, and talking about it
won't change anything...

VD15D004.Text:
Juri-san, please. Isn't there
anything I can do to help?

VD15D005.Text:
I'm sorry. I don't have anything
to tell you.

VD15D007.Text:
Go see Ito at the Newspaper Club.
If you drop my name, she should
help you out.

VD15D009.Text:
Yeah. But she won't be able to
tell you what to do, either.

VD15D010.Text:
She'll just give you information.
What you decide to do with it is
up to you.

VD15D012.Text:
You're right.
I have to decide for myself what
to do.

VD15D013.Text:
Right. Do that, and you shouldn't
have any regrets.

VD15E002.Text:
Because if she doesn't win, you'll
disappear?

VD15E004.Text:
But it's not just that!
Utena is the first friend I made
here at the school.

VD15E005.Text:
To even imagine that Utena might
lose to someone... I...

VD15E007.Text:
Go see Ito at the Newspaper Club.
If you drop my name, she should
help you out.

VD15E008.Text:
Okay.
Ito-san at the Newspaper Club,
right?

VD15F001.Text: I want to duel in Utena's stead.

VD15F003.Text:
I can't stand the thought that my
destiny might be decided without
me.

VD15F004.Text:
I want to take my fate into my own
hands.

VD15F005.Text:
Then even if the result is that
I disappear, I'll...

VD15F006.Text:
But only bearers of the Rose Seal
can enter the Dueling Arena.

VD15F007.Text:
Besides, I doubt the sixth Duelist
would fight you. You're not even
engaged to the Rose Bride.

VD15F011.Text:
So you want to duel?
Heh heh... isn't that interesting?

VD15F012.Text:
Is that really what you want?
Even though if you lose, you might
disappear?

VD15F013.Text:
Yes. I want to take my fate into
my own hands.

VD16A001.Text:
Huh!?
Miki-kun never showed up for
class?

VD16A002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen him all day.

VD16A003.Text:
Miki-kun never cuts class.
I wonder what's wrong?

VD16B001.Text:
Huh!?
Miki-kun never showed up for
class?

VD16B002.Text: Yeah, I haven't seen him all day.

VD16B003.Text:
Miki-kun never cuts class.
I wonder what's wrong?

VD16B005.Text:
(I mean, he did seem kind of down
over that stuff with Kozue-chan,
but he didn't look sick...)

VD16B006.Text:
(So if he's not sick, then...
Could he be...!?)

VD16C001.Text:
Sorry to bother you like this,
Miki-kun.

VD16C002.Text:
No problem, I was just about
finished here.
Anyway, is something wrong?

VD16D001.Text:
I was just wondering how
Kozue-chan was doing.

VD16D003.Text:
Yeah. It seems like she's been
hanging out with Chigusa-san a lot
lately...

VD16D004.Text:
Yes, apparently so.
But who she's seeing is none of my
business.

VD16D005.Text:
Really?
I think Kozue-chan might be being
used by Chigusa-san.

VD16D007.Text:
There was that time at the
masquerade ball, and at the ruined
fencing hall...
Please, Miki-kun. Believe me.

VD16D008.Text:
...There's a high school teacher
named Tsuji-sensei.

VD16D009.Text:
He's the teacher who's been here
the longest, so maybe he can tell
you something about the old
fencing hall.

VD16D010.Text:
Thanks, Miki-kun.
Tsuji-sensei from the high school
department, right?

VD16E003.Text:
Yeah. If Utena loses her duel
today, I might disappear.

VD16E004.Text: Of course, I can't duel myself.

VD16E005.Text:
So I want to help her out however
I can.

VD16E006.Text:
But I don't know anything about
the duels, so...

VD16E007.Text:
Hey, Miki-kun.
Isn't there anything I can do?

VD16E008.Text:
Hmm... only people with a Rose
Seal can enter the Dueling
Arena...

VD16E009.Text:
Maybe you could give Tenjou-senpai
a massage?

VD16E010.Text:
Man, you're less helpful than
I expected.

VD16E011.Text:
Sorry! But as for the old fencing
hall you've been talking about...

VD16E012.Text:
I would ask Tsuji-sensei, at the
high school, about it.

VD16E015.Text:
He's the teacher who's been here
the longest. He should be familiar
with the school's past.

VD16F001.Text: I want to duel in Utena's stead.

VD16F003.Text:
I can't stand the thought that my
destiny might be decided without
me.

VD16F004.Text:
I want to take my fate into my own
hands.

VD16F005.Text:
Then even if the result is that
I disappear, I'll...

VD16F007.Text:
But only bearers of the Rose Seal
can enter the Dueling Arena...

VD16F008.Text:
And only the one engaged to the
Rose Bride can accept duels...

VD16F012.Text:
So you want to decide your fate
yourself.
Heheh... isn't that interesting?

VX50X004.Text:
(What should I do...? I need to
broach the subject somehow.)

VX50X007.Text:
Hey, Anthy.
Why do you do this Rose Bride
stuff?

VX50X010.Text:
Don't you want to be more like a
normal girl, and do stuff like
chatting with friends, eating
yummy foods, and falling in love?

VX50X011.Text:
Don't you hate being treated as a
prize for the duels?

VX50X013.Text:
That's really weird!
Hey, c'mon. Quit being the Rose
Bride.

VX50X014.Text: And be more like a normal girl...

VX50X017.Text:
Do I seem that pathetic to you?
Or is it that you don't want the
duels to happen?

VX50X019.Text:
You're in trouble right now.
Didn't you come here seeking
something from me?

VX50X020.Text:
Do you want answers?
Or do you actually want me?

VX50X021.Text: Do you want the Rose Bride?

VX50X022.Text:
With me, you'll obtain the Power
to Revolutionize the World.

VX50X023.Text:
And if you have that, you won't
disappear. Isn't that what you're
thinking?

VX50X024.Text:
(What do I really want to do...?
Do I simply not want to disappear?
Or...)

VX50A001.Text:
I want answers. About Chigusa-san,
and the duels...

VX50A002.Text:
About everything that's going on
here!

VX50A005.Text: A letter... who is it from?

VX50A008.Text:
Come to the old fencing hall at
four o'clock. Bring your saber.

VX50B001.Text:
I want you... I want the Rose
Bride!

VX50B002.Text:
Himemiya Anthy, I want you to be
mine.

VX50B005.Text:
There's only one way to obtain the
Rose Bride, and that's to win me
in a duel.

VX50B008.Text: And then, take the Rose Bride.

VD17X002.Text:
(It's already the 25th, the
date that was announced at the
masquerade...)

VD17X003.Text:
(At my old school, we would have
laughed it off as a joke...)

VD17X004.Text:
(But here at Ohtori, they act like
things like this are normal...)

VD17X009.Text:
We gave you a warning yesterday,
but it seems you still haven't
learned your lesson.

VD17X010.Text:
As usual, you're still meddling in
the affairs of the Student
Council.

VD17X013.Text:
Well, I guess that's to be
expected. You're the daughter of
such shameful people, after all.

VD17X014.Text:
No wonder you're such a fast
worker.

VD17X016.Text: My, you're good at playing dumb.

VD17X017.Text:
But you know, lies like that are
caught soon enough.
Like with your mom and dad.

VD17X018.Text:
My mother and father aren't liars!
Stop bad-mouthing them.

VD17X019.Text: Oh, you think it's just slander?

VD17X021.Text:
Of course, Nanami-sama.
Fifteen years ago, your parents
were expelled from the school.

VD17X023.Text:
Your father, who was a teacher,
got involved with your mother,
who was a student.

VD17X024.Text:
They got the chop for "obscene
relations."

VD17X026.Text:
You know, a long time ago, your
father used to teach at Ohtori
Academy.

VD17X027.Text:
Yeah. So, when I was at Ohtori,
I served as the Fencing Club's
advisor.

VD17X028.Text:
In fact, Ohtori is where your
father and I met.

VD17X029.Text:
You looked pretty cool too, in
your fencing suit.

VD17X030.Text: Stop it, stop it, stop it...!

VD18A003.Text:
If you say one more word, you'll
be facing me.

VD18A004.Text:
H-hmph. Fine, I'll let you off
the hook for today.

VD18A008.Text:
Don't pay attention to anything
that lot says, 'kay?

VD18B003.Text:
If you say one more word, you'll
be facing me.

VD18B004.Text:
H-hmph. Fine, I'll let you off
the hook for today.

VD18B007.Text: Thanks, Utena. Why are you here?

VD18B008.Text: I wanted to give you something.

VD18B012.Text:
I've got to go to that duel, so
he'll be your knight while I'm
gone.

VD18B015.Text:
She's a really important person to
me, so be sure to protect her.

VD18B017.Text:
(Utena said... I was an important
person to her...)

VD18B018.Text:
Alright then, I'm off.
Oh, and don't pay any attention to
what Nanami said.

VD18B019.Text:
(Thanks, Utena. You really are
cool... definitely much cooler
than any boy.)

VD18C002.Text:
B, big brother?
Why are you here...?

VD18C003.Text:
It's, uh, not what you think,
big brother!

VD18C004.Text:
This new girl didn't know where
the music room was... that's all.

VD18C006.Text:
I mean, Keiko-san and the others
were going to bully her!

VD18C007.Text: I managed to stop them, though...

VD18C009.Text:
...I'm sorry, big brother!
It won't happen again.

VD18C010.Text:
There, there, Nanami.
Just make sure it doesn't.

VD18C013.Text:
(This is bad. I can't even look
Touga-san directly in the face.)

VD18C015.Text:
Not at all. I apologize for my
sister's behavior.

VD18C017.Text:
I went to get breakfast for us,
but by the time I got back, you
were gone.

VD18C020.Text:
I thought that a special occasion
like our first morning together
warranted a special breakfast.

VD18C021.Text:
When I saw that you were gone,
I misunderstood...

VD18C023.Text:
I thought maybe you'd just been
toying with me, and I got kind of
down...

VD18C024.Text:
Don't be ridiculous.
Of course not.

VD18C025.Text:
The warmth we shared last night...
was it such a shallow thing?

VD18C026.Text: No, that's not what I mean...

VD18C028.Text:
You don't believe me, huh?
Because I'm the playboy Student
Council president?

VD18C029.Text:
It's true, I've certainly gone out
with plenty of girls.
But not anymore.

VD18C031.Text:
You're the princess I've been
searching for.

VD18C032.Text:
Now that I've found you, there's
no reason for me to keep hunting
for love.

VD18C035.Text:
I'm so happy... I really can trust
you, Touga-san.

VD18D002.Text:
My, if it isn't Saionji.
Standing up for this girl? That's
unlike you.

VD18D003.Text:
Or has losing to that transfer
student addled your mind?

VD18D004.Text:
H, hmph. Fine, I'll let you off
the hook for today.

VD18D007.Text:
Thanks to you, yeah.
Were you released from the
infirmary?

VD18D008.Text:
Today's the 25th. I figured the
unknown Duelist would contact you
again.

VD18D010.Text:
The first message card was
obviously stuck to you
specifically.

VD18D011.Text:
I don't know why, but the Duelist
must have some reason to be
fixated on you.

VD18D012.Text: A reason... to be fixated on me?

VD18D013.Text:
Today might be very dangerous for
you. So...

VD18E002.Text:
My, if it isn't Juri.
Standing up for this girl? That's
unlike you.

VD18E003.Text:
Or could it be that those rumors
are true?

VD18E004.Text:
That you're a lesbian with no
interest in boys...

VD18E005.Text:
H, hmph. Fine, I'll let you off
the hook for today.

VD18E007.Text:
Thank you. Sorry to be a nuisance
to you again...

VD18E008.Text:
Don't worry about it. I'm grateful
to you for getting my locket back.

VD18E010.Text:
So now it's my turn to return the
favor.

VD18E011.Text:
Will you let me help you track
down the sixth Duelist?

VD18E013.Text:
(Thank you, Juri-san. I still
can't but feel anxious...)

VD18E014.Text:
(But as long as Juri-san is with
me, I...)

VD18F003.Text:
You really have terrible taste in
women, sticking up for a girl like
this.

VD18F004.Text:
Like Himemiya Anthy, or this
bumpkin of an exchange student...

VD18F005.Text:
And when there are charming women
like myself in your same class!

VD18F006.Text:
Stop it. That's all I'm going to
say...

VD18F007.Text:
H, hmph. Fine, I'll let you off
the hook for today.

VD18F010.Text:
Yeah, I'm fine.
Don't worry, Miki-kun.

VD18F011.Text:
Try not to listen to anything
Nanami-kun says.

VD18F013.Text:
But, you know, it's a little
impertinent to look after someone
older than you.

VD18F015.Text:
Don't worry, I'm just kidding.
Actually, I was kind of nervous.

VD18F016.Text:
"Won't a prince on a white horse
come to save me?" I thought.

VD18F017.Text:
Haha. I'm sorry that I'm not a
prince on a white horse.

VD19X001.Text:
Okay, I'm heading back to the East
Dorm. What about you?

VD19X002.Text:
Well, I have a few more things to
do here at school...

VD19X003.Text:
Yeah? Well, don't let what Nanami
said get to you.

VD20A001.Text:
(Utena said not to worry about
what Nanami said, but of course I
am anyway...)

VD20A002.Text:
(And there's also the matter of
Chigusa. Something's definitely up
with her...)

VD20B001.Text:
(Now where should I go?
If I don't hurry, Utena's duel is
going to start...)

VD20D001.Text:
(If I ask my parents about what
Nanami said, they'll clear it up.)

VD20D002.Text:
(Instead of dwelling on it,
I should call them directly. I'm
sure they'll just laugh it off.)

VD20E001.Text:
(Right, this key... I should check
out the Student Council archives.
I might learn something...)

VD20F001.Text:
(Right, I should ask Tsuji-sensei.
Apparently he's the teacher who's
worked here longest.)

VD20G001.Text:
(That's right. I should check out
the Newspaper Club.)

VD20G002.Text:
(I might be able to find something
out there...)

VD20H001.Text:
(Right, I should go talk with
Chigusa-san. At this point, I've
just got to ask her directly...)

VD21X002.Text:
(Dad, it was a lie, right...?
Mom, it isn't true, is it...?)

VD21X003.Text:
Hello.
I'm afraid we're not in right now.

VD21X004.Text:
If you need to contact us, please
leave a message after the beep.

VD21X005.Text:
(They're not there... where could
they have gone?)

VD21X006.Text:
(Of course... today's the 25th.
It's my mom and dad's wedding
anniversary!)

VD21X007.Text: (They must have gone on a date...)

VD22X002.Text:
Have you seen Chigusa-san?
There's something I want to ask
her...

VD22X003.Text:
Chigusa-san?
She left with Anthy earlier.

VD22X005.Text:
Yeah, I thought they made a pretty
unusual pair, too.

VD22X006.Text:
Right, right... it looked like
they were heading towards the rose
garden.

VD22X008.Text:
(Chigusa-san and Anthy?
That's seriously an odd pair.)

VD22X009.Text:
(Does that mean that besides being
a Duelist, Chigusa has some other
business with the Rose Bride...?)

VD23X002.Text:
My mom and dad, fifteen years ago.
Just like they said, they were a
teacher and student.

VD23X003.Text:
(What's this?
Why is Chigusa-san there, too...?)

VD24X001.Text:
(I'm pretty sure his name was
Tsuji-sensei.)

VD24X002.Text:
(I wonder what kind of person he
is...?)

VD24X005.Text:
Tsuji-sensei, a middle school
student is here to see you.
Are you free?

VD24X006.Text:
Sure, hang on.
I'll be right there.

VD24X007.Text:
Hey. You're a middle school girl,
right? What is it?

VD24X008.Text:
Umm... I kind of had something I
wanted to ask you.

VD24X010.Text:
Do you remember the teacher who
used to be the advisor for the
Fencing Club 15 years ago?

VD24X012.Text:
Um... they say he got involved
with a girl from the fencing club,
and was fired...

VD24X017.Text:
Tsuji-sensei, the chairman would
like to see you. Immediately.

VD24X018.Text:
The chairman?
I wonder what it is.

VD24X019.Text: Sorry, but I've got to go.

VD24X020.Text:
Anthy...? Why're you running
errands for the Chairman?

VD24X022.Text:
Come to think of it... yesterday,
when my room was trashed, weren't
you in the East Dorm, Anthy?

VD24X024.Text:
...Hey, Anthy.
Do you know something about all
this?

VD24X025.Text:
...No, of course there's no way
you could. Sorry, forget I said
anything.

VD24X027.Text:
(Yeah. I shouldn't be suspicious
of Anthy...)

VD24X028.Text:
(I'm just on edge because the duel
is getting so close...)

VD25A002.Text: Oh, it's you from the other day.

VD25A003.Text:
Yes, thanks again for that.
Do you have any articles about the
white fencing hall?

VD25A006.Text:
It's an issue the club put out
fifteen years ago.

VD25A008.Text:
According to this, it looked like
the fire at the fencing hall 15
years ago was a work of arson.

VD25A009.Text:
In the ruins, they found what
seemed to be the body of S-san
from the middle school 2nd Year,
Class A.

VD25A011.Text:
Yeah... I don't know much about
that period,

VD25A012.Text:
but apparently S-san was captain
of the Fencing Club.

VD25A013.Text:
Hey, that's right, the date of the
fire was exactly fifteen years ago
today.

VD25A014.Text:
And they say it used to be a
really pretty white building...

VD25B002.Text:
Who is it? Sorry, but a deadline
is coming up, so we're not letting
in any visitors.

VD25B003.Text:
No, actually, Arisugawa Juri-san
from the high school told me to
come here...

VD25B004.Text:
Juri-san...?
I guess there's no helping it,
then.

VD25B005.Text: What can we do for you?

VD25B006.Text:
Um, do you know the old fencing
hall?

VD25B007.Text:
Sure. We're actually just writing
an article about it now.

VD25B009.Text:
Yeah. Night after night, a dark
shadow appears in the ruins...
it's one of the Seven Mysteries of
the School.

VD25B010.Text:
That's... just a ghost story,
right?

VD25B011.Text:
What's with that face you're
making? There's actually a lot of
evidence. Here, look at this.

VD25B013.Text:
It's an issue the club put out
fifteen years ago.

VD25B015.Text:
According to this, the old fencing
hall burned down in a fire fifteen
years ago.

VD25B016.Text:
But actually, there was evidence
that it was arson. And in the
ruins, they discovered...

VD25B017.Text:
...a corpse that appeared to be
"S-san", a 2nd year Middle School
student from Class A.

VD25B019.Text:
Yeah... I don't know much about
that period,

VD25B020.Text:
but apparently S-san was captain
of the Fencing Club.

VD25B021.Text:
Hey, that's right, the date of the
fire was exactly fifteen years ago
today.

VD25B022.Text:
And they say it used to be a
really pretty white building...

VD26X001.Text:
Hey, Anthy.
Are you here by yourself?

VD26X003.Text:
Have you seen Chigusa-san around?
There's something I want to ask
her...

VD26X005.Text: A letter... who is it from?

VD26X008.Text:
Come to the old fencing hall at
four o'clock. Bring your saber.

VD27X001.Text:
So you've given her the letter for
me.

VD27X002.Text:
Yes.
But that's as far as my help
extends.

VD27X003.Text:
I understand that, Ms. Rose Bride.
It's fine. I won't lose to any
princes or princesses any longer.

VD28X001.Text:
(Chigusa-san... so it was you
after all?)

VD28X002.Text:
(The person I first met at the
fencing hall...)

VD28X003.Text:
(And the one who stuck that
message card to my back.)

VD28X004.Text:
(What do you mean, I'll dis-
appear?)

VD28X005.Text:
(Chigusa-san, what on earth are
you trying to accomplish by
dueling?)

VD28X007.Text:
Uh, yeah.
Utena, are you headed out?

VD28X008.Text:
Yeah, the duel will be starting
soon.

VD28X010.Text:
Don't worry about it. We're not
going to kill each other.

VD28X011.Text:
It's just the same as always.
I've gotten used to it by now.

VD29X002.Text:
(Or I guess I should say, "here
I am again.")

VD29X003.Text:
(To finish what began on my first
day here...)

VD30X004.Text:
Chigusa-san, I came to ask you
some questions.

VD30X005.Text:
There are things I want to tell
you, too.

VD30X006.Text:
Follow me.
I want to show you something.
It might be faster than talking.

VT01X002.Text:
(If I just ask dad directly, he
should clear it up...)

VT01X003.Text:
Hello.
I'm afraid we're not in right now.

VT01X004.Text:
If you need to contact us, please
leave a message after the beep.

VT01X005.Text:
(They're not there... where could
they have gone?)

VT01X006.Text:
(Of course... today's the 25th.
It's my mom and dad's wedding
anniversary!)

VT01X007.Text: (They must have gone on a date...)

VT01X009.Text:
No response. Today's their
anniversary, so they must have
gone out somewhere.

VT02X001.Text:
This morning, I found something
interesting in the Student Council
archives.

VT02X003.Text:
It's a student registry from
fifteen years ago. Open it to the
bookmarked page.

VT02X005.Text:
Right, it's your parents, fifteen
years ago. Your father looks a lot
like me... I was surprised.

VT02X006.Text: Y, yeah, I guess he does.

VT02X007.Text:
But it's not like that's the
reason I like you or anything...

VT02X008.Text:
Heh, I understand.
Anyway, look in the upper left.
To that girl in the circle.

VT02X011.Text:
She was here at Ohtori fifteen
years ago... and in the same class
as your mother.

VT02X012.Text:
That can't be. Chigusa-san
certainly doesn't look...
Oh, Anthy?

VT02X013.Text:
Well, well. What business do you
have with us, Rose Bride?

VT02X014.Text:
Isn't it about time for the duel
to begin?

VT02X015.Text: A letter? Who is it from?

VT02X019.Text:
Come to the old fencing hall at
four o'clock. Bring your saber.

VT03X002.Text:
It was like this on my first day
here, too. And Chigusa-san was
inside...

VT03X003.Text:
Are you scared?
It looks like you're shaking.

VT03X005.Text:
Seeing a building from fifteen
years ago existing again like
this...

VT03X006.Text:
It makes me think that Chigusa-san
might also really be a person from
the past.

VT03X008.Text: I'll protect you with my life.

VT03X010.Text:
It's a knight's duty to give up
his life for his princess.

VT03X011.Text:
Now, let's go. Your destiny is
waiting inside...

VT04X004.Text:
This is where I first met
Chigusa-san...

VT04X006.Text:
How strange. When I came here
three days ago...

VT04X007.Text:
That's right.
There was only one mark.

VT04X008.Text:
So you came, princess.
And could this be your prince?

VT04X011.Text:
You've been quite energetic for
sometine who's been laid up for
fifteen years.

VT04X012.Text: But your plans will end here.

VT04X013.Text:
It seems that you've been doing
some digging.

VT04X014.Text:
Well, that's fine. As a reward for
your efforts, let me show you two
something interesting.

VT04X016.Text:
Just follow me. It's something
I want you to see. Showing it to
you should be faster than just
talking.

VS01X002.Text:
(If I just ask dad directly, he
should clear it up...)

VS01X003.Text:
Hello.
I'm afraid we're not in right now.

VS01X004.Text:
If you need to contact us, please
leave a message after the beep.

VS01X005.Text:
(They're not there... where could
they have gone?)

VS01X006.Text:
(Of course... today's the 25th.
It's my mom and dad's wedding
anniversary!)

VS01X007.Text: (They must have gone on a date...)

VS01X010.Text:
Today's their anniversary, so they
must have gone out somewhere.

VS02X002.Text:
She says she was enrolled in this
school until three years ago, but
that's a lie.

VS02X004.Text:
If she was a 2nd-year middle
school student three years ago,
that would make her my classmate.

VS02X005.Text:
But she definitely wasn't in the
same year as me.

VS02X007.Text:
That girl must have had a reason
for transferring into your class.

VS02X008.Text:
Why would she want to be in my
class?

VS02X009.Text:
Your class also includes Tenjou
Utena, and the Rose Bride...
Anthy.

VS02X011.Text:
If Chigusa-san is a Duelist, it
would make sense for her to target
those two...

VS02X012.Text:
But she's seemed to take more
interest in me than in either of
them...

VS02X013.Text:
How bizarre. Surely there's
nothing she could do to you that
would help her win the duels.

VS02X018.Text: A letter? Who is it from?

VS02X022.Text:
Come to the old fencing hall at
four o'clock. Bring your saber.

VS03X002.Text:
It was like this on my first day
here, too. And Chigusa-san was
inside...

VS03X006.Text:
Hey, exchange student. Didn't you
notice anyone sticking the card on
you?

VS03X007.Text:
Hey. What do you have to say,
transfer student?

VS03X008.Text:
This incident happened the day she
transferred here. It's too much to
be a coincidence.

VS03X009.Text:
Oh... that's alright.
After all, I...

VS03X011.Text:
It's fine. I know that you're in
love with Anthy, Saionji-san.

VS03X012.Text:
But I won't lose.
Some day, I'll make you notice me.

VS04X004.Text:
This is where I first met
Chigusa-san...

VS04X006.Text:
How strange. When I came here
three days ago...

VS04X007.Text:
That's right.
There was only one mark.

VS04X008.Text:
So you came, princess.
And could this be your prince?

VS04X010.Text:
So you were the Duelist after all,
Sanjouin Chigusa.

VS04X011.Text:
Unfortunately, I'll be the one to
beat Tenjou Utena.
As for you...

VS04X012.Text:
Oh? I thought we settled this
already.

VS04X016.Text:
Chigusa-san, there are some things
I want to ask you.

VS04X017.Text:
There are things I want to tell
you, too.

VS04X018.Text:
Follow me.
I want to show you something.

VS04X019.Text: It should be faster than talking.

VJ01X002.Text:
(If I just ask dad directly, he
should clear it up...)

VJ01X003.Text:
Hello.
I'm afraid we're not in right now.

VJ01X004.Text:
If you need to contact us, please
leave a message after the beep.

VJ01X005.Text:
(They're not there... where could
they have gone?)

VJ01X006.Text:
(Of course... today's the 25th.
It's my mom and dad's wedding
anniversary!)

VJ01X007.Text: (They must have gone on a date...)

VJ01X010.Text:
Today's their anniversary, so they
must have gone out somewhere.

VJ02X001.Text:
I found out something interesting
about the old fencing hall you've
talked about.

VJ02X003.Text:
Those ruins definitely appear to
have been a fencing hall.
A chalk-white one.

VJ02X005.Text:
There's more written here.
It's a Newspaper Club article from
fifteen years ago.

VJ02X006.Text:
...you're right. It burned down
June 25th. In the ruins, they
found the corpse of the fencing
club captain, "S-san"...

VJ02X008.Text:
Also, the fencing hall looked
exactly as you described it.

VJ02X009.Text:
There's no way someone who just
transferred here could have known
those small details.

VJ02X010.Text:
It seems likely that the old
fencing hall truly was there, as
you said.

VJ02X012.Text:
Yeah. And if what you said is
true... hmm?

VJ02X014.Text: Himemiya Anthy. What do you want?

VJ02X015.Text:
I'm different than Tenjou and
Saionji. Don't think you can
decieve me the same way.

VJ02X019.Text:
Come to the old fencing hall at
four o'clock. Bring your saber.

VJ03X002.Text:
It was like this on my first day
here, too. And Chigusa-san was
inside...

VJ03X003.Text:
Of course. And she should be there
again. Let's go.

VJ04X004.Text:
This is where I first met
Chigusa-san...

VJ04X006.Text:
How strange. When I came here
three days ago, there was only
one mark...

VJ04X007.Text:
Hmm... perhaps she meant for you
to see it.

VJ04X009.Text:
It's strange, isn't it?
For a woman to be in love with
another woman.

VJ04X011.Text:
No... no, it isn't. I don't think
it's strange at all.

VJ04X015.Text:
Well, well. Sorry for breaking up
your steamy love scene.

VJ04X016.Text:
So you came, princess.
And could this be your prince?

VJ04X017.Text:
Sanjouin. So you were the new
Duelist after all.

VJ04X018.Text:
Arisugawa-kun, you shouldn't have
affairs. You'll make the person in
your locket sad.

VJ04X020.Text:
Wait. Chigusa-san, there are some
things I want to ask you.

VJ04X021.Text:
There are things I want to tell
you, too.

VJ04X022.Text:
Follow me.
I want to show you something.
It might be faster than talking.

VM01X002.Text:
(If I just ask dad directly, he
should clear it up...)

VM01X003.Text:
Hello.
I'm afraid we're not in right now.

VM01X004.Text:
If you need to contact us, please
leave a message after the beep.

VM01X005.Text:
(They're not there... where could
they have gone?)

VM01X006.Text:
(Of course... today's the 25th.
It's my mom and dad's wedding
anniversary!)

VM01X007.Text: (They must have gone on a date...)

VM01X009.Text:
Apparently they're not at home.
Today's their anniversary, so they
must have gone out somewhere.

VM02X001.Text:
About Sanjouin Chigusa... just
like you suspected, senpai,
there's something up with her.

VM02X003.Text:
You know that she defeated
Saionji-senpai, right?

VM02X005.Text:
Even though she's so skilled, I'd
never heard the name Sanjouin
Chigusa before.

VM02X006.Text:
And I was pretty sure I knew all
the notable fencers of the past
several years.

VM02X008.Text:
Please, you don't have to flatter
me.

VM02X009.Text:
Anyway, I decided to search though
past generations of middle school
and high school fencing matches.

VM02X010.Text:
And I found someone named Sanjouin
Chigusa.

VM02X011.Text:
She used to be the captain of
Ohtori Academy's Fencing Club.

VM02X012.Text:
But that was fifteen years ago.
She was captain for one year, as a
second-year middle school student.

VM02X014.Text:
Of course, I'm not saying that the
Sanjouin Chigusa from fifteen
years ago...

VM02X015.Text:
...and the one who transferred
into your class are the same
person.

VM02X016.Text:
It's possible she's simply using
the same name.

VM02X017.Text: But why would she do that?

VM02X023.Text:
Come to the old fencing hall at
four o'clock. Bring your saber.

VM03X001.Text:
What a shock...
These old ruins have...

VM03X002.Text:
It was like this on my first day
here, too.
And Chigusa-san was inside...

VM03X006.Text:
I may be younger than you, but
I'm still a man.

VM04X004.Text:
This is where I first met
Chigusa-san...

VM04X006.Text:
How strange. When I came here
three days ago...

VM04X007.Text:
That's right.
There was only one mark.

VM04X008.Text:
So you came, princess.
And could this be your prince?

VM04X009.Text:
So you were the masked Duelist
after all.

VM04X010.Text:
I'm going to expose this fifteen-
year artifice.

VM04X012.Text:
You might be a genius, but I think
this is beyond even your under-
standing.

VM04X013.Text: I won't know until I try, will I?

VM04X014.Text:
Wait. Chigusa-san, there are some
things I want to ask you.

VM04X015.Text:
There are things I want to tell
you, too.

VM04X016.Text:
Follow me.
I want to show you something.
It might be faster than talking.

VD31A001.Text:
Chigusa-san, how far do these
stairs go?

VD31A004.Text:
What I was wearing fifteen years
ago.

VD31A005.Text:
Fifteen years ago...
She and I were best friends...

VD31A006.Text:
She was bad at both sports and
academics, but she was cute...
a very feminine girl.

VD31A007.Text:
He was the fencing club's advisor.
He was strong and intellectual...

VD31A008.Text:
I developed a one-sided love for
him...

VD31A009.Text: I practiced as hard as I could.

VD31A010.Text:
So that he would recognize me.
So that he would praise me...
As hard as I could.

VD31A011.Text:
I practiced, and practiced, and
practiced, and practiced.

VD31A012.Text:
And then, in the match to decide
who would participate in the
national tournament...

VD31B002.Text:
Yes...
It's no big deal... uhh.

VD31B003.Text:
Such cruel behavior towards a
friend...

VD31B004.Text: You didn't have to go so far.

VD31B005.Text:
You were already winning the
match.

VD31B006.Text: And it's only a club activity.

VD31C001.Text:
The next day, their indiscretions
came to light.

VD31C002.Text:
Those two...
they were doing it behind my back.

VD31C004.Text:
They were let loose from the
school.

VD31C005.Text:
And then a few months later,
I received an invitation to their
wedding.

VD31C008.Text:
And so, on the day of the wedding,
I purposefully set this fencing
hall on fire.

VD31C009.Text:
So, the one in the fire was you
after all!

VD31C010.Text:
It seems you've been doing some
investigating. What nerve,
breaking into peoples' privacy!

VD31C012.Text:
The one my Prince chose was a girl
who put forth no effort, who did
naught but wait for her happiness.

VD31C013.Text:
I was trying so hard to become a
princess and wed a prince, but it
turned out I was the evil queen!

VD31C014.Text:
But, thanks to a certain person,
I've returned to this world.

VD31C015.Text:
This time, it's my turn...
the queen's turn to win!

VD31C016.Text:
On behalf of all queens and old
witches,

VD31C017.Text:
who have always lost to princesses
who trade in tears and misery...
I'll win!

VD31C018.Text:
With "The Power to Revolutionize
the World", I'll change the past.

VD31C019.Text:
I'm going to change that past
where your parents are bound
together.

VD31C024.Text:
I'll make you disappear.
On your parents' wedding
anniversary, here, today.

VD31C025.Text:
I see; so that's why you wanted to
duel on the 25th...

VD31C026.Text:
Now, give me that saber.
With that fateful saber,
I'll overthrow Tenjou Utena.

VD32X001.Text:
That's not going to happen!
I'm not going to let you go to
the Dueling Arena!

VD32X002.Text:
Well, well.
Are you saying that you want to
face me, Snow White-chan?

VD32X003.Text:
Unfortunately,
I don't have the time
to face off against you.

VD32X004.Text:
Hey, come over here.
Take care of her for me.

VD33A001.Text:
As it is now, this person is
naught but a puppet with no
nobility...

VD33A002.Text:
Nothing more than a robot who
moves according to my words.

VD33A004.Text:
I simply borrowed what he
treasures for just a bit.

VD33A006.Text:
There is no Prince here who will
save you.

VD33C004.Text:
I simply borrowed what she
treasures for just a bit.

VD33E001.Text:
As they are now, they are naught
but puppets who lost their
nobility...

VD33E002.Text:
Nothing more than robots who move
according to my word.

VD33E004.Text:
I simply borrowed what they
treasure for just a bit.

VD35X004.Text:
(Oh no! As it stands, Utena is in
danger...)

VD35X006.Text:
(Utena's dueling... Is there
anything I can do to help her?)

VD35X007.Text:
(Anyway,
I've got to get out of here.
I can't do anything from here.)

VT05X002.Text:
Stand back. It's the duty of a
knight to protect a fair lady.

VT05X004.Text:
Hmph. Are you saying you're about
to stand in my way again?

VT05X005.Text:
I am. Can you defeat me, I wonder?
I, who look exactly like your
Prince?

VT05X008.Text:
You saw the register from fifteen
years ago, didn't you? Your father
and I were all but doppelgangers.

VT05X010.Text:
Until now, I wasn't certain of it,
but after hearing what she said, I
finally understand.

VT05X012.Text:
You don't want to hurt me, the
mirror image of the Prince for
whom you yearned long ago.

VT05X013.Text:
That's why you haven't targeted me
like you had the others, such as
Saionji and Juri.

VT05X016.Text:
I see. I hadn't expected you to
notice. You're something else,
Kiryuu Touga.

VT05X018.Text:
It's true that I had hesitated to
hurt you. But that, too, is at an
end.

VT05X019.Text:
You represent the final softness
within me. Here and now, by my own
hands, I myself consign it to
oblivion!

VT05X024.Text:
I told you I would bury my
softness, did I not?

VT05X025.Text:
Would I really challenge you fair
and square...? You're the soft
one, Kiryuu Touga.

VT05X026.Text:
Heh...
To think that I, of all people...

VT05X028.Text:
Why is this happening...? You're
all Student Council members, this
is awful!

VT06X005.Text:
(Right, I've gotta stop
Chigusa-san. I've gotta help
Utena!)

VT06X008.Text: I'm so glad you're all right.

VT06X010.Text:
I think we're probably under the
former fencing hall...

VT06X011.Text:
I see. So Sanjouin knocked me
out...

VT06X012.Text:
How careless of me. I should have
been watching my back...

VT06X013.Text:
I'm so sorry, Touga-san. It's my
fault you got wrapped up in this
mess...

VT06X014.Text: You have nothing to apologize for.

VT06X015.Text:
I'm the one who got you wrapped up
in it, after all...

VT06X017.Text:
From the moment I first saw you,
I'd fallen in love with your
beautiful eyes.

VT06X018.Text:
That's why I invited you to the
masquerade...

VT06X019.Text:
And that's what led to all of
this. Forgive me...

VT06X020.Text:
No... no, Touga-san.
Either way, I'm sure I would have
been targeted.

VT06X021.Text: So please don't let it bother you.

VT06X024.Text:
However, we can't afford to sit
around like this forever.
Tenjou-kun's in danger.

VT06X026.Text:
If I were more like Utena or
Juri-san, I could be of more use
to you...

VT06X027.Text:
That's not true. You have things
you can do, too.

VT06X029.Text:
I do. Are your teeth in healthy
condition?

VT06X031.Text:
Right. Use your teeth to bite
through my ropes.

VT06X033.Text:
I understand. I'll give it a try.
If it's for you, Touga-san, I can
do anything!

VS05X005.Text:
I won't let you lay one finger on
her. I'm going to protect her!

VS05X006.Text:
A Prince, eh...?
Lines like that make me want to
puke!

VS06X005.Text:
(Right, I've gotta stop
Chigusa-san. I've gotta help
Utena!)

VS06X010.Text:
We're probably under the former
fencing hall.

VS06X011.Text:
I see; that wench Sanjouin got
me...

VS06X012.Text:
What do we do? If Chigusa-san
beats Utena, I'll vanish.

VS06X013.Text: And if that happens, I won't...

VS06X014.Text:
I won't be able to see you any
longer.

VS06X018.Text:
Oh, uh, okay...
But what in the world are you...?

VS06X020.Text:
Gh... hnngh... These puny ropes...
are no match for... hrgnh... guh!

VS06X024.Text:
(Even if I end up vanishing away,
I'm happy I met you...)

VJ05X001.Text:
I can't go along with that
scenario.

VJ05X003.Text:
Leave this to me. Didn't I tell
you? This time, it's my turn to do
you a favor.

VJ05X004.Text:
Hmm. As I'd expect of the fencing
club captain. Don't you look good?

VJ05X005.Text:
Enough of your nonsense. If you
too were the captain fifteen years
ago, then draw your sword without
hesitation.

VJ06X005.Text:
(Right, I've gotta stop
Chigusa-san. I've gotta help
Utena!)

VJ06X010.Text:
We're probably under the former
fencing hall.

VJ06X012.Text:
What do we do? If Chigusa-san
beats Utena, I'll vanish.

VJ06X013.Text: And if that happens, I won't...

VJ06X014.Text:
I won't be able to see you any
longer.

VJ06X017.Text:
How in the world did you get the
rope off?

VJ06X020.Text:
To think that she didn't search my
body...
How naive, Sanjouin.

VM05X002.Text:
Please stand back. I'll handle
this.

VM05X004.Text:
Heh heh heh. Kaoru Miki-kun, huh?
Your little sister was a bit
more docile than you are...

VM05X005.Text:
You're wasting your time, trying
to provoke me. I won't be lead
astray anymore.

VM05X006.Text:
I know what's important to me, and
what it is I need to protect.

VM05X008.Text: I don't want to lose you.

VM05X009.Text:
Even if I end up trading my life
for yours...

VM05X010.Text:
Miki-kun... Me, too...
I'm in love with you, too...

VM05X011.Text:
Could I have you cut the love
scene there?

VM05X012.Text:
How sickening. It feels just like
I've been shown a school arts
festival play.

VM05X013.Text:
A Prince, eh...?
Lines like that make me want to
puke!

VM06X005.Text:
(I've gotta stop Chigusa-san.
I've gotta help Utena!)

VM06X008.Text: I'm so glad you're all right.

VM06X010.Text:
We're probably under the former
fencing hall.

VM06X012.Text:
I'm so sorry. I talked big, but in
the end, I couldn't protect you.

VM06X013.Text:
It's okay. Just hearing you say
that made me so...

VM06X014.Text:
It made me so happy you feel that
way, Miki-kun.

VM06X015.Text:
Even if I end up vanishing like
this,

VM06X016.Text:
if you remember me, I know I can
count myself blessed.

VM06X020.Text:
No. I won't allow myself to lose
my shining thing again.

VM06X021.Text:
I thought I'd finally found my
shining thing in you...
Despite that...

VM06X023.Text:
We still have time. For now, let's
make our escape. We mustn't give
up.

VM06X025.Text:
I'm pretty pathetic, having to get
tutored by my underclassman.

VM06X026.Text:
That's right. Please pull yourself
together, senpai.

VU01X003.Text:
(A basement...?
I'm probably under the old fencing
hall.)

VU01X005.Text:
(I've gotta stop Chigusa-san.
I've gotta help Utena!)

VU01X007.Text:
Chu-Chu!
You brought me the key!

VU02X001.Text:
Thank you, Chu-Chu.
I'm out thanks to you.

VU02X003.Text:
You're right. We don't have time
to stand around here.
Let's go, Chu-Chu!

VV01X001.Text:
That's not going to happen!
I'm not going to let you go to
the Dueling Arena!

VV01X002.Text:
Well, well.
Are you saying that you want to
face me, Snow White-chan?

VV01X003.Text:
Sorry, but I'm afraid I won't go
easy on you.

VV01X004.Text: I don't need you to go easy on me!

VV01X006.Text:
Your mother was weak, too...
You're truly your mother's
daughter.

VV01X007.Text:
(I couldn't even see Chigusa's
saber moving!)

VV02X003.Text:
Senpai, you told us about the
white fencing hall, right?

VV02X004.Text:
I got kind of worried, and came to
take a look. And then...

VV02X005.Text:
Thank you, Miki-kun.
You really believed me.

VV02X007.Text:
My, you have quite a thing for
older girls.

VV02X010.Text:
Don't look so serious.
It was a joke.

VV02X011.Text:
Well, even for you, Juri-senpai,
it's in bad taste!
That kind of joke...

VV02X013.Text:
More importantly, let's get
moving. Tenjou and Sanjouin's duel
should have already started.

VD38A001.Text:
Please, Touga-san!
Utena's in danger!
Let us pass!

VD38A002.Text:
Return to your senses, Touga-san!
You've had your nobility stolen by
Chigusa-san!

VD38A003.Text:
In truth, you have a noble heart!
You wouldn't let Chigusa use
you as a tool for revenge!

VD38A004.Text:
Please, return to your old self,
Touga-san!

VD38B001.Text:
Please, Saionji-san!
Utena's in danger!
Let us pass!

VD38B002.Text:
Return to your senses,
Saionji-san! You've had your
nobility stolen by Chigusa-san!

VD38B003.Text:
In truth, you have a noble heart!
You wouldn't let Chigusa use
you as a tool for revenge!

VD38B004.Text:
Please, return to your old self,
Saionji-san!

VD38C001.Text:
Please,Juri-san!
Utena's in danger!
Let us pass!

VD38C002.Text:
Return to your senses, Juri-san!
You've had your nobility stolen by
Chigusa-san!

VD38C003.Text:
In truth, you have a noble heart!
You wouldn't let Chigusa use
you as a tool for revenge!

VD38C004.Text:
Please, return to your old self,
Juri-san!

VD38D001.Text:
Please, Miki-kun!
Utena's in danger!
Let us pass!

VD38D002.Text:
Return to your senses, Miki-kun!
You've had your nobility stolen by
Chigusa-san!

VD38D003.Text:
In truth, you have a noble heart!
You wouldn't let Chigusa use
you as a tool for revenge!

VD38D004.Text:
Please, return to your old self,
Miki-kun!

VD39A002.Text: I won't let you lay a hand on her.

VD39A004.Text:
Perhaps a prince is someone who
appears just in the nick of time.
...Heh.

VD39B002.Text: I won't let you lay a hand on her.

VD39B004.Text:
I came to investigate this place,
but ran into some unexpected
delays.

VD39B005.Text:
To think that that Sanjouin
person's influence runs this
deep...

VD39B006.Text:
However, now that I'm here,
you don't need to worry.

VD39B007.Text:
Leave this puppet to me.
Just stand back and observe my
swordsmanship.

VD39C002.Text: I won't let you lay a hand on her.

VD39C005.Text:
To think that Sanjouin's influence
runs this deep...

VD39C006.Text:
Juri-san,
he's just being manipulated by
Sanjouin-san... so...

VD39C007.Text:
Ah, understood.
I'll make sure not to harm him.

VD39D004.Text:
Please excuse me for being late.
I came to look for Kozue, but
ran into some unexpected delays.

VD39D006.Text:
Yes.
I left her sleeping in the equip-
ment room up above.

VD39D007.Text:
That's why I'm late in
coming to save you...

VD39D008.Text:
It's fine.
Anyway,
please try to not to be too rough
when you fight, Miki-kun.

VD39D009.Text:
This is all because of Chigusa-
san's manipulations...

VD39D010.Text:
I understand.
I don't want to hurt anybody,
anyway...

VD45B002.Text:
Yes, so don't worry. What's im-
portant is that we hurry onwards.
Tenjou-kun must be having a tough
battle around now.

VD45C002.Text:
Yes...
Although taking on two opponents
in a row is rather tiring.

VD45C003.Text:
Anyway, we should hurry.
Tenjou-kun must be having a tough
battle around now.

VD45E002.Text:
Yes, so don't worry. What's im-
portant is that we hurry onwards.
Tenjou must be having a tough
battle around now.

VD45F003.Text:
Come, let's head up. I won't let
that wench Sanjouin do as she
pleases any further.

VD45H002.Text:
Yes, so don't worry. What's im-
portant is that we hurry onwards.
Tenjou must be having a tough
battle around now.

VD45I002.Text:
Heh, this is completely different
than taking on five opponents in
a row in practice.

VD45I004.Text:
But we can't stay here forever.
Let's hurry onwards.

VD45K002.Text:
Yes, don't worry.
More importantly, let's hurry on.

VD45K003.Text:
Tenjou-senpai must be having
a tough battle around now.

VD45L003.Text:
Tenjou-senpai would be in a real
pinch if I let myself collapse
here.

VD45L004.Text:
Now, let's get going.
If we don't hurry,
the duel is going to end...

VD47B001.Text:
Tch.
Not going to let us go easily, are
they?

VD47C001.Text:
Other than me,
she managed to ensnare everyone.

VD47C002.Text:
My goodness.
So the whole Ohtori Academy
Student Council has fallen...

VD47E001.Text:
Tch! That wench Sanjouin didn't
just get one person wrapped up in
her web?

VD47F001.Text:
So this means that she ensnared
all the members besides myself.
Tch--curse you, Sanjouin...

VD47H001.Text:
Kch.
Not again.
Curse that Sanjouin...

VD47I001.Text:
Kch.
So besides me,
everyone is here...

VD47I002.Text:
We Student Council members'
hearts are suprisingly fragile...

VD47K001.Text:
No... she ensnared another
one of our senpai, too...

VD47K002.Text:
I have no choice.
I can't go easy on them!

VD47L001.Text:
No way...
She got everyone except for me...

VD47L002.Text:
But I'll get us through.
Even if all my senpai
are against us...

VD49C002.Text: I won't let you lay a hand on her.

VD49C004.Text:
Sorry I'm late.
To think that Sanjouin's
influence runs this deep...

VD49C005.Text:
Juri-san,
he's just being manipulated by
Sanjouin-san... so...

VD49C006.Text:
Ah, I understand.
I'll be sure not to harm him.

VD64A001.Text:
Whew... It seems we've finally
managed to clear a path.

VD64A003.Text:
Amazing as I am, even I'm a bit
tired, I suppose. Still, we can't
afford to stop here.

VD64A004.Text: Right. Let's hurry out of here.

VD64A005.Text:
We've got to do something to help
Utena...

VD64B001.Text: Phew... So this makes all of them.

VD64B002.Text:
Good grief. How could members of
the Student Council get reduced to
this state just by Sanjouin alone?

VD64B004.Text:
Yeah, it's nothing serious.
Besides which, we still have
something we need to do.

VD64B005.Text: Right. Let's hurry out of here.

VD64B006.Text:
We've got to do something to help
Utena...

VD64C001.Text:
Whew... So this is the end, eh.
I never thought I would fight
Student Council members outside
of the duel arena.

VD64C003.Text:
Yes. All the same, the fight just
now did take a bit of a toll.

VD64C004.Text: But we can't afford to rest here.

VD64C005.Text: Right. Let's hurry out of here.

VD64C006.Text:
We've got to do something to help
Utena...

VD64D003.Text:
Yes. My upperclassmen were as
formidable as I would expect--but
we cannot afford to rest here.

VD64D004.Text: Right. Let's hurry out of here.

VD64D005.Text:
We've got to do something to help
Utena...

VT08X004.Text:
It's all right. Ever since the
days of yore, it's been a rule
that a knight who's been kissed by
his Princess is invincible.

VS08X004.Text:
It's fine. I'm not one to be
bested by so weak an opponent!

VS08X005.Text:
I won't lose to anyone anymore.
Not to Sanjouin, not to Tenjou...

VJ08X004.Text:
I told you, this time it's my
turn to help you.

VJ08X005.Text:
Earlier, I failed to keep my
promise. But this time...

VM08X004.Text:
It's all right.
Despite appearances, I'm quite
strong.

VM08X005.Text:
Besides which... I've had enough.
I won't lose my shining thing
again...

VD66A001.Text:
The duel between Sanjouin and
Tenjou has most likely
begun.

VD66A002.Text:
If what Sanjouin said was true,
the saber you handed to her will
probably manifest a power greater
than that of the Sword of Dios.

VD66A003.Text:
If that happens, then even Tenjou
will lose...

VD66A005.Text:
(All because of me and my
parents... I don't want that!)

VD66A006.Text: Isn't there anything we can do?

VD66A008.Text:
If Sanjouin Chigusa is nothing but
a soul, she should need a yori-
shiro... an object that would
allow her to keep existing in this
world.

VD66A010.Text:
Right. It's akin to a key that
fastens the real world here and
the otherworld together.

VD66A011.Text:
If we destroy that, she won't be
able to keep existing in this
world...

VD66A012.Text:
There must be something that she
treasured.

VD66A013.Text:
Something from her past...
Or somewhere...
Or someone...

VD66A014.Text:
(A thing from her past...
Something important to her...
What could it be?)

VD66B001.Text:
What do you intend to do? Sanjouin
and Tenjou's duel is most likely
beginning.

VD66B002.Text:
If what Sanjouin said was true,
the saber you handed to her will
probably manifest a power greater
than that of the Sword of Dios.

VD66B003.Text:
If that happens, then even Tenjou
will lose...

VD66B005.Text:
(All because of me and my
parents... I don't want that!)

VD66B006.Text: Isn't there anything we can do?

VD66B008.Text:
If Sanjouin Chigusa is nothing but
a soul, she should need a yori-
shiro... an object that would
allow her to keep existing in this
world.

VD66B010.Text:
Right. It's akin to a key that
fastens the real world here and
the otherworld together.

VD66B011.Text:
If we destroy that, she won't be
able to keep existing in this
world...

VD66B012.Text:
There must be something that she
treasured.

VD66B013.Text:
Something from her past...
Or somewhere...
Or someone...

VD66B014.Text:
(A thing from her past...
Something important to her...
What could it be?)

VD66C001.Text:
The duel between Sanjouin and
Tenjou has most likely
begun.

VD66C002.Text:
If what Sanjouin said was true,
the saber you handed to her will
probably manifest a power greater
than that of the Sword of Dios.

VD66C003.Text:
If that happens, then even Tenjou
will lose...

VD66C005.Text:
(All because of me and my
parents... I don't want that!)

Something from her past...

VD66D001.Text:
What should we do? Tenjou-senpai's

If what she said was true, the

VD66D003.Text:

VD66D005.Text:

If Sanjouin Chigusa is nothing but

yorishiro... an object that would

world.

VD66D011.Text:
You can think of it as something
like a key that fastens the real
world here and the otherworld
together.

VD66D012.Text:
If we destroy that, she won't be

world...

VD66D013.Text:
There must be something that she
treasured.

VD66D014.Text:
Do you have any idea?
It might be a memento, or a place,
or a person...

VD66D015.Text:
(A thing from her past...
Something important to her...
What could it be?)

VV03A002.Text:
(On the wall of the fencing hall,
there are the name tags of all its
members. That's gotta be it!)

VV03C002.Text:
(It's got to be that weird
calendar.)

VV03B002.Text:
(When I tried to open the locker,
Chigusa acted kind of weird...)

VD67A002.Text:
Look at that; Sanjouin's name is
here.

VD67A003.Text:
(It's Chigusa-san's name!
And next to it is mom's old name.)

VD67A004.Text:
(I guess Chigusa's story was true
after all...)

VD67A005.Text:
How odd.
The club advisor's spot is empty.

VD67A006.Text:
(Only the club advisor's name tag
is missing...?)

VD67A007.Text:
(But from what I've heard,
my dad should have had one, too.)

VD67A008.Text: All right, this name tag, then.

VD67A009.Text:
Looks like we were wrong.
Do you have any other idea?

VD67B003.Text:
(It's Chigusa-san's name!
And next to it is mom's old name.)

VD67B004.Text:
(I guess Chigusa's story was true

VD67C008.Text: All right, this name tag, then.

VD67C009.Text:
Looks like we were wrong.

VD67D002.Text:
Please take a look--Sanjouin
Chigusa's name is there.

VD67D003.Text:
(It's Chigusa-san's name!
And next to it is mom's old name.)

VD67D004.Text:
(I guess Chigusa's story was true

VD67D005.Text:
That's odd. It seems the only spot

advisor...

VD67D006.Text:
(Only the club advisor's name tag

VD67D007.Text:
(But from what I've heard,
my dad should have had one, too.)

VD67D009.Text:
It seems like we were wrong.
Do you happen to have any other

VD67E003.Text:
(It's Chigusa-san's name!
And next to it is mom's old name.)

VD67E004.Text:
(I guess Chigusa's story was true
after all...)

VD67E005.Text:
(Huh?
The space for the club advisor
is empty...?)

VD67E006.Text:
(But from what I've heard,
my dad should have had one, too.)

VD67E007.Text:
(Anyway, let's try breaking the
name plate. Maybe that'll do
something!)

VD67E008.Text:
(That didn't seem to work.
Don't I have any other clues...?)

VD68A001.Text:
What a tasteless calendar. But
what does the red circle around
the 25th mean...?

VD68A002.Text:
Chigusa-san probably put it there.
See? This calendar is dated
fifteen years back.

VD68A003.Text: So it is, now that you mention it.

VD68A005.Text:
Looks like we were wrong.
Do you have any other idea?

VD68B001.Text:
What a tasteless calendar. It
looks like the 25th is circled in
red...

VD68B002.Text:
Chigusa-san probably put it there.
See? This calendar is dated
fifteen years back.

VD68B003.Text: So it is, now that you mention it.

VD68B005.Text:
Looks like we were wrong.
Do you have any other idea?

VD68C001.Text:
What a tasteless calendar. It

VD68C002.Text:
Chigusa-san probably put it there.

VD68C003.Text: So it is, now that you mention it.

VD68C005.Text:
Looks like we were wrong.

VD68D002.Text:
It seems the 25th is circled in

VD68D004.Text:
See? This calendar is dated

VD68D005.Text: So it is, now that you mention it.

VD68D007.Text:
It seems like we were wrong.
Do you happen to have any other

VD68E002.Text:
(Chigusa-san probably put it here.
This calendar is dated fifteen
years ago.)

VD68E003.Text:
(Anyway, let's try breaking it.
Maybe that'll do something!)

VD68E004.Text:
(That didn't seem to work.
Any other ideas...?)

VD69A001.Text: It's here, I'm sure of it.

VD69A002.Text:
(She seemed flustered that time.
There's definitely got to be
something in here!)

VD69A003.Text:
I see... Chigusa's locker.
Open it.

VD69A006.Text:
A red string...
It's a love charm passed down in
Ohtori Academy...

VD69A007.Text:
Chigusa-san... So you loved my
father that much...

VD69A008.Text:
Do it.
If you break that, Sanjouin will
be finished.

VD69A010.Text:
Yet if you don't, you'll be the
one to vanish.

VD69B001.Text: It's here, I'm sure of it.

VD69B002.Text:
(She seemed flustered that time.
There's definitely got to be
something in here!)

VD69B003.Text:
I see... Chigusa's locker.
Open it.

VD69B006.Text:
A red string...
It's a love charm passed down in

VD69B007.Text:
Chigusa-san... So you loved my
father that much...

VD69B008.Text:
Do it.
If you break that, Sanjouin will
be finished.

VD69B010.Text:
Idiot! If you don't, then you'll

VD69C001.Text: It's here, I'm sure of it.

VD69C002.Text:

VD69C003.Text:

VD69C006.Text:
A red string...

VD69C007.Text:
Chigusa-san... So you loved my

VD69C008.Text:
Do it.
If you break that, Sanjouin will

VD69C010.Text:
Idiot! If you don't, then you'll
