VD69D001.Text: It's here, I'm sure of it.

VD69D002.Text:
(She seemed flustered that time.
There's definitely got to be
something in here!)

VD69D004.Text: Well then, I'm going to open it.

VD69D007.Text:
A red string...
It's a love charm passed down in
Ohtori Academy...

VD69D008.Text:
Chigusa-san... So you loved my
father that much...

VD69D009.Text:
Now, all we have to do is smash
this and she will be finished.

VD69D011.Text:
But if you don't do it, you'll
be the one to vanish.

VD69E001.Text: It's here, I'm sure of it.

VD69E002.Text:
(She seemed flustered that time.
There's definitely got to be
something in here!)

VD69E005.Text:
(And a red string...?
This must be that love charm
passed down at Ohtori Academy.)

VD69E006.Text:
(Chigusa-san... So you loved my
father that much...)

VD69E007.Text:
(If I break this,
what will happen to her?)

VD69E008.Text:
(……but if I don't,
then Utena will...)

VU07X001.Text:
Utena's duel must have
already started by now.

VU07X002.Text:
If what Chigusa-san said is true,
the saber she stole...)

VU07X003.Text:
will manifest even more power 
than the Sword of Dios.

VU07X006.Text:
(All because of me and my
parents... I don't want that!)

VU07X007.Text:
It's okay, Chu-Chu.
We'll definitely save Utena.

VU07X008.Text:
(I said that to reassure Chu-Chu,
but what can I do...?)

VU07X010.Text:
If Chigusa-san is a spirit, maybe
there's some kind of key that
links this world and the next,

VU07X011.Text:
and lets her stay on
in this world.

VU07X012.Text:
And if I destroy it,
she'll disappear...

VU07X013.Text:
If there is such a thing,
it's probably something that's
deeply connected to her.

VU07X014.Text:
Probably something that she holds
very dear.

VU07X015.Text:
Yeah... like, some kind of
precious thing, or place, or
person...

VU07X016.Text:
A memento...
that she holds dear...?

VV03X002.Text:
But then, will Tenjou-senpai even
be able to win in the usual way?

VV03X008.Text:
The same as them.
I was worried about you.

VV03X010.Text:
Hey, Touga. How about you cut that
out and tell us how Chigusa can be
brought down.

VV03X012.Text:
If Sanjouin's soul still persists,
there should be some object that
binds it to this world.

VV03X015.Text:
An object that a spirit uses as a
sort of medium when they manifest.

VV03X016.Text:
To put it simply, it connects the
spiritual world and the real
world, like a gate.

VV03X018.Text:
Exactly. Then Sanjouin will have
to return to where she came from.

VV03X019.Text:
But surely searching for
Sanjouin's yorishiro won't be
easy.

VV03X020.Text:
True. After all, we don't know
what it is, or where it is...
we don't know anything about it.

VV03X023.Text:
Sanjouin must have something
precious to her.

VV03X024.Text:
Something from her past...
Or somewhere...
Or someone...

VV03X025.Text:
(A thing from her past...
Something important to her...
What could it be?)

VV04X002.Text:
Look!
This one has Sanjouin's name.

VV04X003.Text:
(It's Chigusa-san's name!
And next to it is mom's old name.)

VV04X004.Text:
(I guess Chigusa's story was true
after all...)

VV04X005.Text:
How odd.
The club advisor's spot is empty.

VV04X006.Text:
(Only the club advisor's name tag
is missing...?)

VV04X007.Text:
(But from what I've heard,
my dad should have had one, too.)

VV04X008.Text:
Anyway, we should try breaking the
name tag.

VV04X009.Text:
Yeah, that's got to be the
yorishiro.

VV04X012.Text:
Can you think of any other
possibilities?

VV05X002.Text:
The 25th is marked.
25th of june... is today.

VV05X004.Text:
Look at the date on the
calendar... it's from fifteen
years ago.

VV05X005.Text: So it is, now that you mention it.

VV05X006.Text:
Stay back.
I'll take this one.

VV05X008.Text:
Can you think of any other
possibilities?

VV06X003.Text:
Hey, best friend. What brings you
to a place like this?

VV06X004.Text:
I, I just came to settle things
with Sanjouin...

VV06X005.Text:
Oh...? And here I thought you
might have been worried about our
new exchange student here.

VV06X006.Text:
Don't be stupid!
Why would I...

VV06X007.Text:
Hahaha.
Don't try to hide it, best friend.

VV06X008.Text:
That's enough, you two.
Now really isn't the time.

VV06X009.Text:
I suppose you're right.
So, tell us.
Where's Sanjouin's yorishiro?

VV06X010.Text:
Okay...
I think it's probably inside that
locker.

VV06X011.Text:
(She seemed flustered that time.
There's definitely got to be
something in here!)

VV06X012.Text:
I see... Chigusa's locker.
Open it.

VV06X015.Text:
A red string.
In Ohtori Academy, they say that's
some kind of charm, right?

VV06X016.Text:
Chigusa-san... So you loved my
father that much...

VV06X017.Text:
Do it. If you break that,
Sanjouin will...

VD74A001.Text:
Man, what a shame... just when I
thought we were becoming friends,
you have to go and transfer again.

VD74A002.Text:
But her father is sick, so there's
no helping it, Utena-sama.

VD74A003.Text:
Honestly, I also want to stay at
Ohtori Academy, but...

VD74A004.Text:
I also can't leave my mom to take
care of him alone.

VD74A005.Text:
I see...
Well, you gotta do what you gotta
do.

VD75X001.Text:
In the end, I'm afraid that coming
to Ohtori Academy brought you
nothing but bad experiences.

VD75X002.Text:
No, Touga-san, you treated me
really well.
And...

VD75X003.Text:
That night is something I'll never
forget.

VD75X004.Text:
I won't forget how I danced with
you at the masquerade ball.

VD75X005.Text:
If you hadn't been there, I don't
know what would have happened to
me. I'm really grateful.

VD75X006.Text:
I'm honored. If you like, do come
hang out with us at Ohtori Academy
again.

VD75X007.Text:
Of course!
Thank you very much.

VD76X004.Text:
Hey. What about you,
transfer student?

VD76X005.Text:
On the same day you come here,
this incident happens. It's too
much to be mere coincidence.

VD76X007.Text:
To be honest, at first I thought
you were really scary, Saionji
-san. But...

VD76X008.Text:
Now I understand that you're a
very kind person.

VD76X009.Text:
Now I understand that you're
very pure of heart.

VD76X010.Text:
Now I understand that you're a
very forthright person.

VD76X012.Text:
Thank you, Saionji-san.
Keep at it on both the path of the
sword and the path of love.

VD77X001.Text:
This incident was a rough one, but
the fact that you overcame it is
sure to give you greater self-
confidence.

VD77X002.Text:
You were a great help.
I wanted to thank you again.

VD77X003.Text:
You also showed good strength in
your fencing arm. I hope that
you'll try to continue with it.

VD77X004.Text:
I'm sure your position was
difficult to be in, but you truly
did your best.

VD77X005.Text:
Do your best at your new school,
as well.

VD77X006.Text:
Yes.
You do your best too, Juri-san.

VD78X001.Text:
Senpai, you really helped me in
a lot of ways.

VD78X002.Text:
If you hadn't come here,
I don't know what the Student
Council would have done...

VD78X003.Text:
Thanks, Miki-kun.
You also helped me out a lot.

VD78X004.Text:
Now hang in there, just like
I taught you.

VD78X005.Text:
Please take care of Miki-kun,
Anthy.

VD78X007.Text:
S, senpai!
This isn't the place for...

VD78X008.Text:
Himemiya-san, just ignore that!
It wasn't anything...

VD78X009.Text:
I'll make sure I can play the song
you taught me perfectly by the
next time we meet.

VD78X010.Text: So can we play it together again?

VD78X012.Text:
If you hadn't been here, I might
not have been able to smile like
this. Thank you, truly.

VD78X013.Text:
No, I'm the one who should thank
you, senpai...

VD78X014.Text:
Geez, guys, put a lid on it
already.

VD79X001.Text:
Man, and I thought that we'd be
able to become good friends...

VD79X002.Text:
The East Dorm kind of felt a lot
bigger with you around.

VD79X003.Text:
If you go and say things like
that, it's going to make it harder
for me to leave!

VD79X004.Text: Utena, you did so much for me.

VD79X005.Text:
You said you wanted to be a Prince
, but to me, Utena, you already
were one.

VD79X006.Text:
We've made great memories, like
how we played basketball together
in the middle of the night.

VD79X007.Text:
I think it's because you were
there that I was able to struggle
through this whole thing.
Thanks, Utena.

VD79X008.Text:
Thanks, Utena. If you hadn't been
there, I think I might have given
up partway through.

VD79X009.Text: I'm really grateful to you, Utena.

VD79X010.Text:
Aw, I'm gonna get kinda
embarassed if you talk
like that.

VD79X011.Text:
But, I'm happy.
I hope you come back and visit.
You're totally welcome, whenever.

VD79X015.Text:
I brought it from the Dueling
Arena. It's an important item that
you got from your parents, right?

VD79X018.Text:
(Honestly, from the times we spent
walking in the park, and going
shopping in town, I think that we
might have been able to become
good friends...)

VD79X019.Text:
(If there's such a thing as
reincarnation, then next time,
we'll definitely...)

VD79X021.Text:
(Chigusa-san, you just wanted a
prince all to yourself. That's
what it came down to...)

VD79X023.Text:
(I didn't know anything about you.
Or about my parents, or myself, or
anything...)

VD79X026.Text:
Should I not have brought it to
you?

VD79X027.Text:
Oh, no, it's not like that.
Thanks, Utena. I'd been worried
about it all this time.

VD79X030.Text:
Yeah... I guess you've gotta get
going. Or your boat's gonna set
sail......

VD80A002.Text:
You guys, and Ohtori
Academy itself, have given me
memories for a lifetime.

VD80B002.Text:
You guys, and Ohtori
Academy itself, have given me
memories for a lifetime.

VD80N002.Text:
You guys, and Ohtori
Academy itself, have given me
memories for a lifetime.

VD80O002.Text:
You guys, and Ohtori
Academy itself, have given me
memories for a lifetime.

VQ01X001.Text:
Sanjouin Chigusa...
The evil queen was brought down by
the prince after all.

VQ01X002.Text:
But as an experiment in having a
manifested soul serve as a
Duelist, it was a success.

VQ01X003.Text:
Yes, after all, she was no more
than a test case.
For the sake of our next move...

VQ02X001.Text:
Please make me the Rose Bride...
You promised, after all.

VQ02X002.Text:
Ah, indeed. For your sake,
I'll obtain it. The Power to
Revolutionize the World...

VQ03X002.Text:
Well, technically we have one, but
its activities are suspended.
It doesn't have any members.

VQ03X003.Text: Were you planning on joining it?

VQ03X004.Text:
Yeah.
Look, I even brought my saber.

VQ03X005.Text:
Woah... so you've done a lot of
fencing?

VQ03X008.Text:
I want to start.
I'm a total beginner.

VQ03X009.Text:
But there's someone I want to
catch up with...
Someone much stronger than me.

VQ03X011.Text:
(Some day, I'll return to Ohtori
Academy. And then, I'll show that
person how much stronger I've
become...)

VT09X003.Text:
Um, here. This is the address I'm
going to be moving to.

VT09X004.Text:
I won't ask you to come see me.
But please... please send me a
letter.

VT09X005.Text:
Yeah, I'll write you a letter
every day, my thoughts full of
you.

VT09X007.Text:
Yes... and then, sometime in the
near future, I'll come visit you.

VT09X008.Text:
I'm so happy...
I can trust what you say, right?

VT09X009.Text:
Of course you can. Come now, dry
your tears.

VT09X010.Text: Or do you not trust me?

VT09X012.Text: I'll be waiting for your letters!

VT09X013.Text:
And for the day when you come to
meet me...

VT09X014.Text:
Yeah, I'll come withou fail...
haha.

VT11X001.Text:
(Why haven't you sent me a letter,
Touga-san...?)

VT11X003.Text:
(Do I have to wait for you from
now on, forever and ever...?)

VS09X002.Text:
Now that you mention it, he never
came, huh.

VS09X003.Text:
He's started to catch pneumonia.
He needs complete bed rest.

VS09X005.Text:
I can't believe he was out in that
rain.

VS09X006.Text:
Doing that level of strict
training... he has no common sense
at all.

VS09X007.Text:
It's all because he went and
dueled for my sake in that
condition...

VS09X009.Text:
Never mind, it's nothing.
Anyway, it's time, so I'd better
be on my way.

VS10X002.Text:
I won't let you lay one finger on
her. I'm going to protect her!

VS10X004.Text:
(I really do want to see you one
more time.)

VS10X005.Text:
(I'll head back to the academy--
head back and say a proper
goodbye.)

VS10X006.Text:
(If I don't, I'll regret it for
the rest of my life.)

VS10X009.Text: Did you come to see me off?

VS10X010.Text:
I owe you a lot, so I figured I'd
give you this as thanks.

VS10X013.Text:
Even if we're torn far apart, even
if you're in love with Anthy...

VS10X014.Text:
One day, I'm sure I'll return
here.

VS10X015.Text:
And then I swear I'll make you
turn my way.

VS10X017.Text:
I won't say good-bye.
See you later!

VJ11X001.Text:
Hey, hey, did you have a boyfriend
at your old school?

VJ11X002.Text:
I heard a rumor that Ohtori
Academy's full of nothing but
hotties!

VJ11X006.Text: Ahh, I knew you had one!

VJ09X002.Text:
Now that you mention it, senpai
didn't come, did she? I know I
told her about this, too...

VJ09X003.Text:
No... no, it isn't. I don't think
it's strange at all.

VJ09X007.Text:
(I just spouted that out in the
heat of the moment.)

VJ09X008.Text:
(I'm sure she thinks I'm a
weirdo...)

VJ09X009.Text:
If you have some message for her,
we could pass it on for you.

VJ09X011.Text:
Well then, I've gotta get going
soon. I don't have a lot of time.

VJ10X002.Text:
It's strange, isn't it?
For a woman to be in love with
another woman.

VJ10X004.Text:
(I really do want to see you one
more time.)

VJ10X005.Text:
(I'll head back to the academy--
head back and say a proper
goodbye.)

VJ10X006.Text:
(If I don't, I'll regret it for
the rest of my life.)

VJ10X011.Text:
I can't return your love, but if
you like, then accept this.

VJ10X013.Text:
Thank you so much, Juri-san.
I'll treasure it for the rest of
my life.

VJ10X016.Text: Juri-san, I really do love you.

VJ10X017.Text:
I don't care if we're both girls.
I love you so, so much...

VM09X001.Text:
Senpai, you really helped me in
a lot of ways.

VM09X002.Text:
If you hadn't been here, who knows
how we of the Student Council
would have ended up...

VM09X003.Text:
Thanks, Miki-kun.
You also helped me out a lot.

VM09X005.Text: I do not want to lose you.

VM09X006.Text:
Even if I end up trading my life
for yours...

VM09X007.Text:
Miki-kun... Me, too...
I'm in love with you, too...

VM09X011.Text:
Oh, Utena.
It's nothing in particular.

VM09X012.Text:
See ya, Miki. Tell Kozue-chan I
said bye, too.

VM10X002.Text:
No. I won't allow myself to lose
my shining thing again.

VM10X003.Text:
I thought I'd finally found my
shining thing in you...
Despite that...

VM10X004.Text:
(Back then, he called me his
shining thing, but...)

VM10X005.Text:
(That's just silly. We just got
melodramatic because of the
situation we were in.)

VM10X006.Text:
(I feel so silly too, getting
serious for a younger boy.)

VM10X008.Text:
(Besides, I'd feel sorry for
Miki-kun if he fell for me, just
as I'm transferring out.)

VM10X011.Text:
[huff, huff]
I finally caught up with you.

VM10X013.Text:
I felt that if I didn't see you
and talk to you, I'd regret it for
the rest of my life.

VM10X015.Text:
(What should I do? I'm sure
Miki-kun cares for me...)

VM10X021.Text:
I didn't mention this before, but
the truth is, I've got a boyfriend
back home.

VM10X023.Text:
Sorry! I was kinda embarrassed, so
I kept it to myself...

VM10X024.Text:
The reason I'm going home is
actually because I miss him, too.

VM10X026.Text:
Why won't anyone be my shining
thing...?

VM10X027.Text:
Miki-kun, your shining thing isn't
me.

VM10X028.Text:
I'm sure one day you'll find your
true shining thing, someone who
isn't me. I know it.

VM10X031.Text:
I know--I'll cast a super-
powerful charm on you to help you
out.

VM10X033.Text:
Ahh, what's with that look?
Don't you believe what your big
sis says?

VM10X037.Text:
(I'm sorry, Miki-kun. The whole
thing about a boyfriend was
actually a lie...)

VM10X038.Text:
(But it's better this way for
you.)

VM10X039.Text:
(Someday you'll meet someone
wonderful, who can stay by your
side forever...)

VM10X040.Text:
(I don't know if that'll be Anthy
or not, but...)

VM10X041.Text:
(I love you, Miki-kun. And that's
why...)

VM10X044.Text:
See ya, Miki-kun. Stick to my
advice and grow up into a fine
man.

VM10X046.Text:
(I'm sorry, Miki-kun. That's my
final bit of selfishness.)

VM10X047.Text:
(I'll take just your first kiss to
remember you by.)

VM10X048.Text:
(But that's all. If that's it,
then I'll be able to forget
you...)

VM11X001.Text:
If I'm going to make someone my
boyfriend, yeah, he's gotta be
older than me.

VM11X002.Text:
He's gotta be about ten years
older than me - a real adult.

VM11X003.Text:
What, seriously? But there's a lot
of girls who fall for their
classmates.

VM11X004.Text:
If he's a little older, then
fine, but ten years older is
practically middle-aged!

VM11X005.Text:
But c'mon, boys our own age are
so childish. Hey, don't you think
so?

VU08X003.Text:
(But I have to part with you,
already...)

VU08X004.Text:
(I wanted to talk to you more
,and go more places with you,
and do all kinds of things....)

VU08X005.Text:
(I don't want us to part here.
I want to stay with you...)

VU08X008.Text:
Sorry!
I had to go grab something
that I wanted to give you.

VU08X012.Text:
I thought you might like it.
I mean, if you don't want to use
it, that's fine too, of course.

VU08X013.Text:
No, I will. Thanks, Utena.
This makes me really happy.
I'll treasure it.

VU08X014.Text:
And when you told me that I was a
precious friend of yours...
that made me really happy, too.

VU08X020.Text:
I don't want to leave you, Utena.
I want to stay with you forever.

VU08X023.Text:
Me too. You know, back when my
parents died, I was really sad for
a while.

VU08X025.Text:
and wiped my tears away
like this, with a kiss.

VU08X027.Text:
I don't have a ring to give you
like my prince did back then,

VU08X028.Text: but I'm sure we'll meet again.

VU08X029.Text:
If you don't lose
that strength and nobility...

VU08X032.Text:
I'll do my best.
Even at my new school,
I'll remember you and do my best.

VU08X033.Text:
Then let's not say "goodbye."
See you later, %N.

VU10X001.Text:
Now class, today we greet a new
transfer student.
Go ahread and introduce yourself.

VU10X004.Text:
I like roses and princes.
Nice to meet you all!

VX01X002.Text:
(What should I do...
I don't have anyone to talk to!)

VX02X001.Text:
Huh? Was this building always
here? "Nemuro Memorial Hall"...
I've never heard of it.

VX02X002.Text:
Doesn't look like it's marked in
my student handbook...
But the door is open, so I guess
it's okay to go in?

VX03X002.Text:
I did at my old school.
But at this academy...

VX03X003.Text:
I'm not the sort of student who
comes to Ohtori Academy.

VX03X004.Text:
I'm surrounded by all these
wonderful, gorgeous people...

VX03X005.Text:
But I'm just a useless, ordinary
girl.

VX03X008.Text:
I don't have any friends.
So... books are my only friends.

VX03X009.Text:
Only books, which can always make
me smile...

VX03X010.Text:
The real me is just a boring girl,
who only reads books.

VX03X011.Text:
The me who exists in this gorgeous
world... is just a lie.

VX03X012.Text:
I understand.
I suppose you have no choice but
to Revolutionize the World.

VX03X013.Text:
The path before you has been
prepared.

VX04X001.Text: YOU BECAME A BLACK ROSE DUELIST

VX06X001.Text:
What the heck?
She was a pretty weak Duelist,
huh?

VX06X002.Text:
It wasn't what we expected,
was it?

VX20X001.Text:
Why did you come here to Ohtori
Academy?

VX20B001.Text:
Because I wanted to get away from
my parents.

VX21X001.Text:
Hmm.
You hold an ocean in your heart,
don't you?

VX21X003.Text:
("An ocean in my heart..."?
What the heck is this guy saying?)

VX21A001.Text: No, I have nothing like that.

VX21B001.Text:
Hmm, let me think. I think it's
less an ocean and more a mountain.

VX21C001.Text:
Uh, hello?
Could you pay attention to what
I'm saying?

VX22X001.Text:
I see...
A wide ocean, blue like the sky.
That's you exactly.

VX22X003.Text:
But your ocean is in a terrible
state.

VX22X004.Text:
Dirtied with sludge, living things
dying, the water level rising from
melted ice...
an overflowing red tide.

VX22X005.Text:
Umm... I don't really get what
you're trying to say.

VX22X006.Text:
[chuckle]
Is that so?
Well, in that case...

VX22X007.Text:
I'll show the Ends of the World...
to you.

VX23X001.Text: YOU SAW "THE ENDS OF THE WORLD"

VX25X001.Text:
What the heck?
She was a pretty weak Duelist,
huh?

VX25X002.Text:
It wasn't what we expected,
was it?

VX26X001.Text:
As expected, a hastily built-up
Duelist wasn't enough to overcome
Tenjou Utena.

VX26X002.Text:
That's what I was saying all
along.
You're a terrible person.

VX52X004.Text:
This is a proper duel.
Utena-sama, the sword...

VX52A002.Text:
I've taken the Rose Bride, Tenjou
Utena!

VX52A005.Text: Awww, know when to give up.

VX52A007.Text:
A flower that blooms only for me!
Oooooo-ho-ho-ho!

VX53X001.Text:
I'm the Rose Bride. I'll do every-
thing just as you wish. If there's
anything you want, please tell me.

VX53X002.Text:
Of course! As the victor of the
duels, those are my rights. So,
what should I have you do first?

VX53X003.Text:
Well, I'm looking forward to a lot
of things, but first, how about
you wash my back for me?

VX54X001.Text: How is it? Does it feel good?

VX54X002.Text:
Yeah... scrub a little bit more
to the left.

VX54X004.Text: Yeah, there! That feels so good!

VX54X005.Text:
Alright, we're done.
What would you like to do next?

VX54X006.Text:
Alright, next I'll wash you!
Sit over there.

VX54X010.Text:
You're the Rose Bride, aren't you?
Are you going to talk back to your
fiancee like that?

VX55X001.Text:
C'monnn!
I'm here to challenge you to
a duel!

VX56X001.Text:
Let's make this best two out of
three.

VX56X003.Text:
(It's no good.
I was up all night playing with
Anthy, so I'm sooo sleepy...!)
